bordes habytacyon sethym wood stande vp ryght ten cubytes longe shall euery borde cubyte halfe brode two fete shal one borde shalbe seperate one another thus shalt thou make bordes tabernacle exodi 36 • thou shalt make xx bordes habytacyon south syde thou shalt make xl sockettꝭ syluer vnder xx bordes two sockettes vnder one boorde two feete two sockettes vnder borde two feete lyke maner north syde habytacyon shalbe xx bordes xl sockettꝭ syluer two sockettes vnder one bord two sockettꝭ vnder borde weste ende habytacyō shalt thou make syxe bordes two bordes shalt thou make corner habytacyon metynge togyther two sydes shall coupled togyther beneth lykewyse aboue rynge thus shal two bordes corner shalbe eyght bordes hauynge sockettes syluer euen syxtene sockettes may two sockettes vnder one borde two sockettes vnder borde thou shalte make barres sethym wood fyue bordes tabernacle one syde fyue barres bordes tabernacle syde fyue barres bordes tabernacle west ende myddle barre shall go alonge throughe myddes bordes one ende vnto thou shalte couer bordes golde make theyr rynges golde put barres thorowe thou shalt couer barres gold also thou shalt reare vp habitacyon accordynge facyon therof shewed mounte thou shalte make vayle yelowe sylke purple scarlet white twyned silke brodered worke pyctures shalt thou make hang vpon foure pyllers sethym wod couered gold whose heades shalbe gold standynge vpon foure sockettes syluer thou shalt hange vp vayle rynges thou mayest brynge within vayle arke wytnes vayle shall vnto deuyde holy frō moost holye thou shalt put merciseate vpō arke wytnes holyest place thou shalte put table without vayle candelstycke ouer agaynst table south syde habitacyon put table north syde thou shalte make hangynge dore tabernacle yelowe sylke purple scarlet whyte twyned sylke wrought nedle work thou shalt make hangyng fyue pyllers sethym wood couer golde theyr knoppes shall golde thou shalt caste fyue sockettes brasse ¶ forme aulter burntofferynge horne rynges staues gredyrons ornamentes capi xxvii thou shalt make exodi 38 • ezeth▪ 43 aulter sethym wood fyue cubytes longe fyue cubytes brode shalbe iiii square thre cubytes hye thou shalte make horne foure corner horne shall selfe thou shalte couer brasse make ashpannes shouels basyns fleshhokes fyrepannes apparell therof brasse thou shalt make vnto gredyron also lyke net brasse vpon net shalte thou make foure brasen rynges foure corner therof thou shalt put vnder cō passe aulter beneth net maye myddes aulter yu shalte make two barres aulter sethym wod couer brasse let put rynges alonge sydes aulter beare withall make aulter holowe wt bordes euen shewed mounte shall make thou shalt make courte habitacyon may south syde hangynges whyte twyned sylke hū dred cubytes longe one syde xx pyllers therof theyr xx sockettes brasse knoppes pyllers theyr hope shalbe syluer lykewyse north syde shall hangynges hundred cubytes longe xx pyllers theyr twentye sockettes brasse knoppes hoopes pyllers shalbe syluer bredth courte whiche westward shall haue courtaynes fyftye cubytes ten pyllers theyr ten sockettes bredth courte whiche eastwarde shall haue fyftye cubytes hangynges xv cubytes one syde theyr thre pyllers theyr thre sockettes lykewyse syde shalbe hangyngꝭ fyftene cubytes wt theyr iii pyllers theyr thre sockettes gate courte shall vayle xx cubytes yelow sylke purple scarlet whyte twyned sylke wrought nedle worke foure pillers theyr foure sockettes pyllers round aboute courte shall hoped syluer theyr knoppes shall syluer theyr sockettes brasse length courte shall hundred cubytes bredth l heyght fyue hangynges shall whyte twyned sylke theyr sockettes brasse vessel habytacyon maner seruyce pynnes therof yea pynnes also courte shall brasse leuiti 〈◊〉 • thou shal commaunde chyldren israell gyue pure oyle olyue beaten lyght powre alwaye lampes tabernacle wytnesse without vayle whiche wytnes shall aaron sonnes dresse euenyng mornyng lord shall statute euer vnto theyr generacyons chyldren israell ¶ aar • n apparell sonnes capi xxviii take thou vnto aaron thy brother sonnes hym among chyldren israel maye minystre vnto aaron nadab abihu eleazar ithamar aaron sonnes thou shalt make holy rayment aaron thy brother maye vnto glorye bewtye thou shalte speake vnto wyse herted whomsoeuer haue fylled spiryte wysdome make aaron rayment consecrate hym maye minystre vnto garmētes shal make brestlap ephod tunycle slrayte coote mytre gyrdle holy garmentes shall make aaron thy brother sonnes maye minystre vnto let take golde yelowe sylke purple scarlet whyte twyned sylke shall make ephod golde yelowe sylke purple scarlet whyte twyned sylke brodered worke two sydes shall come togyther closed vp two edge therof gyrdle ephod shall workmanshyp stuffe euen golde yelow sylke purple scarlet whyte twyned sylke thou shalte take two onyx stone graue name chyldren israell syxe name one stone syxe stoone accordynge ❀ ordre theyr byrth worke stonegrauer graueth signettes shalt thou graue two stone name chyldrē israel shalt make set gold thou shalt put two stone vpon two shoulder ephod maye stone remēbraunce vnto chyldren israel aarō shall beare theyr name lorde vpon two shoulder remembraunce thou shalt make hooke golde two cheynes fyne golde lynke worke wrethed fasten wrethed cheyues hooke thou shalte make breestlappe iudgement wt brodered worke euen worke ephod shalt thou make namely golde yelow sylke purple scarlet whyte twyned sylke shalt thou make fouresquare shalbe double hande brede longe hande brede brode thou shalt fyll foure rowes stone fyrste rowe shalbe sardios topas smaragdus seconde rowe rubye saphir diamonde thyrde lygurios achat amatist fourth turcas onix iaspis shall set golde theyr inclosers stoones shalbe grauen sygnettes grauen name chyldren israel euen xii name euery one name accordyng xii tribe thou shalt make vpon brestlappe two fastenyng cheynes pure golde wrethen worke thou shalt make lykewyse vpon brestlap two rynges golde put edge brestlappe put two wrethen cheynes golde two ryngꝭ edge brest lappe two endes two cheynes thou shalt fasten two close hokes put vppon shoulder ephod foresyde thou shalt yet make two ryngꝭ golde thou mayest put two edge brestlap euen border therof towarde insyde ephod ouer agaynst yet two rynges golde thou shalt make put two sydes ephod beneth ouer agaynst brestlap alowe sydes ioyned togyther vpō brodered gyrdle ephod shal bynde brestlappe rynges vnto rynges ephod lace yelow sylke may lye close aboue brodered gyrdle ephod brestlap closed ephod aaron shall beare name chyldren israell brestlap iudgement vpon herte goeth hooly place remembraunce lorde alway thou shalt put brestlap iudgement ❀☞ vrym thummin shall euen vpon aaron herte goeth lorde aaron shall beare iudgement chyldren israel vpon herte lorde alwaye thou shalte make tunycle vnto ephod togyther yelow sylke shalbe hole head myddes hauyng bonde wouen worke rounde coler coler partlet rent beneth vpon hem thou shalt make pomgarnates yelow sylke purpull scarlet rounde aboute hem belle golde bytwene rounde aboute let euer golden bel pomgarnate golden belt pomegarnate rounde vpon hem tunycle eccle 45 b aaron shal haue vpon hym minystreth sounde shall herde goeth holy place lorde cō meth shal dye thou shalte make plate pure golde graue theron sygnettes grauen holynesse lorde put yelowe sylke lace vppon mytre euen vpon forefront shall vpon aaron foreheade aaron maye beare ☞ synne hoolye thynges whiche chyldren israel halowe theyr holy gyftes shalbe alwayes vpō forehead reconcylynge lorde thou shalt make lynnen cote thou shalt make mytre lynnen gyrdle nedle worke thou shalt make aaron sonnes also cote gyrdels bonettes glorious bewtyfull thou shalte put vppon aaron thy brother sonnes hym shalt anoynt ☞ fyll theyr handes saynctifye maye minystre vnto thou shalt make lynnē breches couer theyr preuityes loynes vnto thyes shal reach shalbe vpon aaron sonnes come exodi 27 tabernacle wytnesse come vnto aulter minystre holynesse beare synne dye shall lawe foreuer vnto aaron seede hym ¶ consecracyon aaron sonnes capi xxix thynge also shalte thou doo vnto thou •• ai viii b halowest preestes thou shalte take calfe euen yonge oxe two rammes without blemish vnleuended bread cake swete breade tempred oyle wafer swete breade anoynted oyle wheten floure shalt thou make put maunde brynge maunde calfe two rammes brynge aaron sonnes vnto doore tabernacle wytnesse washe water take garmentes put vpon aaron strayte cote tunicle ephod ephod brestlap gyrde brodered gyrdle ephod put mytre vpon heade put hooly crowne vpon mytre shalte thou take anoyntyng oyle powre vpon heade anoynte hym brynge sonnes put albes vpon gyrde gyrdles wel aaron sonnes put myters preestes offyce shall theyrs perpetual lawe thou shalte fyll handes aaron sonnes brynge calfe tabernacle wytnesse leuiti b aaron sonnes shal put theyr handes vpon heade calfe thou shalt kyl hym lorde doore tabernacle wytnesse take bloode calfe put vpon horne aulter thy fynger powre bloode besyde hotome aulter take fatte couereth inwardes kal lyuer two kydneys fatte vpon burne vpon aulter flesshe calfe skyn donge shalte thou burne fyre without hooste synne offerynge thou shalte also take one ram aaron sonnes shal put theyr handes vpō heade ram thou hast slayne ram thou shalt take bloode sprynkle rounde aboute aulter cut ram peces wash inwardes legges put vnto peces vnto head burne hoole ram vpon aulter burnt offeryng vnto lorde swete sauour sacrifyce vnto lorde leui viii take ram aaron sonnes shall put theyr handes vpon heade shalte thou kyl hym take bloode put vpō typ ryght eare aaron sonnes vpon thombe theyr ryght handes vpon great theyr ryght foote sprynkle bloode vpon aulter rounde aboute thou shalt take bloode vppon aulter anoyntynge oyle sprynkle vpon aaron bestymentes vpon sonnes vpon theyr garmētes hym shall halowed clothes sonnꝭ theyr clothes hym leui viii • thou shalte take fat ram rompe fat couereth inwardꝭ kal lyuer two kydneys fatte vppon ryght shoulder ram fullofferynge symnel breade cake oyled breade wafer basket swete bread lorde put al vpon handꝭ aaron handes sonnes waue thē waueoffryng lorde agayne thou shalte take theyr handes burne vpō aulter burntofferynge sauour swetnesse lorde sacrifyce vnto lorde leui viii▪ • thou shalt take brest ram aaron consecracyon waue waueofferyng lorde shalbe thy parte thou shalt sanctifye breest waueofferyng shoulder heaueofferyng waued heued vp ram consecracyon aaron sonnes shall aaron sonnes statute foreuer chyldren israel heueofferyng euen heueofferynge chyldren israel theyr peaceofferynges theyr haue offerynges lordes holy garmentes aaron shalbe sonnes hym anoynted therin fyll theyr handes therin son preest stede shal put seuen dayes whē cōmeth tabernacle wytnesse minyster holy place leui v 18 • thou shalte take ram cōsecracion sethe flesshe holy place aaron sonnꝭ shal eate flesh ram breade basket euen dore tabernacle wytnes shal eate bycause atonement made therwith fyl theyr handes consecrate ☞ straūger shall eate therof bycause holy yf ought flesh cōsecracyon bread remayne vnto mornyng thou shalt burne fyre shall eaten bycause hooly therfore shalte thou vnto aaron sonnes euen accordyng althynges whiche haue cōmaunded seuen dayes shalt thou fyl theyr handes offre euery day calfe syn offerynge reconcyle withal thou mayest clense aulter whē thou recōcilest vpon thou shalt anoynt sanctifye seuen dayes thou shalt recōcyle vpon aulter sanctyfye shall aulter moost holye euery one toucheth aulter let hym holy nume 28 whiche thou shalte offre vpon aulter euen two lambes one yeare olde daye daye continually one thou shalt offre mornynge euen one lambe tenth deale floure myngled wt fourth parte hyn beaten oyle fourth parte hyn wyne drynke offerynge lambe thou shalte offre euen shalt therto accordynge meat offeryng drynke offerynge mornynge odour swete sauour sacrifyce vnto lorde let continual burntofferynge amonge chyldren doore tabernacle wytnesse lorde leuiti num xii wyl mete speke vnto wyl mete chyldren israell wylbe sanctifyed myne honour wyl sanctyfye taber nacle wytnesse aulter wyl sanctifye also bothe aaron sonnes preestes wyll leuit 26 b • corin 6 dwell amonge chyldren israel wyl theyr god shall knowe lorde theyr god brought lande egypt dwell amonge euen lorde theyr god ¶ aulter insence brasen lauer anoyntynge oyle capi xxx thou shalt make aulter burne sence sethym wod shalt thou make cubyte longe cubyte brode euen foure square shal two cubytes hye horne therof shall procede thou shalt ouerlay wt fyne golde roffe walles rounde aboute horne also shalt make vnto crowne golde rounde aboute two golden ryngꝭ eyther syde euen vnder crowne may place barres beare withal thou shalt make barres sethym wood couer golde thou shalt put vayle arke wytnesse mercyseate vpō wytnes wher wyl mete aarō shal burne theron swete sence euery mornynge dresseth lampꝭ euen shall burne lykewyse euen setteth vp lampes shall burne sence insencyng shalbe perpetually lorde thorowout generacions▪ ye shal put leuiti x • straunge sence ther burntsacrifyce meatofferyng neyther powre drynkofferyng theron aarō shal reconcyle vppon horne yeare bloode synofferynge reconcilynge euen yeare shall reconcyle thorow generacyons moost holy vnto lorde lorde spake vnto moses saynge nume xxvi yf thou takest somme chyldren israel theyr nombre shall gyue euery man reconcylynge soule vnto lorde thou tellest plage amonge thou tellest thus moche shal euery man gyue goeth nombre halfe sycle sycle leui 27 • nume▪ 3 • ezech 45 • sanctuary sycle xx halfpense halfe sycle shalbe heueofferynge lorde nōbred twentye yeare olde aboue shall gyue heueofferyng vnto lorde ryche shal passe poore shall goo vnder halfe sycle ye shal gyue heueofferynge vnto lorde may haue mercye vpon youre soules thou shalte take reconcilyng money chyldren israel shalt put vnto vse tabernacle wytnesse may memorial vnto chyldren israell lorde may haue mercy vpō soulꝭ lorde spake vnto moses saynge exodi xi • thou shalte make lauer brasse foote also brasse wassh withal shalt put bytwene tabernacle wytnes aulter put water therin aaron sonnes shal washe theyr handes theyr feete therin euen go tabernacle wytnesse shal washe water least dye goo vnto aulter minyster burne lordes offeryng shal washe theyr handꝭ theyr feete shall dye shall ordynaunce vnto foreuer vnto hym seede thorowout theyr generacions lorde spake vnto moses saynge take vnto pryncipal spice moost pure myrte fyue hundred sycles swete cynamon halfe moche euen two hundred fiftye sycles swete calamus two hundred l cassia two hundred l holye sycle oyle olyue hin leui viii b thou shalt make oyle holye oyntment euen oyntment cōpoūde crafte apoticarye shall oyle holye vnction thou shalte anoynte tabernacle wytnes therwith arke wytnesse table al apparel candelstycke apparel aulter insens aulter burntsacrifyce al vessel lauer fote thou shalte sanctifye maye moost holye man touche halowed thou shalt anoynte aaron sonnes consecrate maye minyster vnto thou shalte speake vnto chyldren israel saynge shall holye oyntynge oyle vnto thorowout genus cyon upon mannes flesshe shall powred neyther shall ye make makyng holye shall holye vnto whosoeuer maketh lyke whosoeuer putteth vppon straunger shal perysh among people lorde sayde vnto moses take vnto swete spice balme onycha swete galbanum spyces pure frankencens eche lyke moche make swete smellyng insence crafte apoticarie myngled togyther pure holy beate powder putof wytnesse tabernacle wytnesse wyll mete shall vnto moost holye se ye make none makyng shalbe vnto holy lorde whosoeuer shal make lyke vn smel therto shal perysh frō among people ¶ callynge bezaleel ahaliab workemen sabboth cōmaūded table stone ginen moses capi xxxi lorde spake vnto moses sayenge beholde exodi 35 haue called name bezaleel sonne ury sonne hur trybe iuda haue fylled hym spiryte god 3 reg 7 b wysdome vnderstandynge knowledge maner worke fynde subtyll feates worke golde syluer brasse crafte set stoones carue tymbre worke al maner workmanshyp behold haue gyuen hym cō panion ahaliab sonne ahisamach trybe dan hertes al wyse herted haue put wysdome make al haue cōmaunded tabernacle wytnesse arke wytnes mercyseate vpon al ornamentes tabernacle table ornamentes pure candelstycke al apparel aulter insens aulter burntoffrynges al vessel lauer foote vestimentes minystre holye garmentes aaron preest garmen te sonnes minystre anoyntynge oyle swete sence sanctuary accordyng al haue cōmaunded shall lorde spake vnto moses sayenge speake vnto chyldren israell saye wyse se ye kepe exodi iii sabboths sygne bytwene generacyons knowe lorde doeth sanctifye nume iii kepe sabboth therfore holye vnto defyleth shalbe stayne whosoeuer worketh therin soule shalbe roted amonge people sixe dayes shall men worke seuenth daye sabboth hoolye reste lorde whosoeuer doth worke sabboth daye shall dye wherfore let chyldren israel kepe sabboth obserue thorowout theyr generacyons appoyntemēt euer sygne bytwene chyldrē israel euer gene 〈◊〉 syx dayes lorde made heuen earth seuenth day rested refreshed lorde made ende cōmonyng moses vpon mounte sinay exodi iii gaue hym two table wytnes euen table stone wrytten ☞ fynger god ¶ golden calfe moses prayeth breaketh table anger chydeth aaron ydolaters slayne capi xxxii people sawe longe moses came downe mountayne gathered selues togyther vnto aaron sayde vnto hym actes vii make v goddes go v moses felowe brought v lande egypt wote become aarō said vnto iudi vii plucke golden earingꝭ eares wyues sonnes youre doughters brynge vnto people plucked golden earynges theyr eares brought vnto aaron psal 106 c receyued theyr handes facyoned grauer made calfe molton mettall sayde 3 reg xii • thy goddes israell whiche brought lande egypt aaron sawe made aulter aaron cryed sayenge tomorow holy day lorde roose vp mornynge offered burntofferynges brought peaceofferynges also • corin x b people sat downe eate drynke rose vp agayne playe ✚ lorde sayd vnto moses deuit ix b go gette downe thy people whiche thou broughtest lande egypte haue marred turned atonce waye whiche cōmaunded psal cvi c haue made calfe molten metal haue worshipped haue offered therto saynge thy goddes israel hath brought lande egypt lorde sayde vnto moses exod 33 haue sene people beholde styffe necked people nowe suffre wrath may waxe hote agaynst con sume wyll make myghtye people moses besought lorde god sayd lorde doth thy wrath waxe hote agaynst thy peple thou hast brought lande egypt wt greate power myghtye hande nume 14 c wherfore shulde egyptian speake saye myschefe dyd brynge euen flee mountaynes cō sume face earth turne thy fearse wrath ❀ turne euyll deuysed agaynst thy people remembre abraham isaac israel thy seruauntes whome yu swarest thyne owne selfe saydest gene xv b xii • wyl mul tiplye seede sterres heuen lande haue spoken wyll gyue vnto seede shal enheryte euer lorde refrayned hym selfe euyll ⊢ whiche sayde wolde vnto people moses turned backe went downe hyll exodi 31 two table wytnesse hande table wrytten bothe leaues table worke god wrytynge wrytynge god grauen table whē iosua herde noyce peple showted sayd vnto moses noyse war host answered crye haue maystrye haue worse heare noyse synge fortuned assoone came nye vnto host saw calfe daunsyng moses wrath waxed hote cast table hande brake benethe hyll deute ix toke calfe whiche made burned fyre stampt vnto powder strawed water made chyldren israel drynke moses sayd vnto aaron dyd people vnto thou hast brought greate syn vpon aaron answered let wrath lorde waxe fearse thou knowest people euen set myschefe sayd vnto make v god go v wote become moses felow brought v lande egypte sayde vnto ☞ let haue golde plucke brynge cast fyre thereof came calfe moses therfore saw people naked aaron made naked vnto theyr shame ❀ ☞ amonge theyr ennemyes went stode gate hoste sayde yf man perteyne vnto lorde let hym come sonnes leui gathered selues togyther came vnto hym sayde vnto thus sayth lorde god israel put euery man swerde syde go gate gate thorowout hoste slee euery man brother euery man companyon euery man neyghbour chyldren leui dyd moses sayd fell people day thre thousand men moses sayd fyll handes vnto lorde daye euery man vppon sonne vpon brother may gyuen blessynge daye morowe fortuned moses sayd vnto people ye haue synned great synne nowe wyll goo vp vnto lorde yf peraduenture may purchace attonement synne moses therfore wente agayne vnto lorde sayd oh people haue synned great synne haue made goddes golde pray eyther forgyue theyr synne yf thou wylte ☞ psal 69 f wype thy booke whiche thou hast wrytten lorde sayde vnto moses wyll put boke hath synned agaynst go thou bryng people vnto place whiche sayde vn beholde exodi 1 • • myne angell shall go neuerthelatter day visyte wyll vysyte theyr syn vpon lorde plaged people bycause made calfe whiche aaron made ¶ lorde sendeth angell people lorde deuyeth go vp people▪ people lament theyr syn moses talketh lorde capi xxxiii lorde sayde vnto moses departe go hence thou people whiche thou hast brought lande egypte vnto lande whiche swore vnto abraham isaac iacob sayenge gene xxii▪ vnto thy seede wyll gyue exodi 23 c wyll sende angell wyl cast cananytes amorytes hethites pherezites heuites iebusytes lande floweth mylke hony wyll go amonge selfe exod 32 c ye styfnecked people leest consume waye people herde euyll tydynges sorowed man dyd put best rayment lorde spake vnto moses say vnto chyldren israell ye styfnecked people must come sodenly vpon make ende therfore put thy goodlye rayment maye wete vnto chyldren israell layde theyr goodly rayment euen mounte horeb moses toke tabernacle pytched without hooste farre hoost called tabernacle wytnesse came passe euery one whiche wolde pray vnto lorde went vnto tabernacle wytnesse whiche without hoost fortuned moses went vnto tabernacle al people rose vp stoode euery man tent dore loked moses vntyll gone tabernacle soone moses entred tabernacle cloudye pyller descended stode dore tabernacle talked moses al people saw cloudye pyller stande tabernacle dore rose vp worshypped euery man tent dore lorde spake vnto moses nume xii c ☞ face face man speaketh vnto frende turned agayne hoste ☞ chylde iosua seruaunt sonne nun departed tabernacle moses sayd vnto lorde se thou sayest vnto leade people forth thou hast shewed whome thou wylte sende thou haste sayde moreouer knowe name thou hast also founde grace syght nowe therfore yf haue foūde fauour thy syght shew thy way maye knowe maye fynde grace thy syght consyder also nacyon thy people sayde presence shall go wyll gyue reste sayde vnto hym yf thy presence go carye v hense shall knowen thy people haue founde fauour thy syght thou goest v yf thou go v shall thy people haue preemynence al people vpon face earth lorde sayde vnto moses wyll also thou hast sayd thou hast founde grace syght knowe name sayde beseche shewe thy glorye sayde wyll make good go wyll called name lorde rom •• wyll shewe mercy whome wyll shewe mercye wyll haue compassyon whome wyl haue compassyon sayd furthermore thou mayst se face deute 〈…〉 iudi 〈◊〉 xiii • ioh c ☞ shall man se lyue lorde sayde beholde place thou shalte stande vpon rocke whyle glory goeth forth wyll put clyfte rocke wyll put myne hande vpon whyle passe wyll take awaye myne hand thou shalt se backe partes face shall sene ¶ table renued mercy god felowshyp gentyls forbydden theyr ydolatrye also theyr feastes capi xxiiii lorde sayd vnto moses deut •• hewe two table stoone lyke vnto fyrst wyl wryte vpon wordes fyrst table whiche thou brakest redy mornynge thou mayst come vp early vnto mounte sinay stand top mounte shall man come vp neyther let man sene thorow al mounte neyther let shepe ox fede hyll moses hewed two table stoone lyke vnto fyrste rose vp early mornynge went vp vnto mounte sinay lorde cōmaunded hym toke hand two table stone lorde descended cloude stoode hym called vppon name lorde lorde walked hym cryed lorde psal 86 c iere 32 lorde god mercyful gracyous long sufferyng aboundaunt mercy truth kepynge mercy store thousandes forgyuynge wyckednesse vngodlynesse synne ❀ ☞ leauynge one innocent vysytynge wyckednesse father vpon chyldren vpon chyldrens chyldren euen vnto thyrde fourth generacyon moses bowed hym selfe earthe quyckely worshypped sayde haue founde grace thy syght lorde let lorde go v stubburne people thou shalte haue mercy vpon oure wyckednesse synne shalte take v thyne enheritaunce sayde beholde make appoyntment thy people wyll doo ☞ meruayles suche haue bene done worlde neyther nacyons people amonge whiche thou arte shal se worke lorde ☞ terrible thynge wyl kepe thynges commaunde daye beholde cast amorites canaanite hethites pherezites heuites iebusites deute 7 3 reg xi take hede thy selfe thou make compacte inhabiters lande whyther yu goest leest cause tuyne amonge ouerthrowe theyr aulters breake theyr ymages cut downe theyr groues thou shalte worshyp straunge god lorde exodi xx called ielouse bycause ielouse god leest yf thou make agrement inhabyters land go hooryng theyr goddes sacrifyce vnto theyr goddes call thou eate theyr sacrifice thou take theyr doughters vnto thy sonnes theyr doughters go hoorynge theyr goddes make thy sonnes go hoorynge theyr god also thou shalte make goddes metall exodi xii b xxiii b feast swete breade shalte thou kepe seuen dayes thou shalte eate vnleuen ded breade cōmaunded tyme moneth corne begynneth rype moneth corne begynneth type thou camest egypte exodi 13 xxii b nume 18 c openeth matryce myne al ope neth matryce amonge cattell yf male whyther oxe shepe fyrst asse thou shalte bye lambe yf thou redeme hym thou shalte breake necke fyrste borne thy sonnes shalte thou redeme eccle 35 • rate 16 se man appeare emptye exodi xi syx dayes thou shalte worke seuenth day thou shalt rest bothe earynge reapyng exodi 23 • thou shalt obserue feast wekes fyrst fruytes wheate haruest feast ingatherynge yeres ende thryse yere shall men chyldren appeare lorde iehoua god israell caste nacyons enlarge thy coostes man shall desyre thy lande thou shalte goo vp appeare lorde thy god thryse yere erodi 23 c deute 14 c thou shalte offer bloode sacrifyce vpon leuen ney ther shall oughte sacrifyce feast passeouer lefte vnto mornynge exodi 23 c fyrste rype fruytes thy lande thou shalte brynge vnto house lorde thy god thou shalt exodi 23 • sethe kyd mother mylke lorde sayde vnto moses wryte wordes tenoure wordes haue made couenaunt israel exod 24 lorde fourtye dayes fourtye nyghtes dyd neyther eate breade drynke water de • te x • wrote vpon table wordes couenaunt euen ten verse fortuned moses came downe mounte sinay two table wytnesse moses hande came downe mounte moses wyste • e skynne face shone maner horne whyle talked hym aaron chyldren israel loked vpon moses beholde skynne face ☞ shone afrayde come nye hym called aaron cheyfe companye came vnto hym moses talked afterwarde chyldren israel came nye cōmaunded lorde sayde vnto hym mounte sinay moses made ende cōmonyng ii corin 3 b put couerynge vpon face agayne moses went lorde speake hym ii corin 3 c toke couerynge vntyll came came spake vnto chyldren israel cōmaunded chyldren israel sawe face moses skynne moses face shone moses put couerynge vpon face agayne vntyll wente comon hym ¶ sabboth fyrst fruytes requyred redynesse people offre bezalcel ahaliab praysed moses set worke capi xxxv moses gathered companye chyldren israel togyther sayd vnto wordes whiche lorde hath commaunded ye shulde exodi xx b syxe dayes ye shal worke seuenth day shall vnto holy sabboth lordes rest soeuer doth worke therin shal dye ye shal kyndle fyre thorowout oll habitacyons vpon sabboth day moses spake vnto multitude chyldren israel sayenge exodi 25 • thynge whiche lorde commaunded saynge take among heueofferyng vnto lorde soeuer wyllyng herte let hym bryng heueofferyng lorde namely golde syluer brasse yelowe sylke purple scarlet whyte sylke gootꝭ heere rain skynnes red taxus skynnes sethim wood oyle lyght spyces anoyntynge oyle swete sence onix stone stone set ephod brestlap let wyse herted among come make lorde hath cōmaunded habitacyon wt tente therof coueryng rynges boordes barres pyllers socket arke staues therof mercyseate vayle couereth table barres vessel shewbread cādelstycke lyght apparell lampes oyle lyght sence aulter barres anoyntynge oyle swete sence hangynge dore entryng tabernacle aulter burntsacrifice brasen gredyren staues vessel lauer fote hangynges courte pyllers theyr sockettes hangynge dore courte pynnes habitacyon pynnes courte wt theyr cordes ministrynge garmentes minystre holy place holy vestimentes aaron preest vestimentes sonnes maye ministre companye chyldren israel departed presence moses euery one came many theyr hertꝭ couraged many theyr spirites made wyllyng brought present lorde makynge tabernacle wytnesse al v holy vestimentes came bothe men woman euen many wyllyng herted brought bracelettes earynges cheynes whiche iewels golde▪ al men brought waueofferyng golde vnto lorde euery man foūde yelow sylke purple scarlet whyte sylke gootes heere red skynnes rammes tarus skynnes brought al dyd heaue vp oblacyon golde brasse brought heaueofferynge vnto lorde al men found sethim wod maner worke ministracyō brought al woman wyse herted dyd spyn theyr handꝭ brought spon worke bothe yelow sylke purple scarlet whyte sylke woman theyr owne herte moued span gootes heete wysely lordes brought onix stone stone set ephod brestlap spyce oyle lyght anoyntyng oyle swete sence chyldrē israel brought wyllyng offeryng vnto lorde men woman many wyllyng hertes bryng maner workes whiche lorde cō maunded made hande moses moses sayd vnto chyldren israel beholde exodi 32▪ • lorde hath called name bezaleel sonne ury son hur trybe iuda hath fylled hym spirite god wysdome vnderstandyng knowledge maner worke fynde curyous workes made gold syluer brasse crafte stone set caruyng wood make maner subtyll worke hath put herte ☞ may teache ahaliab son ahisamach trybe dan hath fylled wysdome herte worke maner grauen subtyl nedle worke yelowe sylke purple scarlet whyte sylke weuyng maner worke subtyll feates ¶ thynges bezaleel ahaliab made capi xxxvi exod •• bezaleel wrought ahaliab wyse herted men whome lorde gaue wysdome vnderstandyng knowe howe worke maner worke seruyce sanctuarye lorde commaunded moses called bezaleel ahaliab al wyse herted men suche lorde gyuen wysdome vnto many theyr hertes couraged come vnto worke worke receyued moses al present whiche chyldren israel broughte worke seruyce sanctuarye make it▪ besyde brought gyftes vnto euery day mornynge wyse men wrought holy worke came euery man frō worke whiche made spake vnto moses saynge people brynge moche ynough seruyce worke whiche lorde hath commaunded made moses gaue cōmaundement caused proclaymed thorowout hoost saynge se neyther man woman prepare worke present sanctuary people forbydden bryng stuffe suffycyent worke make moche exodi 26 wyse harted men therfore wrought habitacyon made x curteynes whyte twyned sylke yelowe sylke purple scarlet ❀ pyctures brodered worke made lengthe one curteyne xxviii▪ cubytes bredth iiii curteynes one syse coupled fyue curteynes themselues fyue themselues made lowpes yelow sylke along edge one curteyne euen seluege couplyng curteyu likewyse made syde couplynge curteyne syde fyftye lowpes made one curteyne fyftye edge couplynge curteyne syde lowpes helde one curteyne made fyftie rynges golde coupled curteynes one rynges made one dwellyng place exodi 31 made eleuen curteynes gootes heere tente ouer tabernacle length curteyne thyrty cubytes foure cubytes brode eleuen one syse coupled fyue curteynes themselues syx themselues made l loupe alonge bordre vtmost couplynge curteyne fyftie edge couplynge curteyne ❀ myght ioyned togyther made l rynges brasse couple tent togyther myght one made couerynge vpon tent rammes skynnes red yet another taxus skynnes aboue 〈…〉 26 • made standynge bordes tabernacle sethym wood length boorde ten cubytes bredth one cubyte halfe one borde two fete wherby ioyned one thus made bordes tabernacle made twenty bordes south syde habitacyon fortye sockettes syluer vnder xx bordes▪ two sockettes vnder one borde two feete two sockettes vnder boorde two feete ❀ vvhere sockettes sydes ende corner syde dwellynge whiche towarde north made twentye boordes theyr fourtye sockettes syluer two sockettꝭ vnder one boorde two sockettes vnder towarde west ende tabernacle ❀ saye ende tabernacle vvhich enclyneth tovvarde see made vi boordes two boordes made corner habitacyon eyther syde ioyned close benethe aboue clampe thus dyd corner viii bordes xvi sockettes syluer vnder euery boorde two sockettes made barres sethim wood v boordes tabernacle one syde fyue boordes tabernacle syde fyue barres boordes habitacyon west ende ❀ tovvarde see made myddest barre shote thorowe boordes euen one ende ouerlayd bordes gold made theyr rynges golde thruste barres thorowe couered barre gold made hangyng yelowe sylke purple scarlet whyte twyned sylke euen wt pyctures made brod • red worke made ther vnto foure pyllers sithem woode ouerlayde golde theyr knoppes also golde cast foure sockettes syluer made hangynge tabernacle dore yelow sylke purple scarlet whyte twyned sylke nedle worke fyue pyllers theyr knops ouerlayde knoppes hoopes golde theyr fyue sockettes also brasse ¶ arke wytnesse mercyseate table candelstycke lyghtes aulter incence▪ capi xxxvii bezaleel made exodi 25 arke sethim woode two cubytes halfe long cubyte halfe brode cubite halfe hye ouerlayde wt fyne golde within without made crowne golde rounde aboute cast foure rynges golde foure corner two rynges one syde two made barres sethim wood couered golde put barres rynges alonge syde arke beare withall made mercyseate ❀ say god ansvveryng place pure golde two cubytꝭ halfe length therof one cubite halfe bredth made two cherubyns thycke golde vpon two endes mercyseate one cherub one ende cherub ende euen mercyseate made cherubyns namely endes therof cherubyns spred theyr wynges aboue hye couered mercyseate therwith theyr face one euen mercyseatewarde face cherubyns exodi 25 c made table sethym woode two cubytes length therof cubyte bredth cubyte halfe heyght ouerlayde fyne golde made therto crowne golde rounde aboute made therto hoope hande brede rounde aboute made vpon hoope crowne golde rounde aboute cast foure rynges golde put rynges foure corner iiii fere therof euen harde hoope rynges whiche barres put beare table withall made barres sethim wood couered golde beare table withall made vessel table pure golde dysshes spones flat peces pottes powre withall exodi 25 made candelstycke pure golde euen one pece made candelstycke fote shafte cuppes knops floures one pece syxe braunches procedyng sydes therof thre one syde thre one braunche iii cuppes made lyke vnto almondes knoppes floures braunche iii cuppes made lyke almondꝭ knoppes floures thorowout syxe braunches proceded candelstycke vpon candelstycke selfe foure cuppes facyon almondes knoppes floures vnder euery two braunches knop knoppes braunches proceded one pece pure thycke golde made seuen lampes tonges snoffers therof pure golde euen hūdred weyght pure gold made vessel therof made sence aulter sethim wood length cubyte bredth cubyte foure square two cubytes hye horne procedyng couered pure golde top sydes therof rounde aboute horne made vnto crowne golde rounde aboute made two rynges golde euen vnder crowne therof two corner two sydes therof put barres beare withall made barres sethim wood ouerlayde golde made holy anoyntyng oyle swete pure insence apotecaryes crafte ¶ aulter burntofferynges brasen lauer somme people offered capi xxxviii made burntoffryng exodi 〈◊〉 • aulter sethim wood v cubytes length therof v cubytes bredth euen iiii square iii cubytes hye made vnto horne iiii corner procedyng ouerlayde brasse made vessel aulter cauldron shouels basyns fleshe hokes cole pannes vessel therof made brasse made brasen gredyren networke vnto aulter rounde aboute alowe benethe vnto myddes aulter cast iiii rynges brasse iiii endes gredyren put barres made barres sethim wood couered brasse put barres rynges foure corner aulter beare withal made aulte • holowe within bordes made lauer brasse fote also brasse ❀ ☞ syghte theym dyd watche doore tabernacle wytnesse made courte south syde hangynges courte whyte twyned sylke hauynge hundred cubytes theyr pyllers twentye theyr brasen socket twentie knoppes pyllers theyr hoopes syluer north syde hangynges hundred cubytes theyr pyllers twentye theyr sockettes brasse twentye knoppes hoopes pyllers syluer west syde hangynges fyftye cubytes ten pyllers theyr ten sockettes ❀ brasse knoppes hoopes pyllers syluer toward east syde hangynges fyftye cubytes hanginges one syde gate fyftene cubytes longe thre pyllers thre sockettes syde courte gate hangynges also xv cubytes longe iii pyllers iii sockettes hangyngꝭ courte rounde whyte twyned sylke sockettꝭ pyllers brasse knoppes hoopes pyllers syluer coueryng heades syluer pyllers courte hooped aboute syluer hangynge gate courte nedleworke yelowe sylke purple scarlet whyte twyned sylke xx cubytes long fyue bredth ouer agaynst hangyngꝭ courte theyr pyllers iiii theyr iiii sockettꝭ brasse knoppes syluer heades ouer layde syluer hooped aboute syluer pynnes tabernacle courte rounde aboute brasse somme habitacyon wytnesse counted accordyng cōmaūdement moses offyce leuytꝭ hand ithamar son aarō preest bezaleel sonne uri son hur tribe iuda made al lorde cōmaūded moses hym ahaliab sonne ahisamach tribe dan connyng grauer worker nedleworke yelowe sylke purple scarlet white twyned sylke golde occupyed worke holy place golde waueofferyng euen xxix hū dred weyght seuen hundred xxx sicles accordyng sicle sanctuarye somme syluer came multitude v score hundred weyght thousande seuen hundred lxxv sicles sicle sanctuary euery mā halfe weyght euen halfe sicle sicle sanctuary wente nombred xx yere olde aboue euen vi hundred thousande iii thousande v hundred l men fyue score hundred weyght syluer cast sockettes sanctuary sockettes vayle hundred sockettes fyue score hundred weyght hundred weyght euery socket thousande vii hundred lxxv sicles made knoppes pyllers ouerlayde heades hooped ❀ vvith syluer brasse waueoffrynge lxx hundred weyght two thousand foure hundred sycles therwith made sockettes dore tabernacle wytnes brasen aulter brasen gredyren vessel aulter sokettes courte round aboute sokets courte gate al pynnes habitacyō al pynnes courte round aboute ¶ apparell aaron sonnes lorde comaunded offered capi xxxix yelowe sylke purple scarlet made vestimentes ministracyon seruyce holy place made holye garmentes aaron lorde cōmaunded moses made ephod golde yelowe sylke purple scarlet whyte twined sylke dyd beate golde thyn plate cut wyers worke yelowe sylke purple scarlet fyne whyte brodered worke made two sydes cloose vp ii edge broderyng gyrdell vpon stuffe worke golde yelowe sylke purple scarlet twyned whyte sylke lorde cōmaunded moses wrought onix stone closed ouches golde graued sygnettꝭ grauen name chyldrē israell put shoulder ephod shulde stoones remembraunce chyldren israel lorde cōmaunded moses made brestlap cōnyng worke lyke worke ephod euen gold yelow sylke purple scarlet twyned whyte sylke iiii square made brestlap double hande bredth long hande bredth brode fylled iiii rowes stone fyrst rowe sardios topas • r emeroude smaragdus seconde rowe • r carbuncle rubye saphyr diamonde iii • owe ligurios achet amatist fourth rowe turcas onir iaspis closed ouches golde theyr inclosers xii stone grauen sygnettes name chyldren israel euery stone name according xii tribe made vpon brestlap two fastenynge cheynes wrethen worke pure golde made two hooke golde two golde rynges put two rynges two corner brestlap put two cheynes golde two rynges corner brestlap two endes two cheynes fastened two hooke put shoulder ephod vppon fore front made two rynges golde put two corner brestlap vpon edge whiche insyde ephod made two golde rynges put two sydes ephod benethe fore syde ouer agaynst felowe aboue vpon brodryng ephod strayned brestlap rynges vnto rynges ephod lace yelowe sylke myght vpon brodryng ephod brestlap shuld loosed ephod lorde cōmaunded moses made tunycle vnto ephod wouen worke togyther yelowe sylke hole myddest tunycle coler partlet band rounde aboute coler shulde rent tunycle made hēmes wt pomegarnates yelowe sylke purple scarlet whyte twyned sylke made lytell belle pure golde put amonge pomegarnates rounde aboute vpon edge tunycle bel pomegarnate bell pomegarnate rounde aboute hemmes tunycle mynystre lorde cōmaunded moses made cote fyne whyte wouen worke aaron sonnes mytre fyne whyte goodly bonettes fyne whyte lynen breches twyned whyte gyrdle twyned whyte yelowe sylke purple scarlet euen nedle worke lorde commaunded moses made plate holy crowne fyne golde wrote vpon grauen worke holynesse lorde tyed vnto lace yelowe sylke fasten hye vpō mytre lorde cōmaunded moses thus worke habitacyon tabernacle wytnesse fynysshed chyldren israel dyd accordynge al lorde cōmaunded moses euen dyd brought habitacyon vnto moses tente apparell button bordes barres pyllers sockettes coueryng rammes skynnes read coueryng taxus skinnes hangyng vayle arke wytnesse barres therof mercyseate table vesselles therof shewbread pure candelstycke lampes therof euen lamppes prepared vesselles therof oyle lyght golden aulter anoyntyng oyle swete sence hangyng tabernacle doore brasen aulter gredyren brasse barres vessel lauer fote hanginges courte pyllers sockettes hangyng courte gate pynnes cordes vessell seruyce habitacyon tabernacle wytnesse ministryng vestimentes serue holy place holy vestimentes aaron preest sonnes raymentes ministre accordyng al lorde cōmaunded moses euen chyldren israel made worke moses behelde worke se done euen lorde commaunded euen done moses blessed ¶ tabernacle teared vp glory lorde appeareth clowde couerynge tabernacle capi xl lorde spake vnto moses sayenge fyrst day fyrst moneth shalte thou set vp habitacyon tabernacle wytnesse put therin arke witnesse couer arke vayle bryng table apparel accordyng order therof thou shalt bryng candelstycke lyght lampes set sence aulter golde arke wytnesse put hangynge dore habitaciō set burntoffrynge aulter dore habitacyon tabernacle wytnesse set lauer bytwene tabernacle wytnesse aulter put water therein make courte rounde aboute hang vp hangynge courte gate exodi • thou shalte take anoyntyng oyle anoynte habitacyon therin halowe vessel therof may holy thou shalte anoynte aulter burntoffryng al vessel sanctifie aulter maybe aulter moost holy thou shalte anoynte also lauer fote sanctifie thou shalte bryng aaron sonnes vnto dore tabernacle wytnesse wasshe water thou shalte put vpon aaron holy vestimentes anoynte hym sanctifie hym maye ministre vnto thou shalte bryng sonnes clothe garmentes anoynte thoyu dydest anoynte theyr father may ministre vnto theyr anoynting shalbe euerlasting preest hode vnto thorowout theyr generaciōs num • moses dyd accordyng lorde cōmaunded hym euen dyd thus tabernacle reared vp fyrste daye fyrste moneth seconde yere moses reared vp tabernacle fastened sockettes set vp bordes therof put barres reared vp pyllers spred abrode tent ouer habitacion put ☞ coueryng tent hye aboue lorde cōmaunded moses toke ☞ testimony put arke set barres arke put mercyseate hye vpon arke brought arke habitacyon hanged vp vayle couered arke wytnesse lorde cōmaunded moses put table tabernacle wytnes north syde habitacyon without vayle set bread order lorde euen lorde cōmaunded moses put candelstycke tabernacle wytnesse ouer agaynst table towarde south syde habitacion set vp lampes lorde lorde cōmaunded moses put golden aulter tabernacle wytnesse vayle brent swete sence theron lorde cōmaunded moses hanged vp hangyng dore habitacion set burntofferyng aulter entryng habitacion tabernacle wytnesse offred burntofferynges meatoffrynges theron lorde cō maunded moses • • 30 • set lauer bytwene tabernacle wytnesse aulter powred water therin wasshe withal moses aaron sonnes wasshed theyr handes theyr feete therat went tabernacle wytnes went aulter wasshed themselues lorde cō maūded moses reared vp court rounde aboute habitacyon aulter set vp hangyng courte gate moses finisshed worke •••• ix • cloude couered tabernacle wytnes glory lorde fylled habitacion moses coulde entre tabernacle wytnesse bycause clowde abode theron glory lorde fylled habitacyon cloude couered cloude taken vp habitacyon chyldren israel toke theyr iourneys thorowout theyr armyes cloude taken vp iourneyed tyll taken vp cloude lord vpon habitacion day fyre nyght syght house israel thorowout theyr armyes ¶ ende seconde boke moses called hebrue uelle schemoth latyn exodus ¶ thyrde boke moses called hebrue vaicrah latyn leuiticus ¶ order burntofferynge • capi primo lorde called moses spake vnto hym tabernacle wytnes sayengexodi 29 speake vnto chyldren israel thou shalte say vnto yf mā brynge sacrifice vnto lorde ye shall bryng sacrifice among cattel euen among ox shepe sacrifice burntofferynge let hym offre male ox without blemysshe bryng owne voluntary wyl vnto dore tabernacle wytnesse lorde shall put hande vpon heade burntsacrifice shal accepted hym attonement shall kyll calfe droue lorde preestes aaron sonnes shall brynge bloode sprynkle rounde aboute vpon aulter dore tabernacle wytnesse shall flay burntofferyng hewe hym peces sonnes aaron preest shal put fyre vpon aulter put wood vpon fyre preestes aaron sonnes shall lay partes euen heade fat vpon wood vpon fyre aulter inwardes legges therof shal wasshe water preest shall burne aulter may • burntsacrifice swete odoure vnto lorde yf sacrifice flockes namely shepe gootes let hym bryng male without blemysshe burntofferyng let hym kyll north syde aulter lorde preestes aaron sonnes shall sprynkle bloode rounde aboute vpon aulter shall cut peces euen heade fat preest shall put vpon wood lyeth vpon fyre aulter shall wasshe inwardes legges water preest shall bryng togyther burne vpon aulter burntofferyng swete sauoure vnto lorde burntofferyng sacrifice lorde foules shall brynge sacrifice curtyll doues yonge pygeons preest shal brynge vnto aulter▪ wryng necke sundre burne aulter bloode therof shal run oute syde aulter shall plucke away crop fethers fast besyde aulter east parte place asshes shall breake wynges plucke asundre preest shal burne vpon aulter euen vpon woode vpon fyre may burntsacrifice swete fauour vnto lorde ¶ order meate offerynges capi ii soule wyll offre meatoffcynge vnto lorde offrynge shall fyne floure shall powre oyle vpon put frankensence theron shall brynge vnto aaron sonnes preestes shall take therout handful floure oyle frankensence preest shall burne memorial hym vpon aulter offryng swete sauour vnto lorde remenaunt meatoffryng shal aaron sonnes thyng moost holy sacrifice lorde thou bryng also meatoffryng bakē ouen let swete cake fyne floure myngled oyle vnleuened wafer anoynted oyle thy meateofferyng baken fryeng pan shalbe swete floure myngled wt oyle thou shalt mynce smal powre oyle theron may meatofferyng yf thy meatofferynge athyng broyled vpon gredyron let floure myngled wt oyle thou shalte brynge meatoffryng made thynges vnto lorde shalte delyuer vnto preest may offre vpon aulter preest shall take meatoffrynge memoryall shall burne vpon aulter may burntofferynge swete sauoure vnto lorde whiche lefte meatofferyng shalbe aaron sonnes thyng moost holy offerynges lorde meatofferynges whiche ye shall bryng vnto lorde shall made without leuen ye shall neyther burne leuen hony offeryng lorde notwithstandynge ye shall brynge fyrstlynges vnto lorde shall come vpon aulter swete sauoure math v b mar ixi g collo iiii • meatofferynges shalte thou season salte neyther shalte thou suffre salt couenaūt thy god lacking thy meatofferynge vpon thyne offerynges thou shalte brynge salte yf thou offre meatofferynge thy fyrste rype fruytes vnto lorde thou shalte offre meatofferyng fyrst fruytes eares corne dryed fyre corne beaten meale thou shalte put oyle vpon lay frankensence theron may meatoffryng preest shal burne parte beaten corne parte oyle frankensence remembraunce shall sacrifice vnto lorde ¶ order peaceofferynges capi iii yf sacrifice peaceofferyng take among droues whyther male female shall brynge moche without blemysshe lorde put hande vpon heade offerynge kyll dore tabernacle wytnesse aaron sonnes preestes shall sprynkle bloode vpon aulter rounde aboute shall offre somwhat peaceofferynge sacrifice vnto lorde euen 〈…〉 fat couereth inwardes fat aboute inwardes two kydneys fat vpon loynes abundaunce lyuer shall take awaye kydneys aaron sonnꝭ shall burne aulter vpon burntsacrifice whiche vpon wood fyre burntsacrifice swete sauour vnto lorde brynge peaceofferynge vnto lorde flocke let hym offre male female without blemysshe yf offre shepe sacrifice shall brynge lorde put haude vpon offerynges heade kyll dore tabernacle wytnesse aaron sonnes shal sprynkle blood therof rounde aboute aulter peaceofferyng let hym brynge sacrifice vnto lorde fat therof rompe togyther shal take harde backe bone fat couereth inwardes fat vpon inwardes two kydneys fat vpon vpon loynes abundaunce vpon lyuer shal take away kydneys preest shall burne vpon aulter foode sacrifice vnto lorde offeryng goote shall bryng lorde put hande vpon heade kyll tabernacle couenaunt sonnꝭ aaron shall sprynkle blood therof vpon aulter rounde aboute shall brynge therof offerynge euen sacrifyce vnto lorde fatte couereth inwardes fat vpon inwardes two kydneyes fat vpon vpon loynes abundaūce vpon lyuer shall take awaye kydneyes preest shall burne vpon aulter food sacrifyce fat maye swete sauour vnto lorde let perpetuall statute youre generacyons thorowout youre dwellynges ye eate neyther fat •• nt • • eni 17 • 〈◊〉 xix • bloode ¶ offerynge made synnes done ignoraunce capi iiii lorde spake vnto moses sayenge speake vnto chyldren israell saye yf soule synne thorow ygnoraunce hath done thyngꝭ whiche lorde hath forbydden cō maundementes done yf preest anoynted syn ❀ accordyng synne people let hym brynge synne whiche hath synned yonge oxe without blemysh vnto lorde synneofferynge shall brynge yonge oxe vnto dore tabernacle wytnesse lorde shall put hande vpon yonge oxe heade kyll yonge oxe lorde preest anoynted ••• iti ix • shal take yonge oxe bloode brynge tabernacle wytnesse preest shal dyp fynger bloode sprynkle therof vii tymes lorde euen hangynge holy place shall put bloode lorde vpon horne aulter swete sence whiche tabernacle wytnesse shall powre bloode yonge oxe vnto botome aulter burntofferynge whiche dore tabernacle wytnesse shall take away al fat oxe synne fat couereth inwardes fat aboute inwardes two kydneyes fat vpon vpon loynes aboundaunce lyuer shall take awaye kydneyes taken awaye oxe peaceofferynges let preest burne vpon aulter burntofferynge •• 29 • skynne yonge oxe al fleshe heade legges inwardes donge shall beare cary yonge oxe altogyther hooste vnto clene place euen asshes powred burne hym wood fyre euen place asshes cast shall burnte yf hole congregacyon israell syn thorow ygnoraunce thynge hyd theyr eye haue cōmytted thynges whiche lorde hath forbydden done cōmaundementes haue offended synne whiche haue synned knowen congregacyon shal brynge yonge oxe synne brynge hym tabernacle wytnesse elder multytude shall put theyr handes vpon heade yonge oxe lorde yonge oxe shall slayne lorde preest anoynted shal bryng bloode tabernacle wytnesse preest shall dyppe fynger bloode sprynkle seuen tymes lorde euen vayle shall put blode vpon horne aulter whiche lorde tabernacle wytnesse shall powre blood vnto botome aulter burntofferynge whiche dore tabernacle wytnesse shall take fatte hym burne vpon aulter shall yonge oxe dyd yonge oxe synne euen shall doo preest shall make attonement shall forgyuen shall brynge yonge oxe without hoost burne burneth fyrst oblacyon syn congregacyon lorde synneth commytteth thorowe ygnoraunce anye thynges whiche lorde god hath forbydden done cōmaundementes hath offended yf synne shewed vnto hym whiche hath done shall brynge offerynge euen goote without blemysshe laye hande vpon heade goote kyll place burntofferynge vsed kylled lorde synofferynge let preest take bloode offerynge fynger put vpon horne burntofferynge aulter powre bloode vnto botome burntofferynge aulter burne al fatte vpon aulter fat peaceofferynges preest shall make attonement hym concernynge syn shalbe gyuen hym yf one comen peple lande synne thorowe ygnoraunce commyt thynges lorde hath forbydden commaundementes done hath trespassed yf syn whiche hath synned come knowledge shall brynge offeryng goote frō among flockes without blemyshe syn whiche hath synned laye hande vpon heade offeryng slee place burntofferinges leuiti iii • preest shall take bloode therof fynger put vpon horne burntofferynge aulter powre al bloode vnto botome aulter shall take awaye fat fat peaceofferynges taken away preest shal burne vpō aulter may swete sauour vnto lorde preest shal make attonement hym shalbe forgyuen hym yf brynge shepe synne offeryng shal brynge female without blemyshe laye hande vpon heade offeryng slee synofferynge place kyll burntofferyng preest shall take bloode offerynge fynger put vpon horne burntofferyng aulter shal powre bloode therof vnto botome aulter leuiti iii shall take awaye fat therof fat shepe peace offerynge wont taken away preest shall burne vpon aulter may lordes burntsacrifyce preest shal make attonement synne hath cōmytted shall forgyuen hym ¶ othes • lmsynge hym toucheth vncleane thynges purga • yon othe synne done ignoraunce capi v yf soule synne heare voyce swearynge wytnesse whyther hath sene knowne yf haue vttered shall beare fyn eyther yf ☞ soule touche vncleane thynge whyther caryō vncleane beast vncleane cattel vncleane worme ware beholde vncleane hath offended eyther yf touche vnclennesse man whatsoeuer vnclennesse man wont defyled withall ware cōmeth knowledge hath trespased eyther yf soule sweare pronoūceth wt lyppes euyll good soeuer man vseth pronounce wt othe thyng hyd hym cōmeth knowledge hath offended one shall come passe hath syūed one thynges shall cōfesse hath synned thynge therfore shall brynge trespaceofferynge vnto lorde syn whiche hath synned female flocke lambe goote synneofferynge preest shall make attonement hym concernynge synne leutti 〈◊〉 lu • e▪ 〈◊〉 ▪ • yf able brynge suche shepe shall brynge trespace whiche hath synned two turtyl doues two yonge pygeons vnto lorde one synneofferyng burntofferynge shall brynge vnto preest shal offer synneofferyng fyrst wrynge necke sundre plucke clene shall sprynkle bloode synneofferynge vpon syde aulter reste bloode shall powre botome aulter synneofferynge shall offer seconde burntofferynge maner shall preest make attonement hym synne whiche hath synned shal forgyuen hym yf able brynge two turtyll doues two yonge pygeons hath synned shall brynge offerynge tenth parte epha fyne floure synofferyng put noone oyle therto neyther put frankensence theron synneofferynge let preest offre preest shal take handfull remembraunce therof burne vpon aulter sacrifyce lorde synneofferynge preest shall make attonement hym touchynge synne hath synned one shalbe forgyuen remenaunt shalbe preestes meatofferyng lorde spake vnto moses sayenge yf soule trespace synne thorowe ygnoraunce thynges consecrated vnto lorde let hym bryng trespace vnto lorde ram without blemysshe flockes valued money two sycles 〈…〉 sycle sanctuary may trespaceofferynge shal make amendes harme hath done holy thynge let hym put fyfte parte therto gyue vnto preest preest shall make attonement hym ram trespace shall forgyuen hym yf soule synne commyt thynges whiche forbydden done commaundementes lorde wyst hath offended shall beare synne shall brynge ram without blemyshe flocke estemed worth trespace offeryng vnto preest preest shall make attonement hym concernyng ygnoraunce wherin erred ware shall forgyuen hym trespaceofferynge ❀ whiche offered vnto lorde trespace ¶ offerynges synnes wyllyngly done lawe burntofferynges fy • e must atyde euermore vpon aulter offerynges aaron sonnes capi vi lorde spake vnto moses sayenge yf soule synne trespace agaynst lorde denye vnto neyghbour taken hym kepe put hande doth violent robbery wronge vnto neyghbour yf haue founde whiche loste denyeth sweareth falsely vpon whatsoeuer thyng man doth synneth therin yf haue synned trespaced shall restore agayne toke violently away wronge dyd whiche delyuered hym kepe loste thynge whiche founde aboute whiche hath sworne falsely shall restore agayne hoole somme shall adde fyfte parte moore therto gyue vnto hym whome perteyneth daye offereth trespace let hym brynge trespace vnto lorde ram without blemyshe flocke estemed worth trespaceofferyng vnto preest preest shall make attonement hym lorde shall forgyuen hym soeuer thynge hath done trespaced therin lord spake vnto moses sayenge commaunde aaron sonnes saynge lawe burntofferynge exod 29 g burntofferynge shall vpon harth aulter nyght vnto mornynge fyre shall kyndled aulter preest shall put exodi 28 g lynnen albe lynnen breches vpon flesshe take awaye asshes vpon whiche fyre consumed burntsacrifyce aulter shall put besyde aulter put tayment put carye asshes without hooste vnto cleane place fyre vpon aulter shall burne styll neuer put preest shall laye wood 〈◊〉 euery day mornynge put burntsacrifyce vppon shall burne theron fatte peaceofferynges fyre shall euer burne vpon aulter neuer go num xv leuiti 〈◊〉 lawe minha meatofferynge aaron sonnes shall brynge lorde euen aulter one shal take handefull floure meatofferynge oyle frankensence whiche vpon meatofferynge shall burne vnto remembraunce vpon aulter aswete sauoure euen memoryall vnto lorde reste therof shall aaron sonnes eate vnleuened shal eaten holye place euen courte tabernacle wytnesse shal eate shal baken leuen haue gyuen vnto theyr porcyon sacrifyces moost holye synneofferynge trespaceofferynge male amonge chyldren aaron shall eate shalbe statute euer youre generacyons concernynge sacrifyces lorde ☞ let euery one toucheth holye lorde spake vnto moses saynge offeryng aaron sonnes whiche shall offer vnto lorde daye anoynted tenth parte epha floure meatofferyng perpetuall halfe mornyng halfe nyght frienge pan shalbe made oyle fryed thou shalt brynge baken offerynges oblacyon mynsed smal shalte thou offer sweee sauour vnto lorde preest sonnes anoynted steade shall offer lordes dutye euer shalbe burnt togyther euery meatofferyng made preest shall burnt togyther shal eaten lorde spake vnto moses saynge speake vnto aaron vnto sonnes saye lawe synneofferyng place burntofferynge kylled shall synne offerynge kylled lorde ☞ moost holy preest offereth shall eate holy place shal eaten euen courte tabernacle wytnesse man touche fleshe therof sane halowed sprinkleth blood therof vpon garment ☞ thou shalt washe holy place sprinkled vpōleuiti xv b osee iiii b earthen potte soden shall brokē yf soden brasen pot shalbe scowred rinsed water male amonge preestes shall cate therof moost holye synne offerynge whose blood brought tabernacle wytnesse reconcyle withall holy place shalbe eaten shalbe burnt fyre ¶ trespaceofferynges synofferynges peaceofferynges • bloode may eaten capi vii lawe trespaceofferynge moost holye place kyll burntofferyng shal kyll trespaceofferynge also bloode shall sprynkle rounde aboute vpon aulter fat therof shall offre rumpe fatte therof couereth inwardes two kydneys fat vpō loynes aboundaunce lyuer shalte thou take away kidney preest shall burne vpon aulter sacrifyce vnto lorde trespace offeryng al male among preesteshal eate therof holye place moost holye synneofferyng trespaceofferyng one lawe serueth shall preestes reconcyleth therwith preest offereth man burntofferynge ☞ shall haue skynne burntofferynge whiche hath offered meatofferynge baken ouen dressed vpon gredyren fryenge pan shall preestes offereth euery meatofferyng myngled oyle drye shall perteyne vnto sonnes aaron one shall haue muche another lawe peaceofferyng offered vnto lorde yf offre gyue thankꝭ shal brynge vnto thanke offerynge swete cake myngled oyle swete wafer anoynted oyle cake myngled oyle fyne flour fryed shall brynge offeryng vpon cake leuended breade peaceofferyngꝭ gyue thankes sacrifyce shal offre one heueofferyng vnto lorde shall preestes sprynkled bloode peaceofferynges fleshe thankeofferyng peaceofferyngꝭ shalbe eaten daye offered let hym laye vp nothyng vntyll morowe yf offre sacrifyce reason vowe owne frewyll shall eaten day offereth sacrifyce yf ought remayne vntyl morowe maye eaten asmoche offered flesshe remayneth vnto thyrde daye shall burnt fyre yf flesshe peaceofferynges eaten thyrde daye shall offereth obteyne fauour ☞ neyther shal rekened vnto hym shal abhominacion therfore soule eateth ☞ shall beare synne flesshe toucheth vnclene thyng shal eaten burnt fyre cleane shall eate flesshe yf soule eate flesh peace offerynge perteyneth vnto lorde hauynge vnclennesse vpon hym soule shall perysshe among people moreouer soule doeth touche vncleane thynge vnclennes man vncleane beast abhominacyon vncleane eate flesshe peaceofferynge whiche perteyneth vnto lorde soule shall peryshe people lorde spake vnto moses sayenge speake vnto chyldren israel saye leuit 〈…〉 ye shall eate maner fat ox shepe gootes neuerthelatter fat beaste dyeth alone fat torne wylde beastes shall occupyed maner vse ye shal wyse eate whosoeuer eateth fat beast whiche men vse bryng offryng vnto lorde soule eateth shal peresh people moreouer ye gent 〈…〉 leuit 〈…〉 • • • deut 〈…〉 • •• shall eate maner bloode whyther fowle beaste whatsoeuer soule eateth▪ maner bloode soule shall perysshe people lorde talked moses sayenge speake vnto chyldren israel say bryngeth peaceofferynge vnto lorde let hym brynge gyfte vnto lorde peaceofferyng let owne handes brynge offerynges lorde euen fatte brest shall brynge brest maye waued waueofferynge lorde preest shall burne fat vpon aulter brest shall aaron sonnes ryght shoulder shall ye gyue vnto preest heueofferyng peace offeryngꝭ offereth blode peace offerynges fat amonge sonnes aaron shal haue ryght shoulder parte num 〈…〉 wauebrest haueshoulder haue taken chyldren israel euen theyr peaceofferynges haue gyuen vnto aaron vnto sonnes statute euer chyldrē israel anoyntynge aaron anoyntynge sonnes sacrifyces lorde daye offered preestes vnto lorde sacrifyces whiche lorde cōmaunded gyuen day theyr anoyntynge chyldren israel statute euer theyr generacyons law burntofferynge meateofferynge sacrifyce synne trespace consecracyon peaceofferyng whiche lorde cōmaunded moses mounte sinay cōmaunded chyldren israel offre theyr sacrifyces vnto lorde wyldernesse sinay ¶ anoyntynge aaron sonnes capi viii lorde spake vnto moses sayenge take exodi 28 aaron sonnꝭ hym vesture anoyntynge oyle yonge oxe synne two rammes basket swete bread gather thou al congregacyon togyther vnto dore tabernacle wytnesse moses dyd lorde cōmaunded hym people gathered togyther vnto dore tabernacle wytnesse moses sayde vnto congregacyon thynge whiche lorde cō maunded done moses brought aaron sonnes wasshed water put vpon hym albe gyrded hym gyrdle put vpon hym tunycle ❀ yelovve sylke put ephod theron whiche gyrded brodered gyrdell ephod bounde vnto hym therwith put brestlap theron put brestlap vrim thumim put mytre vpon head put vpō myter euen vpō forefront face golden plate holy crowne lord cōmaūded moses exod xxx moses toke anoyntyng oyle anoynted tabernacle therin sanctifyed sprynkled therof vpon aulter seuen tymes anoynted aulter al vessel lauer fote sanctyfy ❀ vvith oyle powred anoyntyng oyle vpon aaron heade anoynted hym sanctifye moses brought aaron sonnes put albes vpon gyrded gyrdels put bonettes vpon theyr heades lorde cō maunded moses exodi 29 • brought yonge oxe synne aaron sonnes put theyr handꝭ vpon head yonge oxe synne moses slewe hym toke bloode whiche put vpon horne aulter rounde aboute fynger ☞ purifyed powred bloode vnto botome aulter sanctified ☞ reconcyled toke fat vpon inwardꝭ aboundaunce lyuer two kydneyes theyr fat moses burned vpon aulter yonge oxe hyde fleshe dong burnt fyre without hoost lorde cōmaunded moses brought ram burnt offeryng aaron sonnes put theyr handes vpon head ram moses kylled sprynkled bloode vpon aulter roūde aboute moses cut ram peces burnt heade peces fatte wasshed inwardes legges water moses burnte ram euery whyt vpon aulter burntsacryfyce myght swete sauoure offerynge vnto lorde lorde commaūded moses exodi 29 • brought ram namely ram consecracion ❀ preestes aaron sonnes put theyr handes vpō head ram moses slewe toke bloode put vpon typpe aaron ryght eare vpon thombe ryght hand vpon greate ryght foote moses brought aaron sonnes put bloode ❀ ram typpe ryght eare vpon thombes theyr ryght handes vpon greate tooes theyr ryght feete moses sprynkled bloode vpon aulter rounde aboute exodi 29 • toke fat rumpe fat vpon inwardes aboundaunce lyuer two kydneyes theyr fat ryght shoulder basket swete bread lorde toke one swete cake oyled bread one wafer put fat vpon ryght shoulder put togyther vpon aaron handes vpon sonnes handes waued waueofferyng lorde moses toke theyr handes burnt vpon aulter euen vpō burntofferyng aulter sacrifyce consecracyon swete sauour sacrifyce vnto lorde exodi 29 • moses toke breest waued waueofferynge lorde • consecracyō moses parte lorde cōmaūded moses moses toke anoyntynge oyle bloode vpon aulter sprynkled vpon aaron vpō vestimentes vpon sonnes sonnes vestimentes hym sanctifyed aaron vesture sonnes sonnes vesture hym moses sayde vnto aaron sonnes boyle flesshe dore tabernacle wytnes exodi 29 f eate breade basket consecracyon cōmaunded sayenge aaron sonnes shall eate whiche remayneth breade shal ye burne wt fyre ye shall departe dore tabernacle wytnesse vii dayes vntyll dayes cōsecracion ende seuen dayes shall fyll hande dyd daye euen lorde hath commaunded reconcyle withall therfore shall ye abyde dore tabernacle wytnesse daye nyght seuen dayes long kepe watch lorde ye shall dye cōmaunded aaron sonnes dyd thyngꝭ whiche lorde cōmaūded ☞ hande moses ¶ fyrst offerynges aaron aaron blesseth people glory lorde shewed capi ix fortuned eyght daye moses called aaron sonnes elder israell sayd vnto aaron take calfe yonge one droue ☞ syn ram burntofferynge bothe without blemysh bryng lorde vnto chyldren israell thou shalte speake sayenge take ye goote synne calfe lambe bothe two yeare olde without blemishe burntsacrifyce oxe ram peaceofferynges offre lorde meatofferyng myngled wt oyle daye lorde wyll appeare vnto brought whiche moses cōmaūded tabernacle wytnes congregacyon came stode lorde moses sayde thynge whiche lorde cōmaunded ye shulde glorye lorde shall appeare vnto hebre v vii moses sayde vnto aaron go vnto aulter offre thy sacrifyce synne thy burntofferyng make attonement people thou shalte offre offerynge people reconcyle lorde commaūded aarō therfore went vnto aulter slewe calfe syn ☞ sonnes aaron brought bloode vnto hym dypte fynger blode put vpon horne aulter powred blood vnto botom aulter fat two kydnyes abundaūce lyuer synofferynge burnt vpon aulter lorde cōmaunded moses flesshe hyde burnt fyre without hoost slewe burntofferyng leui 〈…〉 ☞ aaron sonnꝭ brought vnto hym bloode whiche sprynkled rounde aboute vpon aulter brought burntofferyng vnto peces therof heade burnt vpon aulter dyd wasshe inwardes legges burnt vpō burntofferyng aulter brought people offerynge takynge goote people sacrifyce syn slewe offered syn dyd fyrst brought burntofferynge offered maner leuiti 〈…〉 brought meatofferyng fylled hande therof burnt vpon aulter besyde burnt sacrifyce mornynge slewe also oxe ram peaceofferynge people selues aaron sonnes brought vnto hym bloode whiche sprynkled vpon aulter rounde aboute toke fatte oxe ram rump fat couereth inwardꝭ kydneyes aboundaunce lyuer put fat vpon brestes burnt fat vpon aulter brestes ryght shoulder aaron waued waueofferyng lorde lorde cōmaunded moses aaron lyfte vp hande ouer people blessed came downe offeryng synneofferynge burtofferyng peaceofferyngꝭ moses aaron went tabernacle wytnesse came blessed people glorye lorde appeared al people ii p • 〈◊〉 ii 〈…〉 came fyre lorde consumed vpon aulter burnt offeryng fat al people saw gaue thankes fell theyr face ¶ nadab abshu slayne israell mourneth preestes forbydden wyne capi x exodi 〈…〉 leuiit 〈…〉 nadab abihu sonnes aaron toke eyther sencer put fyre therin put sence vpon offered straunge fyre lorde exodi 〈…〉 cōmaūded went fyre lorde ☞ consumed dyed lorde moses sayde vnto aaron lorde spake sayenge wyll sanctifyed come nye people wyl glorified aaron helde peace moses called misaell elsaphan sonnes oziell vncle aaron sayde vnto come carye ☞ brother holy place hoost went caryed theyr albes hooste moses sayde moses sayde vnto aaron vnto eleazar ithamar sonnes deute 14 iere 16 b vncouer heades neyther rent clothes leest ye dye leest wrath come vpon al people let brother hole house israell bewepe burnynge whiche lorde hath kyndled go ye dore tabernacle wytnesse leest ye dye anointyng oyle god vpon dyd moses sayde lorde spake vnto aaron sayenge thou shalt drynke wyne stronge drynke thou thy sonnes ye go tabernacle wytnesse leest ye dye let lawe euer thorowout generacyons ye maye ❀ haue knovv ledge put dyfference bytwene holye vnholye bytwene cleane vncleane ye maye teache chyldren israell statute whiche lorde hathe spoken vnto hande moses moses sayde vnto aaron vnto eleazar ithamar sonnes lefte take meatofferynge remayneth sacrifyces lorde eate without leuen besyde aulter holy ye shall eate holy place bycause thy dutye thy sonnes dutye sacrifyces lorde commaunded wauebrest heueshoulder shall ye eate cleane place thou thy sonnes thy doughters thy dutye thy sonnes dutye gyuen peaceofferynges chyldren israell heueshoulder wauebrest shall brynge sacrifyces fat waue lorde shall thyne thy sonnes lawe euer lorde hath commaunded moses sought goote offered synne se burnt angrye eleazar ithamar sonnꝭ aarō left alyue saynge wherfore haue ye eaten synneofferynge holy place seyng moost holye god hath gyuen beare synne congregacyon make grement lorde beholde blood brought within holy place ye shulde haue eaten holye place cōmaunded aaron sayd vnto moses beholde day haue offered theyr synneofferyng theyr burntofferynge lorde ☞ chaūced maner yf eaten sacryfyce daye shulde haue bene accepted syght lorde moses herde content ¶ beastes cleane vncleane capi xi lorde spake vnto moses aaron sayd vnto speake vnto chyldren israell saye gene 7 deute 14 • actes • c beastes whiche ye shall eate amonge cattell earth whatsoeuer parteth hoofe deuideth two clawes choweth cud amonge beastes shall ye eate neuerthelesse shall ye eate chewe cud deuydeth hoofes camell choweth cud deuydeth hoofe therfore vncleane vnto euē cunnye choweth cud deuydeth hoofe vncleane hare though chowe cud yet bycause deuydeth hoofe therfore vncleane agayne swine though deuyde hoofe two clowes yet choweth cud vncleane theyr flesshe shall ye eate theyr carkasses shal ye touche let vncleane shall ye eate water soeuer hath fynnes skales water see ryuers shall ye eate haue fynnes skales see ryuers moue lyue water let abhominacyon vnto ye shall eate theyr flesshe abhorre theyr carkasses let haue fynnes skales water abhominable vn ye shall abhorre amonge fowles ought eaten abhominacyon egle goshawke cormoraūt uultur kyte kynd al rauens theyr kynde estrich nyght crowe coockowe owle kynde falcon storke great owle backe pellicane pye heron ioye kynde lapwynge swalowe let fowles creepe go vpon foure abhominaciō vnto yet may ye eate euery creping thyng hath wynges go vpon foure fete euen haue knee aboue vpō theyr fete leape withall vpon earth euen ye maye eate ☞ brachus arbe kynde scatairus selaam kynde locusta hargol kynde • achus hagab kynde fowles moue haue foure fete shall abhominacyon vnto suche ye vncleane soeuer toucheth carkas shall vncleane vnto euen soeuer beareth carkas shall washe clothes vncleane vntyll euen euery beast hath hoofe deuideth two clowes choweth cud vncleane vnto euery one toucheth shall vncleane soeuer goeth vpon handes among maner beastes go foure feete suche vncleane vnto doeth touche theyr carkas leuiti v ••• r ii c shalbe vncleane vntyl euen beareth carkas shall wasshe clothes vncleane vntyll euen suche vncleane vnto let also vncleane amonge thynges crepe vpō earth weysell mowse toode theyr kynde hedgehog stellio lycerte snayle molle vncleane amonge crepe soeuer dothe touche deade shalbe vncleane vntyl euen soeuer dead carkasses doeth fall vpon shalbe vncleane whyther vessel wood rayment skyn bagge soeuer vessell anye worke wrought muste piunged water shalbe vncleane vntyl euen shall clensed maner carthen vessel wherin falleth shalbe vncleane al therin leuiti vi xv b shal broken maner meate also vsed eaten ☞ yf water come vpon shalbe vncleane al maner drynk vsed dronk maner suche vessel shalbe vncleane euery thynge theyr carkas falleth vpon shalbe vncleane whyther ouen kettel let broken vncleane shalbe vncleane vnto neuer latter yet fountaynes welles collection water shalbe cleane styll toucheth theyr carkas shall vncleane yf deade carkas suche fall vpon seede vsed sowen shall yet cleane styll yf water powred vpon seede deade carkas fall theron shalbe vncleane vnto beast whiche ye maye eate dye man touch deade carkas therof shalbe vncleane vntyl euen eateth dead carkas shal wasshe clothes vncleane vntyll euen also beareth carkas shal wasshe clothes vncleane vntyll euen let euery crepynge thynge crepeth vpon earth abhominacion eaten soeuer goeth vpon brest soeuer goeth vpon foure hath mo feete amonge crepynge thynges crepe vpō earth se ye eate abhomynable ye shal make soules abhominable thynge crepeth neyther make selues vncleane ye shulde defyled therby lorde god sanctifyed therfore ye shalbe holy leuiti 〈◊〉 ▪ • peter •• holye ye shal defyle soules maner crepynge thyng crepeth vpon earth lorde brought land egypt god ye shalbe holye therfore holye lawe beastes fowles euery lyuyng creature moueth water euery creature crepeth vpon earth dyfference bytwene vncleane cleane bytwene beast maye eaten beast ought eaten ¶ lawe howe woman shulde pourged theyr deliueraunce capi xii lorde spake vnto moses sayenge speake vnto chyldren israel say yf woman hath conceyued borne manchylde shall vncleane seuen dayes euen lyke maner put parte tyme ☞ •• ural dysease eyght day flesshe chyldes gene 17 • • xi luke ••• foreskynne shalbe cut away shall contynue bloode purifyenge thre thyrtye dayes shall touche halowed thynge come sanctuary vntyll tyme purifyenge beare mayde chylde shall vncleane two wekes hath naturall dysease shall contynue bloode purifyenge thre score sixe dayes luke 〈…〉 dayes purifieng whyther sonne doughter shall brynge lambe one yere olde burntoffryng yonge pygeon turtle doue synne vnto dore tabernacle wytnesse vnto preest whiche shall offre lorde make attonement shall pourged yssue blood 〈…〉 iff v b lawe hath borne male female yf able brynge lambe shall brynge •• ke •• ii two turtle two yonge pygeons one burntofferynge synne preest shall make attonemente shall cleane ¶ preestes must iudge leper capi xiii lorde spake vnto moses aaron sayeng appeareth rysynge man flesshe eyther scab glystrynge whyte plage leprosye skyn fleshe shalbe brought vnto aaron preest vnto one sonnes preestes preest shal loke sore skyn flesshe heere sore turned vnto whyte sore also seme lower skyn flesshe wyll plage leprosye preest shall loke hym iudge hym vncleane whyte specke skyn flesshe seme lower skynne heere therof tourned vnto whyte preest shal shut hym vp vii dayes preest shall loke vpon hym agayne seuēth day yf plage seme hym abyde styll plage growe skyn preest shall shut hym vp yet seuen dayes moo preest shall loke hym agayne seuenth day yf plage darker growen skynne preest shall iudge hym cleane scurffe shal washe clothes cleane yf scab grow skyn sene preest iudged cleane shall sene preest agayne yf preest se scabbe growne abrode skynne ☞ preest shall make hym vncleane leprosye plage leprosye man shall brought vnto preest preest shall se hym yf rysynge whyte skyn haue made heere whyte rawe flesshe soore wyll olde leprosye skyn flesshe preest shall make hym vncleane shall shut hym vp seynge vnclene leprosye breake abrode skyn couer skyn heade foore soeuer preest loketh preest loke vpon hym yf leprosye haue couered flesshe shal iudge plage cleane bycause turned whytnesse shall cleane yf rawe fleshe hym whē sene shall vncleane preest shall se rawe flesshe declare hym vnclene rawe flesh vncleane seynge leprosye yf rawe flesshe depart agayne chaunge vnto whyte shall come preest preest shall se hym beholde sore chaunged vnto whyte ❀ couer hole man preest shall iudge plage cleane shall cleane flesshe also whose skynne byle healed place byle appeare whyte rysynge eyther shynyng whyte somwhat reddyshe shalbe sene preest yf preest seeth hym appeare lower skynne heere therof chaūged vnto whyte preest shal iudge hym vncleane place leprosye broken byle yf preest loke whyte heeres therin yf lower skynne darker preest shal shut hym vp seuen dayes yf spreade abrode flesshe ☞ preest shall make hym vncleane seyng plage yf spot stande styll growe prynte hoote byle therfore preest shall declare hym cleane flesshe whose skynne hoote burnyng flesshe burneth haue whyte spotte somwhat reddysshe whyte preest shal loke vpon yf heere bryght spot chaū ged whyte appeare lower skynne leprosye broken burnynge therfore preest shall iudge hym vncleane seynge plage leprosye yf preest loke whyte heere bryght spot lower skynne barker preest shal shut hym vp seuen dayes preest shall loke hym seuenth daye yf growen abrode skyn preest shall iudge hym vncleane seyng plage leprosye yf spot stand styll growe skynne darke rysynge burnynge preest shall therfore declare hym cleane seynge prynte burnynge man woman hath sore vpon heade beerde preest shall se yf appeare lower skyn yelowe heere thyn ❀ vvas vvont preest shal iudge hym vncleane sayenge fretynge token leprosy vpon head beerde yf preest loke sore prynt seme lower skyn heere blacke ☞ preest shall shut vp fretyng sore seuen dayes seuenth daye preest shall loke sore yf sore growen yelowe heere sore seme lower skyn shalbe shauē place sore shall shaue preest shal shut vp sore seuen dayes moo seuenth day preest shal loke sore yf sore growen skyn seme lower skyn preest shall clense hym shal washe clothes clene yf sore growe fleshe clensyng preest shal loke yf sore growen skyn preest shal seke yelowe heere vnclene yf se prynt stand styll blacke heere growne vp therin sore healed shall cleane preest shall declare hym cleane whyte spottes skyn flesshe mā woman preest shal loke vpon yf spottes skyn theyr flesshe somwhat darke whyte withal ❀ may sure leprosye frekell growynge flesshe therfore cleane man whose heade destitute heere wherby made balde cleane hath heere fallen foreheade foreheade balde cleane balde heade balde forehead whyte reddysshe sore scab leprosye spronge vp balde heade balde foreheade preest shall loke vpon hym yf rysynge soore whyte reddyshe balde heade balde forehead maner leprosye skynne flesshe leperous man vncleane preest shall make hym vncleane plage therof heed leper whome plage shall haue clothes rent head bare shall put couerynge vpon lyppe shall called vncleane defyled longe dysease lasteth vpon hym shalbe defyled vncleane shall dwel alone euen nume v 4 • e 15 without hoost shall habytacyon clothe plage leprosye whyther lynnen wollen whyther warpe woofe lynnen wollen eyther skyn thynge made skynne yf dysease pale somwhat reddysshe cloth skyn whyther warpe woofe thynge made skyn plage leprosye shall shewed vnto preest preest therfore shall se plage shut vp vii dayes loke plage seuenth day whiche yf increased clothe
