whyther warpe woofe skyn thynge made skyn leprosye fretynge sore vncleane clothe shalbe burnte eyther warpe woofe whyther wollen lynnen thynge made skynne wherin plage fretyng leprosye shall burnt fyre preest se plage growen cloth eyther warpe woofe soeuer thyng skyn preest shall cōmaunde wasshe thynge wherin plage shall shut vp seuen dayes moo preest shal loke plage agayne wasshed yf plage haue chaunged coloure spred abrode vncleane thou shalte burne fyre fret inwarde parte togyther yf preest se plage darker wasshed shall rent clothe skynne warpe woofe yf appeare cloth eyther warpe woofe thynge made skyn waxynge plage thou shalt burne plage moreouer clothe eyther warpe woofe soeuer thynge skyn whiche thou hast wasshed yf plage departed therfro shal wasshed agayne shall cleane lawe plage leprosye cloth whyther wollen lynnen eyther warp woofe thyng skynnes make cleane vncleane ¶ clensynge leper house capi xiiii lorde spake vnto moses sayenge 〈…〉 〈…〉 luke▪ • • 〈…〉 lawe leper day clensyng shalbe brought vnto preest preest shal go without hoost loke vpon hym yf plage leprosye healed leper shall preest cōmaunde whiche clensed bryng two lyuynge byrdes cleane cedar woode purple clothe ysope preest shall cōmaunde one byrdes kylled earthen vessell vpon runnynge water shall take lyuyng byrde cedar wood purple ysope shal dyp lyuyng byrde bloode slayne byrde vpō runnyng water sprynkle vpō hym must clensed leprosy seuen tymes clense hym shal let lyuynge byrde go free fylde clensed shall wasshe clothes shaue al heere wasshe hym selfe water may cleane shall come hoost shal tary without tente seuen dayes seuenth daye shall shaue heere namely heade beerde browes euen heere shal shauen shal wasshe clothes flesh water shalbe cleane viii day shal take ii lambes without blemysh ewe lambe yere olde without blemysshe thre tenthdeales fyne floure miuha meatoffryng myngled oyle ☞ log oyle preest maketh hym cleane shal bryng man made cleane thynges lorde euen dore tabernacle wytnesse preest shal take one lambe offre hym ☞ trespace log oyle waue lorde shal slee lambe place synofferyng burntoffryng slayne euen holy place synofferynge euen trespasse offeryng preestes seynge moost hooly preest shall take bloode trespaceofferyng put vpon typ ryght eare hym clensed vpon thombe ryghthande vpon greate ryght foote preest shal take logge oyle powre palme lefte hande dyppe ryght fynger oyle lefte hande sprynkle oyle fynger seuen tymes lorde reest oyle hande shall preest put vpon typ ryght eare clensed vpō thombe ryght hande vpon great ryght foote euen vpon bloode trespaceofferynge remenaunt oyle preestes hande shal powre vpon heade hym clensed preest shall make • tonement hym lorde preest shall offre synneofferyng make attonement hym clensed vnclennesse shall kyll burntoffryng preest shall offre burntoffryng meatofferyng vpon aulter preest shall make attonement hym shalbe cleane leui •• v • poore get moche shall take one lambe trespace offerynge waue clensynge tenthdeale fyne floure myngled oyle meatofferynge log oyle two turtle doues two yong pigeon suche able get wherof one shall synne burntoffryng shal bryng viii day clensyng vnto preest dore tabernacle wytnesse lorde preest shal take lambe trespace log oyle waue lorde shall kyll lambe trespace preest shall take bloode trespaceoffryng put vpon typ ryght eare clensed vpon thombe ryghte hande vpon great ryght foote preest shall powre oyle lefte hande preest shal fynger sprynkle oyle lefte hande seuen tymes lorde preest shall put oyle hande vpon typ ryght eare hym clensed vppon thombe right hande vpon ryght fote euen place bloode trespaceoffrynge put rest oyle preestes hande shall put vpon heade hym clensed may make attonement hym lorde shall offre one turtle doues yonge pygeons suche get one synofferynge burntofferynge meatofferynge preest shal make attonement hym clensed lorde lawe hym plage leprosy whose hande able get whiche perteyneth clensyng lorde spake vnto moses aaron sayenge ye come vnto lande canaan whiche gyue possessyon yf put plage leprosye house lande possessyon oweth house shall come tell preest sayenge thynke leprosye house preest shal cōmaunde empty house preest go se plage house made vncleane must preest go se house preest also se plage walles house holowe strake pale red whiche seme lower thē wal selfe preest shall go house dores shut vp house seuen dayes preest shall come agayne seuenth day yf se plage increased walles house preest shal cōmaunde take away stone plage let cast foule place without cytie shall cōmaunde house scraped within round aboute powre dust scraped without citye foule place shall take stone put place stone morter plaster house withal yf plage come agayn breke house hath taken away stone scraped walles house hath plastered house anewe preest shall come se yf perceyue plage hath growne house freatynge leprosye house therfore vncleane shall breake downe house stone tymbre therof al morter house shall carye cytye vnto foule place moreouer goeth house whyle shutte vp shall vncleane vntyll euen slepeth house shal wasshe clothes lykewyse eateth house shall wasshe clothes yf preest come se plage hath spred house newe plastred preest shal iudge house cleane bycause plage healed let hym take clense house withall two byrdes cedar wood purple clothe ysope shall kyll one byrdes earthen vessell vpon runnyng water take cedar wood ysope purple lyuynge byrde dyp bloode slayne byrde runnynge water sprynkle house vii tymes clense house bloode byrde runnynge water lyuyng byrde cedar woode ysope purple clothe shall let lyuynge byrde flee towne brode feldes make attonemente house shall cleane lawe maner plage leprosye breakyng leprosye clothe house swellyng scab whyte blystre teache must made vncleane cleane lawe leprosye ¶ maner pourgynge vnclennesse bothe men woman capi xv lorde spake vnto moses aaron sayeng speake vnto chyldren israel say vnto soeuer hath runnyng yssue flesshe vncleane reason yssue shalbe token vnclennesse yssue vnclene fleshe run yf flesshe congele reason yssue vnclennes euery couche wheron lyeth hathe yssue vncleane euery thynge wheron sytteth vncleane soeuer toucheth couch shall wasshe clothes bathe hym selfe water vncleane vnto euen sytteth thynge wheron sat hath yssue shal wasshe clothes bathe hym selfe water vncleane vntyl euenynge toucheth flesshe hym hath yssue shall washe clothes bathe hym selfe water vncleane vnto euen also hath yssue spyt vpon hym cleane shall wasshe clothes bathe hym selfe water vncleane vnto euen horse harnesse soeuer rydeth vpon hath yssue shall vncleane soeuer toucheth thynge vnder hym shall vncleane vnto euen beareth suche thynges shal wasshe clothes bathe hym selfe water vncleane vnto euen soeuer toucheth hath yssue haue fyrst wasshed handes water shall wasshe clothes bathe hym selfe water vncleane vnto euen leuiti and▪ • vessel earth toucheth whiche hath yssue shal broken vessel wood shalbe rynsed water also hath yssue clen sed yssue shall nombre seuen dayes clensyng wasshe clothes bathe flesshe runnynge water shall cleane viii daye shall take hym two turtle doues two yonge pygeons come lorde vnto dore tabernacle wytnesse gyue vnto preest preest shall offre one synoffryng burntoffryng preest shall make attonement lord concernyng yssue man seede departe hym slepe shal wasshe flesshe water vncleane vntyll euen clothes al furres wherin suche seede slepe shalbe wasshed water vncleane vnto euen yf hath suche yssue seede lye woman shal bothe wasshe selues water vncleane vntyll euen woman natural course blood runne shalbe put aparte vii dayes soeuer toucheth shall vncleane vnto euen lyeth vpon tyme natural dysease shalbe vncleane lyke euery thyng also sytteth vpō vncleane soeuer toucheth bed shal wasshe clothes bathe hym selfe water vncleane vnto euen whosoeuer toucheth thyng sat vpon shall wasshe clothes bathe hym selfe water vncleane vnto euen whyther touche couche vessel wheron hath sytten shall vnclene vnto euen leuiti 1 •• • yf man lye vnclennes come vpon hym shall vncleane vii dayes couche wheron lyeth shalbe vncleane • eth ix • woman bloode runneth longe tyme tyme natural course yf runne beyonde natural co •• ese let al dayes yssue iudged vncleane euen dayes natural disease shall vncleane al couch wheron lyeth longe yssue lasteth shalbe couche whē hath naturall dysease whatsoeuer sytteth vpon shalbe vncleane vnclennesse put apart soeuer toucheth shalbe vncleane shal wasshe clothes bath hym selfe water vncleane vnto euen clēsed yssue shal counte vii dayes shalbe cleane viii daye shall take vnto two turtels two yong pygeons brynge vnto preest dore tabernacle wytnesse preest shal offre one synoffryng burntofferyng make attonement lorde cō cernyng yssue vnclēnes therfore shall ye seperate chyldren israel theyr vnclennesse dye theyr vnclennes yf defyle habytacyō amonge lawe hym hath runnyng yssue whose seede runneth hym slepe defyled therin naturall disease put parte whosoeuer hath runnynge yssue whyther man womā hym lyeth vncleane ¶ aaron must clensynge sanctuarye feast clensynge aaron cōfesseth synnes chyldren israell capi xvi lorde spake vnto moses leuiti x • death ii sonnes aaron offered lorde dyed sayd vnto moses speake vnto aaron thy brother come tymes holy place within vayle mercyseate whiche vpon arke dye wyll appeare 3 reg 8 • clowde vpon mercyseate thyng shall aaron come holy place euen bullocke ☞ synne ram burntoffrynge shall put holy lynnen albe vpon hym shall haue lynnen breche vpon flesshe shalbe gyrded lynnen gyrdle put lynnen mytre vpon heade holy garmentes therfore shal wasshe fleshe water doth put shall take multitude chyldren israel two gootes synne ram burntoffrynge aaron shall offre bullocke synne hebru • x • ☞ make attonement hym house shall take two gootes present lorde dore tabernacle wytnesse aaron shall cast lotte ouer two gootes one lot shalbe lorde scapegoote aaron shall brynge goote vpon whiche lordes lotte fell offre hym synne goote lot fell scape shall set alyue lorde reconcyle let hym go scape goote fre wyldernesse aaron shal offre bullocke synne reconcyle hym selfe house shall kyll bullocke synne shall take censer ful burnyng cole aulter lorde shall fyll handfull swete sence beaten smal bryng wtin vayle put sence vpon fyre lorde cloude sence may couer mercyseate vpon wytnesse dye hebr • ix b x • shal take bloode bullocke 〈1 page duplicate〉 〈1 page duplicate〉 sprynkle fynger vpon mercyseate eastwarde mercyseate shall sprynkle bloode fynger seuen tymes shall kyll goote people synneofferyng bryng bloode within vayle blood dyd blood bullocke sprynklyng vpon mercyseate mercyseate shall reconcyle holy place vnclennesses chyldren israel theyr trespaces theyr synnes shall tabernacle wytnesse set among euen among theyr vnclennesses luke let body tabernacle wytnesse goeth make attonement holy place vntyll come let hym make attonemente hym selfe houssholde multitude israel shall go vnto aulter lorde reconcyle vpon shall take blood bullocke blood goote put vpon horne aulter round aboute sprynkle blood vpon wt fynger seuen tymes clense halowe vnclennesses chyldren israel hath made ende reconcylynge holy place tabernacle wytnesse aulter shall brynge lyue goote aaron shall put bothe handes vpon head lyue goote confesse ouer hym myssededes chyldren israel theyr trespaces theyr synnꝭ puttyng vpon head goote sende hym away hande conuenyent man wyldernesse goote shal beare vpon hym theyr mysdedes vnto wyldernesse shall let goote go free wyldernesse aaron shal come tabernacle wytnes put lynnen clothes whiche put whē went holy place leaue let hym wasshe flesshe water holy place put owne rayment come offre burntoffryng burntoffring people make attonemente hymselfe people fat synnoffryng shal burne vpon aulter caryed forth goote ☞ zel shal wasshe clothes bathe fleshe water come hoost bullocke whiche synne goote synne whose blood brought clense holy place shall one cary without hoost burnt fyre theyr skynnes theyr flesshe theyr dong burneth shal washe clothes bathe flesshe water come hoost shalbe ordinaūce euer vnto tenth daye seuenth moneth ye ☞ humble soules worke whyther one youre selues straunger soiourneth amonge daye shall preest make attonemente clense ye may cleane al synnes lorde let sabboth rest vnto ye shall humble soules ordinaunce euer preest anoynted whose hande consecrated ministre father steade shall make attonement shall put lynnen clothes holy vestimentes reconcile holy sanctuary tabernacle wytnesse shall clense aulter make attonement preestes people congregacyon shalbe exod • euerlastyng ordinaunce vnto make attonement chyldren israel theyr synnes yere dyd lorde cōmaunded moses ¶ sacrifyce must brought dore tabernacle deuyls may offer capi xvii lorde spake vnto moses sayenge speake vnto aaron vnto sonnes vnto chyldren israel say vnto thing lorde hath charged saynge man soeuer house israel kylleth oxe lambe goote hooste kylleth oute hooste bryngeth vnto dore tabernacle wytnesse offre offrynge vnto lorde dwellyng place lorde bloode shall imputed vnto man thoughe shed bloode man shal roted amonge people wherfore chyldren israel bryng theyr offrynges offre wyde felde shulde bryng vnto lorde euen vnto dore tabernacle wytnesse preest offre peace offrynges vnto lord preest must sprynkle bloode vppon aulter lorde whiche dore tabernacle wytnesse burne fat swete sauoure vnto lorde let offre theyr offrynges vnto deuyls haue gone hoorynge shall ordinaunce euer vnto theyr generacyons thou shalte saye vnto soeuer man house israell straungers soiourne among offereth burtofferyng sacrifice bryngeth vnto dore tabernacle wytnesse offre vnto lorde man shal peryshe frō among people soeuer man house israel straungers soiourne among eateth maner bloode wyl set face agaynst soule eateth blood wyll destroy hym amonge people lyfe flesshe bloode haue gyuen vnto vpon aulter make attonement soules bloode shall make attonement soule therfore sayde vnto chyldren israell let soule eate blood neyther let straūger soiourneth amonge eate bloode souer man chyldren israel straungers soiurne among whiche hunteth catcheth beast foule may eatē let powre blood therof couer earth lyfe flesshe bloode therfore sayde vnto chyldren israel 〈◊〉 • • 〈◊〉 iii 〈◊〉 • viii • ye shal eate blood maner fleshe lyfe flesshe blood therof whosoeuer eateth shal perysshe euery soule eateth whiche dyed alone whiche torne wylde beastes whyther one youre selues straunger shall wasshe clothes bathe hym selfe water vncleane vnto euen shal cleane wasshe bathe fleshe shal bere syn ¶ degree kynred may marrye togyther capi xviii lorde spake vnto moses sayenge speake vnto chyldren israel say vnto lorde god doynges lande egypte wherin ye dwelte shal ye doynges lande canaan whyther wyll brynge shall ye neyther walke theyr ordynaunces iudgementes kepe ceremonyes walke therin lorde youre god ye shall kepe therfore myne ordynaunces iudgementes 〈◊〉 • • 〈◊〉 iii 〈◊〉 xx b whiche yf man shall lyue lorde se none go nyghest kynred vncouer theyr secretes lorde 〈◊〉 ix g 〈◊〉 22 c secretes thy father secretes thy mother shalt thou vncouer thy mother therfore shalt thou dyscouer secretꝭ deute 22 b xxvii c corin v secretes thy father wyfe shalt thou dyscouer thy father secretes deut 27 • reg 13 • thou shalt dyscouer preuyte thy syster doughter thy father thy mother whyther borne home without thou shalt vncouer secretes thy sonnes doughter thy doughters doughter thyne owne preuite thou shalt vncouer secretes thy father wyues doughter whiche begotten thy father thy syster thou shalt dyscouer secretes leui xx • thou shalt vncouer secretes thy father syster thy father nexte kynswoman thou shalt dyscouer secretes thy mother syster thy mother nexte kynswoman thou shalte vncouer secretes thy father brother thou shalte go wyfe thyne awnte thou shalte discouer secretes thy doughter lawe thy sonnes wyfe therfore shalt thou vncouer secretes leui x • • math 14 • thou vncouer secretes brother wyfe thy brother preuytye thou shalt discouer preuytes wyfe doughter neyther shalt thou take sonnes doughter doughters doughter vncouer theyr secretes nexte kyn wyckdnesse ••• e 29 • thou shalt take wyfe syster also vere thou woldest vncouer secretes longe lyueth leui xv e ezech 22 • thou shalte also go vnto woman vncouer preuitie long put parte vnclennesse leuit xx • ii reg xi • moreouer thou shalte lye thy neyghbours wyfe defyle seede thou shalte also gyue ☞ thy seed offre vnto leui xx • meloch neyther shalte thou defyle name thy god lorde rom leui xx • thou shalte lye mankynde womankynde abhominacyon deut • 17 • thou shalte lye maner beast defyle thy selfe therwith neyther shal womā stande beast lye downe therto abhominacyon ye shall defyle youre selues thynges wherin al nacyons defyled cast wherthorowe lande defyled wyll visyte wyckednesse therof vpon yea lande selfe hath cast inheriters ye shall kepe therfore myne ordinauncesleuiti xx • iudgementes cōmyt noone abhominacyons neyther straūger soiourneth among abhominacyons haue men lande done whiche lande defyled shall lande spew also yf ye defyle spewed people soeuer shall cōmyt abhominacyons soules commyt shal peryshe among theyr people therfore shal ye kepe watche ye cō myt one abhominable customes whiche commytted ye defyle selues therin lorde god ¶ repeticyon lawes perteynynge x cōmaundementes consyderacyon poore wytchcraft forbydden capi xix ✚ lorde spake vnto moses saynge speake vnto al multitude chyldren israel say vnto leuiti xi g peter • ye shalbe holy lorde god holy ye shall feare euery man father mother kepe sabboths lorde god ye shal turne vnto ydols make goddes metall lorde god ye offre peaceofferynge vnto lorde ye shal offre ye maye accepted leui vii b shall eaten day ye offre morowe yf ought remayne vntyll thyrde daye shall brent fyre yf eaten thyrde day vncleane accepted eateth shall beare synne bycause hath defyled halowed thynge lorde soule shall perysshe amonge people leuiti 23 • deute 24 • ye reape downe rype corne lande ye shal repe downe vttermost border felde neyther shalt thou gather lefte behynde thy haruest thou shalte plucke thy vyneyarde cleane neyther gather grape ouerscaped thou shalte leaue poore straunger lorde god ⊢ ✚ ephe 4 • • acha viii • ye shall steale neyther lye neyther deale falsely one math v f exodi xx b deute v ye shal swere name vayne neyther shalte thou defyle name thy god lorde thou shalte thy neyghboure wrong neyther rob hym violently deute 24 c • • iiii • neyther shall workemans laboure abyde vntyll mornynge thou shalte curse deafe deute 27 • neyther put stomblyng blocke blynde shalte feare thy god lorde▪ ye shall vnryghteousnes iudgement deute • xvi iacob ii b thou shalt fauour pore honour myghty ryghteousnesse shalte thou iudge thy neyghbour thou shalte go vp downe preuy accuser among thy peple neyther shalt thou stande agaynst blood thy neyghbour lorde felde myngled seede neyther shalt thou put garment lynnen wollen soeuer lyeth medleth woman bonde mayde neuertheles appoynted husbande redemed fredome gyuen shalbe scourged lethren whyp shall dye bycause free shall brynge trespace vnto lorde dore tabernacle wytnesse ram trespace offryng preest shal make attonement hym ram trespace lorde concernynge synne hath done synne hath done shall forgyuen hym ye come lande haue planted maner tree conuenient eaten ☞ ye shall put away foreskyn euery one fruyte therof euen thre yere shal vncircumcised vnto shal eaten fourth yere al fruyte shall holy cōmendable lorde fyfth yere shall ye eate fruyte ye may gather increace lorde god ☞ le 〈…〉 ye shal eate vpon blood neyther shal ye vse wytchcraft ☞ obserue tymes ye leuit 〈…〉 e ••• 〈…〉 shal rounde locke heades neyther shalte thou marre tuftes thy beerde ye shall rente flesshe ☞ soules sake prynte markes vpon lorde thou shalte make thy doughter common thou woldest cause hoore lest land also fal hooredome full wyckednesse ye shall kepe sabboths feare sanctuary lorde ye shall regarde worke spirites • 〈…〉 neyther seke sothe sayers defyled lorde god • 〈…〉 thou shalte ryse vp hoorehead reuerence face olde man drede thy god lorde straunger saiourne lande ye shall vexe hym 〈…〉 odi 22▪ c straunger dwelleth shall one selues thou shalte loue hym thy selfe ye straūgers lande egypt lorde god ye shall vnryghtousnesse iudgemente meteyearde weyght measure true balaunces true weyghtes ☞ true epha true hin shal ye haue lorde god brought land egypt therfore shall ye obserue al ordinaunces al iudgementes lorde ¶ gyue theyr seede moloch shall dye therfore goodly lawes capi xx lorde spake vnto moses sayenge shalt thou say vnto chyldren israell soeuer chyldren israell straungers dwell israel gyueth seed vnto 〈…〉 ui xviii • moloch let hym slayne peple lande shall stone hym wyl set face agaynst man wyll destroye hym amonge people bycause hath gyuē seede vnto moloch defyle sanctuary polute holye name though people land hyde theyr eye man gyueth seede vnto moloch kyll hym ☞ wyll put face agaynst man agaynst kynred wyll destroy hym al go hoorynge hym cōmyt hoordom moloch amonge theyr people yf soule turne hym selfe suche worke spirytes soothsayer go hoorynge wyll put face agaynst soule wyll destroye hym amonge people sanctifye selues therfore 〈…〉 xix holye lorde god kepe ye myne ordinaunces lorde doth sanctifye 〈…〉 th 15 • 〈…〉 xx▪ c 〈…〉 odi 21 b soeuer curseth father mother let hym dye hath cursed father mother blood vpō hym 〈…〉 22 reg xi man breaketh wedlocke another man wyfe euen breaketh wedlocke neyghbours wyfe let hym slayne bothe aduouterer aduoutresse man lyeth 〈…〉 iti 18 • 〈…〉 27 • father wyfe vncouereth father secrettes let bothe dye theyr bloode vpon 〈…〉 18 • man lye doughter lawe let dye bothe haue wrought abhominacion theyr blood vpon leuiti 〈◊〉 • rom • yf man also lye wt mankynde maner woman kynde haue bothe cōmytted abhominacyon let dye theyr bloode vpon yf man take wyfe mother also wyckednesse shalbe burnt fyre bothe wyckednes among leuiti 1 • • yf man lye beast let hym dye ye shall slee beast also yf woman go vnto beast lye downe therto thou shalt kyll woman beast also let dye theyr blood vpon man take syster father doughter mother doughter se secretes secretes shameful thyng shal perysshe syght theyr people hath vncouered systers secretes shal beare syn leuiti 1 • • man lye woman hauynge naturall dysease vncouer secretes open fountayne also open foūtayne bloode shall perysshe amonge theyr people leu • 18 • math 14 • thou shalt vncouer secretes thy mother syster leuit 18 • thy father syster doth hath vncouered nexte kyn shal beare theyr wysdom man lye vncles wyfe vncouer vncles secretes shal beare theyr synne shall dye chyldlesse yf man take brother wyfe vncleane thynge hath vncouered brother secretes shalbe chyldles leuiti 18 ye shal kepe therfore myne ordynaunces iudgementes lande whyther brynge dwell therin spew ye shal walke maners nacyon whiche cast cōmytted thynges deut ix▪ • therfore abhorred haue sayde vnto ye shal enioye theyr lande wyll gyue vnto possesse euen lande floweth mylke hony lorde god whiche haue seperated nacyons leuiti 〈◊〉 ▪ • deut 14 • therfore shall ye put dyfference bytwene cleane beastes vncleane bytwene vncleane fowles cleane ye shall defyle soules beastes fowles al maner crepynge thynge grounde bryngeth forth whiche haue seperated vncleane therfore shall ye holy vnto lorde holy haue seuered nacions ye shulde myne deute 13 • • reg 28 • yf man womā worketh wt spiryte soothsayer let dye men shall stoone stone theyr blood vpon ¶ lawe preestes capi xxi lord spake vnto moses speake vnto preestes sonnes aaron saye vnto ☞ let none defyled vpon soule amonge people vpon kynsman nye vnto hym vpon father mother vpon sonne doughter brother syster mayde nye vnto hym whome man hath knowen vpon shal defyled shall defyled vpon hym hath auctorite among people polute hym selfe hym let make reuiti xix f baldnesse vpon theyr heade shaue locke theyr beerd make markes theyr flesshe shalbe holye vnto theyr god polute name theyr god sacrifyces lorde whiche breade theyr god offre therfore shall holy tim ii b let take ☞ wyfe aduoutresse poluted put husbande suche one holy vnto god ☞ thou shalte sanctifye hym therfore offereth vp breade thy god shall therfore holye vnto lorde whiche sanctifye holye yf preestes doughter fall playe hoore poluteth father therfore must burnte fyre hye preest amonge brother vpon whose heade anoyntynge oyle powred ❀ consecrated hande put vestymentes shall vncouer head rent clothes luke ix g neyther go deade body make hym selfe vncleane father mother neyther shal go sanctuary polute holye place god crowne anoyntynge oyle god vpon hym lorde ezec 44 f shall take mayde vnto wyfe wydowe deuorsed woman harlot shal marry shal take mayde owne people wyfe neyther shall defyle seede among people lorde whiche sanctyfye hym lorde spake vnto moses sayeng speake vn aaron saye soeuer thy seede theyr generacions hath deformyte let hym preace offre breade vnto god ii reg v b soeuer hath blemyshe shal come nere yf blynde lame hath brused nose hath mysshapen membre broken foted broken handed ❀ haue heere eye browes haue web blemysshe eye maunge skalde hath stoones broken man hath blemysshe seed aaron preest shall come nye offre sacrifyces lorde hathe deformyte let hym preace offre breade god let hym eate breade god euen moost holy holye onely let hym go vnto vayle come nye aulter deformed polute sanctuary lorde sanctifie moses tolde vnto aaron sonnes vnto chyldren israell ¶ ought absteyne eatynge thynges offered howe shulde offered capi xxii lorde spake vnto moses sayenge speake vnto aaron sonnes seperated ☞ holye thynges chyldren israell polute holye name thynges whiche halowe vnto lorde saye vnto soeuer seede amonge generacyons goeth vnto holy thynges whiche chyldren israell halowe vnto lorde hauynge vnclennes vpō hym soule shall perysshe syght lorde leuiti x •• man soeuer seede aaron leper hath runnynge yssue shall eate holy thyn ge vntyll cleane toucheth man vncleane ouer soule dead man whose seede runneth hym slepe soeuer toucheth worme wherby maye made vncleane man whome maye take vnclennesse soeuer vnclennesse hath soule hath touched shalbe vncleane vntyll euen shall eate holy thynges vntyl haue washed flesh water sonne downe shalbe cleane shal afterwarde eate holye thynges asmoche foode exodi 〈◊〉 beast dyeth alone rent wyld beastes wherby maye defyled shall eate lorde let kepe therfore myne ordinaunce leest lade synne vpon dye yf defyle lorde sanctifye shall straunger eate holye thynge neyther gest preestes neyther shal hyred seruaunt eate holye thynge yf preest bye anye soule money shal eate lyke borne house shal eate bread preestes doughter also maryed vnto straunger maye eate halowed heueofferyngꝭ notwithstandyng yf preestes doughter wydowe deuorsed haue chylde returned vnto father house agayne shall eate father breade well dyd youth shall straūger eate therof man eate holy thynge vnwyttyngly shal put fyfth part vnto gyue vnto preest ☞ halowed thynge preestꝭ shall defyle holy thynges chyldren israell whiche offre vnto lorde lade selues mysdoynge trespace whyle eate theyr holy thyngꝭ lorde halow lorde spake vnto moses sayeng speake vnto aaron sonnꝭ vnto chyldren israell saye vnto soeuer house israel straunger israel wyll offre sacrifyce vowes frewylofferynges whiche wyll offre vnto lorde burnt offerynge ye shall offre reconsyle youre selues male without blemysshe ox shepe gootes soeuer hath blemysshe shall ye offre ye shall get fauoure therwith soeuer bryngeth peace offerynge vnto lorde accordynge appoynted vowe frewyl offerynge oxe shepe without deformyte shall accepted shall also blemyshe therin blynde broken wounded haue wenne maungie scabbed ye shal offre vnto lorde put offeryng vpon aulter vnto lorde oxe shepe hath membre proporcyon mayst thou offre frewylofferyng vowe shal accepted ye shall offre vnto lorde whiche broused broken plucked cut away neyther shall ye make suche lande neyther straungers hande shal ye offre breade vnto youre god suche bycause theyr corrupcyon haue deformyte selues therfore shall accepted lorde spake vnto moses sayenge whē oxe shepe goote brought forth shalbe seuen dayes vnder dam eyght daye forth shall accepted sacrifyce vnto lorde whyther oxe shepe ye shall kyll yonge bothe one daye ye wyll offre thanke offeryng vnto lorde offre ye maye accepted day must eaten vp ye leaue none vntyll morowe lorde therfore shall ye kepe cōmaūdementes lorde neyther shall ye polute holy name wyll halowed amonge chyldren israel lorde whiche halowe brought lande egypte youre god lorde ¶ holy doyes shulde hepe capi xxiii lorde spake vnto moses sayenge speake vnto chyldrē israel say vnto feastes euen feastes lorde whiche ye shall call holy conuocacyons exodi 23 b syxe dayes ye shall worke seuenth daye sabboth rest holy cōuocacyon ye worke therin sabboth lorde dwellynges feastes lorde euen holye conuocacyons whiche ye shal proclayme theyr ceasons xiiii daye fyrste moneth euen lordes exodi xii c nume 28 c passeouer fyftene daye moneth feast swete breade vnto lorde seuen dayes ye must eate vnleuended bread exodi xii b fyrst daye ye shall haue holye conuocacyon ye shall laborous worke therin ye shal offre sacrifyces vnto lorde thorowe seuen dayes seuenth daye holy conuocacyon ye shall laborous worke therin ✚ lorde spake vnto moses saynge speake vnto chyldren israell saye vnto num xv ye come lande whiche gyue vnto reape downe haruest therof ye shall brynge sheafe fyrste fruytes youre haruest vnto preest shall waue sheafe lorde accepted euen morowe sabboth preest shall waue ye shall offre daye ye waue sheafe lambe wtout blemyshe yeare olde burntofferynge vnto lorde meat offerynge therof shalbe made two tenthdeales fyne floure mengled oyle sacrifyce vnto lord swete sauour drynke offerynge therof shalbe wyne euen fourth deale hyn ye shall eate neyther breade parched corne furmentye new corne vntyll selfe daye ye haue brought offeryng vnto god let law 〈2 page missing〉 wherfore ye shall myne ordinaunces kepe lawes ye shall dwell lande safetye lande shall gyue fruyte ye shall eate youre fyll dwel therin safetye yf ye shall saye shall eate seuenth yeare shall sowe gather encrease wyll sende blessyng vpon syxte yeare shall brynge forth fruyte thre yeares ye shall sowe eyght yeare eate yet olde corne vntyll ix yeare euen vntyll fruytes come ye shall eate olde store lande shall solde wast psal 24 lande myne ye put straungers soiourners lande possessiō ☞ ye shal graunt redempcion lande ruth iiii iere 32 b yf thy brother waxed poore hath solde away possession yf kyn come redeme let hym bye whiche ☞ brother solde yf haue man redeme let hande get asmuche maye sufficient bye agayne let counte howe longe hath solde delyuer rest vnto man whome solde maye returne possessyon agayne yf hande get sufficient restore agayne thē whiche solde shal remayne hande hym hath bought vntyll yeare iubelye iubelye shall come shall returne vnto possessyon agayne yf man sel house dwellyng walles citye maye bye agayne wtin hoole yere solde euen day yere shal redeme agayne yf bye agayne space full yere house walled citye shal stablysshed owne bought successours hym shall go iubelye house vyllages whiche haue walles rounde aboute counted felde countre therfore maye bought agayne shall returne iubelye notwithstandyng cityes leuites house cityes theyr possessyon may leuites redeme ceasons yf man purchase ought leuites house solde citye theyr possessiō shall go yere iubelye house cityes leuites theyr possession amonge chyldren israell felde suburbe besyde theyr cityes maye solde theyr perpetuall possession yf thy brother waxed poore fallen decay thou shalt releue straunger soiourner maye lyue exod 221 deute 23 • ezeche 2 •• thou shalte take none vsurye hym vantage thou shalt feare thy god thy brother maye lyue thou shalt gyue hym thy money vpon vsurye ☞ lende hym thy corne increace lorde god whiche brought lande egypte gyue lande canaan youre god exodi 2 •• deut ••• ✚ yf thy brother dwelleth waxed poore solde vnto thou shalte compell hym bondage seruauntes hyred seruaunt soiourner shall shal serue vnto yeare iubelye shall departe chyldren hym shall returne vnto owne kynred agayne vnto possessiō father seruauntes whiche brought lande egypte shal therfore solde bondman thou shalt reygne ouer hym cruelly shalte feare thy god thy bondseruaunt thy bondemayde whiche thou shalt haue shalbe heathen round aboute ye shall purchace seruauntes maydꝭ chyldren straūgers soiourners amonge theyr generacyons whiche begatte lande shal possession ye shall take enherytaunce chyldrē possesse shall youre bondman euer ouer brother chyldren israell ye shal reygne one ouer another cruelly yf soiourner straunger waxe ryche thy brother dwelleth hym waxe poore sell hym selfe vnto straū ger soiourner straū gers kyn solde may redemed agayne one brother ❀ vvyll eyther vncle vncles son may hym nye kyn vnto hym kynred maye redeme hym eyther yf hande get moche may losed shal reken hym bought hym yeare solde vn yeare iubelye pryce byenge shall valued accordynge vnto nombre yeares hyred seruaunt shall hym yet many yeares behynde accordyng vnto let hym gyue agayne delyueraunce money bought yf remayne fewe yeres vnto yeare iubelye let hym counte hym agayne accordynge 〈2 page missing〉 vnto yeres gyue hym agayne redempcion shall hym yeare yeare hyred seruaunt shall reygne cruelly ouer hym thy syght redemed thus shall go yere iubelye chyldren hym chyldren israell seruauntes brought land egypte lorde god ¶ blessed kepe thynges god byddeth capi xxvi ye shall deute v make ydols grauen ymage neyther reare vp stone neyther shal ye set vp ymage stoone lande worshyp lorde god ye shal kepe sabbothes feare sanctuary lorde ✚ yf ye walke myne ordinaunces kepe cōmaundementes wyll sende rayne ryght ceason lande shall yelde encrease tree felde shall gyue theyr fruyte thresshynge shall reache vnto wyne haruest wyneharuest shall reache vnto sowynge tyme ye shall eate youre breade plenteousnes dwell lande peaseably wyl sende peace lande ye shall slepe without man make frayde wyl ryd euyll beastes lande shall swerde go thorowout lande ye shall chace youre enemyes shall fall vpon swerde • osua 23 c fyue shall chace hundred hundred shal put ten thousande flyght enemyes shall fall vpon swerde wyll haue respecte vnto make encrease multiplye set vp couenaunt ye shall eate olde store cary olde new • orsit • wyll make dwellynge place amonge soule shal lothe wyll walke amonge wyll god ye shall people ⊢ lorde god whiche brought lande egipt ye shuld theyr bondman haue broken cheynes yoke made go vp ryght deut 28 b mala ii yf ye wyll herken vnto wyll cōmaundementes yf ye shall despyse myne ordynaunces eyther yf soule abhorre lawes ye wyll cōmaundementes breake myne appoyntment also wyll vnto wyll brynge vpon fearfulnesse swellynge body burnynge ague consume eye gendre sorowe herte ye shall sowe youre seede vayne enemyes shall eate wyll set face agaynst ye shall fall youre enemyes hate shall reygne ouer proue 28 ye shal flee man foloweth yf ye wyll yet herken vnto wyll punysshe seuen tymes synnes wyll breake pryde stubburnesse wyll make youre heuen yron earth brasse labour shalbe spent vayne land shal gyue encrease neyther shal tree lande gyue theyr fruytes yf ye walke contrary vnto wyll herken vnto wyll brynge seuen tymes mo plage vpon accordyng synnes wyll also sende wylde beastes vpon whiche shall depryue chyldren destroye youre cattell make fewe nombre cause hye wayes growe vnto wyldernesse yf ye maye refourmed thynges shall walke contraye vnto wyll also walke contrarye vnto wyll punysshe yet seuen tymes synnes wyll sende swerde vpō shall auenge testament ye gathered togyther youre cityes wyll sende pestylence amonge ye shall delyuered hande enemye haue ☞ broken staffe bread ten wyues shal bake breade one ouen shall delyuer breade agayne weyght osee iiii • 〈◊〉 • • ye shall eate satisfyed yf ye wyl yet herken vnto wyll walke agaynst wyll walke contrarye vnto also indygnacion wyll chastice seuen tymes synnes reg vi • ye shall eate flesshe sonnes fleshe doughters shal ye deuour wyll destroye ☞ hye place rore ☞ ymages cast carkasses vpon bodyes ydols soule shall abhorre wyll make cityes desolate bryng sanctuary vnto nought wyl smell swetnesse odoures wyll brynge lande vnto wyldernesse enemyes whiche dwell therin shall wondre wyll strawe amonge hethen wyll draw swerde lande shall wast youre cityes desolate shall lande enioye sabbothes longe lyeth voyde ye shall enemyes lande euen shall lande rest reioyse sabbothes longe lyeth voyde shal rest bycause dyd rest sab bothes ye dwelte vpon vpon left alyue wyll sende fayntnesse theyr hertes lande theyr enemyes sounde shakyng leafe shal chace flee swerde shal fall man folowyng vpō shall fall one vpon another swerde euen man folowynge vpon ye shall haue power stande enemyes ye shall perysshe amonge hethen lande enemyes shall eate vp lefte shall pyne awaye theyr vnryghtousnes euen theyr enemyes lande mysdedes theyr father shall consume shall cōfesse theyr mysdedꝭ misdedes theyr father theyr trespace whiche haue trespaced agaynst also haue walked contrary vnto therfore also wyll walke contrarye vnto wyll bryng lande theyr enemyes least way theyr vn cyrcumcysed hertes shall tamed shall make attonement theyr mysdedes deut iiii e wyll remembre couenaunt iacob bonde isaac myne appoyntmente abraham wyll remembre wyll thynke lande lande shall lefte shal enioye sabbothes whyle lyeth waste without shal make attone ment theyr mysdedes bycause despy sed lawes bycause theyr soule refused myne ordinaunces yet lande theyr enemyes deut iiiii e wyll cast awaye neyther wyll abhorre destroye vtterly breake myne appoyntment lorde theyr god wyll theyr sake remembre couenaunt made vnto theyr father whome brought lande egypte syght hethen myght theyr god lorde ordynaunces iudgementes lawes whiche lorde made bytwene hym chyldrē israel mount sinay hande moses ¶ dyuces vowes tythes • c̄ capi xxvii lorde spake vnto moses sayenge speake vnto chyldren israell saye vnto yf man wyll gyue synguler vowe vnto lorde accordyng value soules value male twentye yere olde vnto sixtye shall fyftye nume 3 • sycles syluer weyght sanctuari yf woman value shall thyrtye sycles fyue yeres twentye male shall set twenty sycles female ten sycles moneth vnto fyue yere male shall set fyue sycles syluer female thre sixtye yeare olde aboue shall valued fiftye sycles woman ten yf poore set shall present selfe preest preest shall value hym accordynge hande hym vowed able get euen shall prest value hym yf beast men brynge offerynge vnto lorde man gyueth vnto lorde ☞ shalbe counted holye shall alter chaunge good bad bad good yf chaūge beast beast bothe beast also wherwith chaunged shall holye maner vncleane beast whiche men offer sacrifyce vnto lorde shal set beast preest preest shal value whyther good bad preest setteth shal yf wyl bye agayne shal gyue fyft parte aboue set yf man dedicate house holy vnto lorde preest shal set whyther good bad preest hath set shall value ☞ sanctifyed wyll redeme house let hym gyue fyfte parte money iudged therto shalbe man ☞ halowe pece enheryted lande vnto lorde shall set accordynge seede therof beare ☞ homer barlye shall set fyftie sycles syluer halow felde immediatly yere iubelye shalbe worth accordynge estemed yf halowe felde iubely preest shal reken money accordynge nombre yeares remayne vnto yere iubelye folowynge thereafter shall lower set consecrated felde wyll redeme agayne let hym put fyfte parte pryce set vnto shal yf wyll redeme felde selleth feld another mā ❀ vovved maye redeme felde goeth yeare iubely shall made holy vnto lorde euen felde vtterly put away shall preestes possessyon man sanctify vnto lorde felde whiche hath bought enherytaunce preest shall reken vnto hym worthe vnto yeare iubelye shal gyue pryce set daye thynge consecrated vnto lorde yere iubilie felde shall returne vnto hym bought euen hym whole enherytaunce lande settyng shall accordyng sycle sanctuary one sycle conteyneth twentye halfepence exodi 30 b ☞ fyrst borne beastes appoynted vnto thedeute 15 lorde may man sanctifie whyther oxe shepe lordes alredy vncleane beast shall redeme set gyue fyfth parte therto yf redemed shall solde accordyng value notwithstandyng ☞ dampned thyng mā putteth hym dedicateth vnto lorde al good whyther man beast lande enherytaunce may solde redemed euery thynge put away holy vnto lorde let dampned thyng man seperateth redemed dye death euery tythe lande whiche seede lande fruyte tree lordes sanctified vnto lorde yf man wyll redeme ought tythes let hym adde fyfth parte therto euery tythe oxe shepe euery beast goeth vnder rod ☞ euen euery tenth shal holy vnto lorde shall loke yf good bad chaunge el yf chaunge bothe chaunged withall shall halowed vnto lorde may redemed cōmaundementes whiche lorde cōmaunded moses vnto chyldren israel mount sinay ❧ ❀ ❧ ¶ ende thyrde boke moses called hebrue uaicrah latyn leuiticus ¶ fourth boke moses called hebrue uaiedabbar latyn numeri apte battayle nombred •• yb • leut must ministre tabernacle capi primo lorde spake vnto moses wyldernes sinay tabernacle wytnesse fyrst day seconde moneth seconde yeare come lande egypte sayenge exodi 30 v num • 6 2 reg 24 take ye somme multititude chyldren israel theyr kynreds housholde theyr father nombre theyr name male heade heade xx yere aboue euen go forth warre israell thou aaron shall nombre thorowout theyr armyes shall men euery trybe wherof euery one heade man house father name men shall stande ❀ trybe ruben elizur son sedeur simeon selumiel son suri sadai iuda nahesson son aminadab isachar nathanael sonne zuar zabulon eliab son helon among chyldren ioseph ephraim elizama sonne amihud manasse gamaliel sonne peda zur ben iamin abidan son gedeoni dan ahiezer son ammi sadai aser pagiel sonne ocran gad elisaph son deguel nephthali ahira sonne ena • great fame congregacyon lordes trybes theyr father heades ouer thousandes israel moses aaron toke men expressed theyr name gathered congregacyon togyther fyrst daye seconde moneth rekened thorowout theyr kynredꝭ house theyr father name xx yeare aboue heade heade lorde commaunded moses euen nombred wyldernesse sinay chyldren ruben israel eldest sonne thorowout theyr generacyons theyr kynreds house theyr father nombre name head head al male frō xx yere aboue many dyd go forth warre nombre trybe ruben xivi thousande fyue hundred chyldren symeon thorowout theyr generacyons theyr kynreds house theyr father somme nombre name heade heade al male xx yeres aboue soeuer might go forth war somme trybe symeon lix thousande thre hundred chyldren gad thorowout theyr generacyons theyr kynreds householdes theyr father nombre name xx yere aboue wente forth warre nombre tribe gad xlv thousande syxe hundred fyftye chyldren iuda thorowout theyr generacyons theyr kynreds house theyr father nombre name xx yeare aboue able go forth warre nombre trybe iuda lxxiiii thousande syxe hundred chyldren izachar thorowout theyr generacyons theyr dan lxii vii hundred chyldren aser thorowout theyr generacions theyr kynreds house theyr father nombre name xx yeres aboue went warre nombre try aser lxi v hundred chyldren nephthali thorowout theyr generacions theyr kynreds house theyr father nombre name xx yeres aboue myght go forthe warre nombre trybe nephthali liii thousand iiii hundred somme whiche moses aaron nombred prynces israel xii men whiche ouer house theyr father al nombres chyldrē israel thorowout house theyr father xx yeres aboue went forth warre israell drewe vnto somme exod •• nume • syxe hundred thousande thre thousande fyue hundred fyftie leuites trybes theyr father nombred among lorde spake vnto moses saynge thou shalte nombre trybe leui neyther take somme frō amonge chyldren israel thou shalte appoynte leuites ouer habitacyon wytnesse ouer vessel therof ouer thynges yea shall beare tabernacle vessel therof shall ministre shall dwell rounde aboute tabernacle tabernacle goeth forth leuites shall take downe tabernacle pytched shall set vp yf straunger come nye shall dye chyldren israel shall pytch theyr tentes euery man owne company euery man vnder owne standerd thorowout theyr hoostes leuites shall pytehe rounde aboute tabernacle wytnesse wrath vpon congregacyon chyldrē israel leuites shall kepe watch tabernacle wytnes chyldrē israel dyd accordyng lorde cōmaunded moses euen dyd ordre tentes heades kynreds israel capi ii lorde spake vnto moses aaron saynge eeuery man chyldren israell shall pytche vnder owne standerde vnder armes theyr father house syde rounde aboute tabernacle wytnesse shall pytche eastsyde towarde rysyng sonne shall standerde hoost iuda pytche thorowout theyr armyes nahesson son aminadab captayne sonnes iuda hoost nombre lxxiiii syxe hundred nexte vnto hym ☞ shall trybe izachar pytche nathaneel sonne zuer captayne chylden izachar hoost somme nombre therof liiii thousande foure hundred tribe zabulon eliab son helon captayne ouer chyldren zebulon hoost nombre lvii thousande iiii hundred hole nombre hole hoost iuda hundred thousand lxxxvi thousande iiii hūdred thorowout theyr armyes shall go south syde shall standerde hoost ruben kepe thorowe theyr companyes captayne ouer sonnes ruben elizur son sedeur hoost nombre xlvi thousande v hundred fast hym shall trybe symeon pytche captayne ouer sonnes symeon salumiel sonne zuri sadai hoost nombre lix thousande thre hundred trybe gad also captayne ouer sonnes gad eliasaph sonne duguel hoost nombre xlv thousande vi hundred l nombred tribe ruben hundred thousand li iiii hundred l thorowout theyr armyes shall go seconde place tabernacle wytnesse shall go hoost leuites myddes hoostes lye theyr tentes euen shall procede iourney euery man degree vnder theyr owne standerdes west syde shall standerd hoost ephraim kepe theyr armyes captayne ouer sonnes ephraim elisama son amihud hoost nowbre xl thousande fyue hundred fast hym shall thybe manasse captayne ouer sonnes manasse gamaleel sonne pedazur hoost nombre xxxii thousande two hundred thybe ben iamin also captayne ouer sonnes ben iamin abidan sonne gedeoni hoost nombre xxxv thousande iiii hundred appoynsed hoost ephraim hundred thousande eyght thousande hundred thorowout theyr armyes shall go thyrde place standerd hoost dan shall kepe north syde theyr armyes captayne ouer chyldren dan ahiezer sonne ammi sadai hooste nombre lxii thousande vii hundred fast hym shall trybe aser pitche captayn ouer sonnes aser pagiel son •• ran hoost nombre xli fyue hundred trybe nephtali also captayne ouer chyldren nephtali ahira son enan hoost nombre liii thousand iiii hundred appoynted hoost dan hundred thousande lvii thousande vi hundred shall go hyndermost theyr standardes somme chyldren israel thorowout house theyr father euen al nombres pytched thorowout theyr hoost vi hundred thousande iii thousande v hundred fyftie leuits nombred among chyldren israel lorde cōmaunded moses chyldren israel dyd accordynge lorde cōmaunded moses pytched theyr standerdes iourneyed thorowout theyr kynreddes thorowout housholdes theyr father ¶ leuites go batayle minyster sanituary pytche theyr tent nexte ha •••• aryo • capi iii thse generacyons aaron moses day lorde spake moses mounte sinay name sonnes aaron nadab eldest son abihu eleazar ithamar num 2 • • name sonnes aaron whiche leui viii • preestes anoynted whose hande consecrated ministre leuiti x • nadab abihu dyed lorde offered straung fyre lorde wyldernesse sinay chyldren eleazar ithamar ministred syght aaron theyr father lorde spake vnto moses saynge bryng trybe leuy set aaron preest name 17 b xviii may serue hym wayte vpon hym vpon multitude tabernacle wytnesse seruyce habitacyon shall kepe apparel tabernacle wytnesse wayte vpon chyldren israel seruyce habitacion thou shalte gyue leuites vnto aaron sonnes gyuen delyuered vn hym chyldren israel thou shalte appoynt aaron sonnes wayte theyr preestes offyce straunger cometh nye shall slayne lorde spake vnto moses saynge beholde haue taken leuites amonge chyldren israell exod xiii • name 8 • fyrst borne openeth matryce among chyldren israel leuites shall myne bycause al fyrst borne myne daye smote fyrste borne lande egypt halowed vnto fyrst borne israel bothe man beast myne shall lorde lorde spake vnto moses wyldernesse sinay saynge nombre chyldren leui house theyr father theyr kynreds male moneth olde aboue shalte thou nombre moses nombred accordynge cōmaundement lorde cōmaunded exodi vi • chyldren leui theyr name gerson cahath merari name chyldren gerson theyr kynreds libni semei sonnes cahath theyr kynreds amram iezehar hebron dziel sonnes merari theyr kynreds mahelt musi kynreds leuites accordyng house theyr father gerson came kynred libnites kynred semeites kynreddes gersonytes somme nombre al male moneth olde aboue seuen thousand fyue hundred kynreddes gersonites shall pytche behynde habitacyō westward captayn moost auncyent house gersonites elyasaph son lael vnder kepynge chyldren gerson tabernacle wytnesse ☞ habitacyon tente coueryng therof hangynge dore tabernacle wytnesse hangynges courte curtayne doore courte whiche rounde aboute tabernacle aulter cordes seruyce therof cahath came kynred amramites kynred iezeharites kynred hebronites kynred ozielites kynreds cahathites nombre male moneth olde aboue viii vi c shal kepe thyngꝭ kepte holy place kynred chyldren cahath shall pytch south syde tabernacle captayne auncyent house kynred cahathites elisaphan sonne oziel vnder theyr kepyng arke table candelstycke aulters al vessel sāctuary ministre vayle soeuer belonged ministracyon therof eleazar sonne aaron preest captayne ouer captaynes leuites ouersyght wayted vpon sanctuary merari came kynred mahelites kynred musites kynreds merari somme accordyng nombre male moneth olde aboue vi ii hundred captayn auncient theyr house kynred merari zuriel sonne abihael shall pitche north syde tabernacle vnder custodye sonnes merari shall bordes dwellyng barres pyllers sockettꝭ therof vessell therof serueth therto pyllers courte rounde aboute theyr sockettꝭ theyr pynnes theyr cordes forefront habitacion tabernacle wytnes east warde shall moses aaron sonnes pitche wayte kepe sanctuary kepe chyldren israel straunger cometh nye shall slayne hole somme leuites whiche moses aaron nombred commaundement lorde thorowout theyr kynreds euen male moneth olde aboue num 〈…〉 ☞ xxii thousande lorde sayde vnto moses nombre fyrst borne male among chyldren israell moneth olde aboue take nombre theyr name thou shalte appoynte leuitꝭ lorde fyrst borne chyldren israell cattell leuites fyrste gendred cattell chyldren israel moses nombred lorde cōmaunded hym fyrst borne chyldren israel al fyrst borne male rehersed theyr name moneth olde aboue accordyng theyr nombre xxii thousande two hundred lxxiii lorde spake vnto moses sayenge take leuites al fyrst borne chyldren israell cattell leuites theyr cattell leuites shall myne lorde redemyng two hundred lxxiii whiche mo leuites fyrst borne chyldren israell take fyue sycles euery ☞ heade weyght sanctuary exodi 30 b leuiti 27 〈◊〉 45 sycle conteynyng twenty halfepence gyue money wherwith odde nombre redemed vnto aaron sonnes moses toke redempcyō money ouerplus moo thē leuites fyrstborne chyldren israel toke money euen ccc lxv sycles sycle sanctuarye moses gaue money redemed vnto aaron sonnes accordynge worde lorde euen lorde cōmaunded moses ¶ offyces leuites capi iiii lorde spake vnto moses aaron saynge take somme chyldren cahath amonge sofies leui theyr kynreds house theyr father xxx yere aboue vntyll fyftye able go forthe warre worke tabernacle wytnesse offyce chyldren cahath tabernacle wytnesse ☞ moost holy hoost remoueth aaron sonnes shall come take downe vayle hangeth bytwene wrap arke wytnesse shall put theron couerynge taxus skynnes shall spreade vpon cloth al togyther yelowe sylke put barres therof vpon shew table shall spreade abrode cloth yelow sylke put theron dysshes spones flat peces pottes powre shall breade theron contynually shall spreade vpon couerynge purple couer couerynge taxus skynnes put barres therof shall take clothe yelow sylke couer candelstycke lyght lampes tonges snoffers oyle vessel occupy aboute shal put al vessell therof within couerynge taxus skynnes put vpō barre vpon golden aulter shal speade cloth yelow sylke couer coueryng taxus skynnes put barres therof shall take thynges whiche occupye ministre within holy place put cloth yelow sylke vpon couer couerynge taxus skynnes put barre shall take awaye asshes aulter spreade purple clothe theron put vpon vessel therof ministre withall euen cole pannes fleshe hokes shouels basens vessel aulter shal sprede vpon coueryng taxus skynnes put barres whē aaron sonnes haue made ende coueryng holy thyngꝭ vessel sanctuarye agaynst hoost remoue sonnes cahath shall come beare shall touche holy thynge leest dye charge sonnes cahath tabernacle wytnesse offyce eleazar sonne aaron preest perteyneth oyle lyght swete sence dayly meat offeryng anoyntyng oyle ouersyght tabernacle therin bothe sanctuarye vessel therof lorde spake vnto moses aarō saynge ☞ ye shall destroy trybe kynred cahathites amonge leuytes thus vnto may lyue dye go vnto holy thynges let aaron sonnes go take downe euery one seruyce charge let go se holy thynges folden vp lest dye lorde spake vnto moses saynge take also somme chyldren gerson thorowout house theyr father thorowout theyr kynreds xxx yere aboue vntyll fyftye shalte thou nombre able go forth war doo seruyce tabernacle wytnesse seruyce kynred gersonites serue beare shall beare curtaynes dwellynge roofe tabernacle wytnesse couerynge coueryng taxus skynnes hye aboue vpon hangynge dore tabernacle wytnesse hangynges courte hangynge entrynge gate courte rounde aboute dwellyng aulter cordes al instrumentes serue vnto made serue mouth aaron sonnes shall seruyce chyldren gersonites done theyr charge theyr seruyce ye ☞ shall nombre vnto al theyr burden kepe seruyce kynred chyldren gerson tabernacle wytnesse theyr watche shall vnder hande ithamar son aaron preest thou shalte nombre sonnes merari theyr kynreds house theyr father xxx yeres aboue vnto l shalte thou nombre euery one able go forthe warre seruyce tabernacle wytnesse charge must wayte vpon accordyng theyr seruyce tabernacle wytnesse bordes dwellyng barres pyllers sockettes therof pyllers rounde aboute court theyr sockettes pynnes cordes al instrumentes al theyr seruyce name ye shal reken thynges must wayte vpō beare seruyce kynreds sonnes merari accordyng theyr offyce tabernacle wytnesse vnder hande ithamar sonne aaron preest moses aaron prince multitude nombred sonnes cahathites theyr kynreds house theyr father xxx yere aboue vnto fyftye able go forth warre seruyce tabernacle wytnes nombres throwout theyr kynreddes two thousande seuen hundred l nombre kynreds cahath namely myght seruyce tabernacle witnes moses aaron dyd nombre accordynge commaundement lorde hande more nombres sonnes gerson thorowout theyr kynreds house theyr father xxx yere vp vnto fyfty al able go forth war seruyce tabernacle wytnes nombers thorowout theyr kynreds house theyr father two thousande vi hundred xxx nombre kynreds sonnes gerson dyd seruyce tabernacle wytnes moses aarō dyd nombre accordyng cōmaūdement lorde nombres kynreddes sonnes merari thorowout theyr kynreds house theyr father xxx yere vp vnto l wente forth warre serued tabernacle wytnesse nombres theyr kynreddes thre thousande two hundred somme kynreds sonnes merari whiche moses aaron nombred accordyng worde lorde hande moses nombres leuites whiche moses aaron lordes israel nombred theyr kynreds housholdes theyr father xxx yere vp vnto l euery one came offyce seruyce beare burden tabernacle wytnes nombred viii thousande fyue hundred lxxx ❀ accordynge worde lorde dyd aaron nombre hande moses euery one accordynge theyr seruyce charge accordyng theyr office lorde cōmaunded moses ¶ knowledge synne clensynge synne law fyrst fruytes ielousye capi v lorde spake vnto moses sayenge cōmaunde chyldren israel leui 〈…〉 put ☞ hoost euery leper euery one hath yssue soeuer ☞ defyled vpō soule male female shall ye put euen hoost shall ye put defyle tentes amonge whiche dwell chyldren israel dyd put hoost euen lorde spake vnto moses dyd chyldren israel lorde spake vnto moses saynge speake vnto chyldren israel whyther l 〈…〉 〈…〉 man woman haue cōmytted synne man doth haue trespaced agaynst lord soule hath done amysse therfore shal knowledge theyr synne haue done let hym restore agayne hurte hath done hole put fyfte parte therto gyue vnto hym hath trespaced agaynst yf man restore hurte vnto kynsman let trespace made good vnto lorde shall preestes besyde ram ☞ attonement wherby attonement shall made hym euery heueofferyng made holy thynges chyldren israel bryng vnto preest shall euery man halowed thynges shall soeuer mā gyueth preest shal lorde spake vnto moses saynge speake vnto chyldren israel say vnto man wyfe go syde trespace agaynst hym man lye flesshely hyd eye husbande come lyght defyled wytnesse agaynst neyther taken maner spyryte ielousye cometh vpon ielouse ouer wyfe defyled yf spirite ielousye come vpon hym ielouse ouer wyfe whiche yet vndefyled lette man brynge wyfe vnto preest brynge offeryng tenth parte epha barlye meale lette hym powre none oyle vpon put frākensence theron offerynge ielousye offerynge remembraunce causynge synne thought vpon preest shall bryng set lorde let hym num xix b ☞ take holy water erthen vessel dust floore habitacyon put water let preest set woman lorde vncouer woman heade put memoryal offerynge handes whiche ielousye offeryng preest shal haue bytter cursed water hande preest shal charge saye vnto woman mā haue lyen neyther hast gone asyde vnclennesse without thy husbande haue thou harme bytter cursed water yf thou hast gone asyde behynd thyne husbande arte defyled man hath lyen besyde thyne husbande preest shal charge woman horryble curse preest shal say vnto woman lorde make abhominacyon curse among thy people lorde dothe make thy thygh roote thy bely swell cursed water go bowel may make thy bely swel thy thygh roote let woman ☞ say amen amen let preest wryte curse clensed let hym cast bytter water gyue womā bytter cursed water drynke cursed bytter water may enter preest shall take ielousye offerynge woman hande waue lorde brynge vnto aulter preest shal take handful offerynge memoryall burne vpon aulter make woman drynke water whē hath made womā drynke water yf defiled haue trespassed agaynst husbande shall cursed bytter water go bely shal swell thygh shall rot woman shalbe curse amonge people yf woman defyled cleane shall haue harme shal conceyue beare law ielousye whē wyfe goth syde behynde husband defyled spiryte ielousye cōmeth vpon man beynge ielouse ouer wyfe doth bryng lorde preest shal accordyng vnto lawe man shal gyltlesse woman shall beare syn ¶ lawe abstinence blessynge people capi vi lorde spake vnto moses sayenge speake vnto chyldren israel saye vnto eyther man woman doth seperate selues vowe vowe ☞ absteyner appoynte selues vnto lorde shal seperate hym selfe iudi xiii • amos 〈◊〉 wyne stronge drynke shall drynke vynegre wyne strong drynke shall drynke soeuer pressed grape shall eate freshe grape neyther yet dryed long abstynence endureth shall eate nothyng made vyne tree kyrnels huske grape longe voweth seperated shall rasure come vpon heade vntyll dayes whiche seperateth hym selfe vnto lorde shall holy shall let locke heere growe long consecrateth hym selfe vnto lorde shal come deade body shal make selfe vncleane death father mother brother syster bycause vowe abstynence god vpō head dayes abstynence hooly vnto lorde yf fortune man chaunce dye sodeynly hym heade abstynence shall defyled shal actes 1 • • shaue heade day clensynge euen seuenth day shall shaue eyght day shal brynge two turtle two yong pygeons preest dore tabernacle wytnesse preest shall offre one synne burntofferyng make attonement hym concernyng synned vpon soule shall halowe heade daye shall consecrate hym selfe vnto lorde tyme abstynencye shal brynge lambe yere olde ☞ trespace dayes lost bycause abstynencye defyled lawe absteyner tyme abstynence shall brought vnto dore tabernacle wytnesse shall brynge offerynge vnto lorde lambe yere olde without blemysshe burntoffrynge lambe yere olde without blemysh synne ram without blemysshe also peaceofferynge basket swete breade euen cake fyne floure myngled oyle wafer swete breade anoynted oyle theyr meate offerynges drynke offerynges preest shall brynge hym lorde offre synofferynge burnt offerynge shall offre ram peace offerynge vnto lorde basket swete breade preeste shall offre also meatofferynge drynkeofferyng shall shaue heade absteyner dore tabernacle wytnesse euen heade abstynence shal take heere sober heade put fyre whiche vnder peaceofferynge preest shall take sodden shoulder ramme one swete cake basket one swete wafer also put vpon handes absteyner hath shauen abstynence preest shall ❀ take hym waue lorde holy thynges shalbe preestꝭ waue brest heuesholder absteyner may drynke wyne law absteyner whiche hath vowed offerynge vnto lorde consecracyō besydes ☞ thynges hand get accordynge vow vowed euen muste lawe abstynence lorde spake vnto moses saynge speake vnto aaron sonnes sayenge wyse ye shall blesse chyldren israel say vnto lorde blesse kepe lorde ☞ make face shyne vpon mercyfull vnto lorde ❀ lyfte vp coūtenaunce vpon gyue peace shall put name vpon chyldren israel wyll blesse ¶ offerynge lordes heades israell capi vii fortuned daye moses full set vp habitacyon andexodi • anoynted sanctified al apparel therof aulter also al vessel therof anoynted sanctified prince israel heades ouer house theyr father whiche lordes tribe standyng theyr office offered brought theyr sacrifyces lorde vi couered charettes xii ox one charet two lordes one oxe brought habitacyon lorde spake vnto moses sayenge take may seruyce tabernacle wytnesse thou shalte gyue vnto leuites euery man accordyng offyce moses toke charettes ox gaue vnto leuites two charettes foure ox gaue vnto sonnes gerson accordyng vnto theyr offyce foure charettes eyght ox gaue vnto sonnes merari accordyng vnto theyr offyces vnder hande ithamar sonne aarō preest offrynge nahesson vnto sonnes cahathnum • gaue none bycause vpon offyce holy thynges whiche dyd beare vpon shoulder prynces offered dedicatynge aulter daye anoynted brought theyr sacrifice aulter
