agaynst ahaz coulde ouercome tyme rezin kynge siria brought elath agayne siria ryd iues thence sirians 4 x •• came elath dwell therin vnto daye ahaz sent messenger thiglath peleser kynge assyria sayenge thy seruaunt thy son come vp delyuer hande kyng siria hand kyng israel whiche ryse vp agaynst ahaz toke syluer golde founde house lorde treasure kynges house sent rewarde kynge assyria esa • • • kynge assyria consented vnto hym kyng assyria went vp agaynst damasco whē taken caryed people away kir slue rezin kyng ahaz went damasco mete thiglath peleser kynge assyria kyng ahaz sawe aulter damasco sent uria preest patron aulter fassion workmanshyp therof uria preest made aulter poyntes lyke patron kyng ahaz sent damasco euen dyd uria preest make agaynst kyng ahaz came damasco kyng come damasco sawe aulter kynge went offered theron ad burnt burnt offeryng meate offerynge powred drynke offerynge sprinkeled blood peaceofferinges besyde aulter brasen aulter whiche lorde set without temple bytwene aulter temple lorde put north syde aulter kynge ahaz commaunded uria preest sayd vpon great aulter set fyre mornyng burntoffryng euen meateofferyng kynges burntsacrifice meateofferyng burntofferyng al people lande theyr meateofferynge theyr drynke offerynges powre therby bloode sacrifice offeryngꝭ brasen aulter wyl come se uria preest dyd accordyng thynges kyng ahaz commaunded hym • • e • 7 kyng ahaz brake sydes bottomes toke lauer toke downe lauatorye brasen ox vnder put vpon pauemente stone pulpyt sabboth made house kynges entrie without turned house lorde feare kyng assyria rest wordes concerne ahaz dyd wrytten boke cronicles kynges iuda ahaz slepte father buried father citye dauid hezekia sonne reygned steade ¶ hosea kynge israell taken realme brought asserians capi xvii xii yere ahaz kyng iuda began hosea sonne elia reygne samaria vpon israell ix yere dyd euyl syght lorde kynges israel hym salmanasar kyng assyria came vp agaynst hym hosea became seruaunt gaue hym presentes kyng assyria founde treason hosea sent messenger kynge egypte brought present vnto kyng assyria yere yere therfore kynge assyria toke hym put hym pryson • reg • 8 • kynge assyra came vp thorowout al lande gat vp agaynst samaria beseyged thre yere nynth yere hosea 〈…〉 • 3 • kyng assyria toke samaria caried israel away vnto assyria put hala habor ryuer goza city medes came passe chyldrē israel synned agaynst lorde theyr god brought lande egypte vnder hande pharao kyng egypte feared god walked ceremony hethen lorde east chyldren israel ceremony whiche kynges israel made chyldrē israel went aboute hyde thinges well lorde theyr god buylte hyll aulters al theyr cityes bothe towres kepte watche also strong townes made ymages groues euery hygh hyl vnder euery thycke tr • e burnt insence hyll aulters dyd hethen lorde caried away wrought wycked thynges angre lorde withall serued vyle idol wherof lord sayd vnto deut 〈…〉 • ye shall suche thynge lorde testified israell iuda prophettes sears sayenge iere xxv • turne wycked wayes kepe cōmaundementes statute accordyng lawe whiche cōmaunded father whiche 〈◊〉 seruauntes prophettes notwithstandynge wolde heare deute 〈◊〉 • • 〈…〉 rather hardened theyr neckes lyke stubburnesse theyr father byleue lorde theyr god refused statute appoyntment made wt theyr father wytnesses whe • wytnessed vnto folowed vanite became vayne wente hethen rounde aboute cō cernyng lorde charged shulde lyke lefte cōmaundementes lorde theyr god made image mettal • reg 〈◊〉 • euen two calues made groues worshypped hoost heuen serued baall deute 〈◊〉 • sacrificed theyr sonnes theyr doughters fyre vsed wytchcrafte enchaūtementes ❀ euen sellyng themselues worke wyckednesse syght lord angre hym lorde excedynge wrothe israell put syghte 3 reg 〈◊〉 • lefte tribe iuda onely neuertheles iuda also kepte cōmaundementes lorde theyr god walked ceremony israel whiche made lorde cast vp seed israell vexed delyuered handes spoylers vntyll cast syght israell deuyded selues house dauid made kynge euen ieroboam son nabat ieroboam ❀ drew israel away shulde folowe lorde made synne great synne child israel walked al synnes ieroboam dyd departed therfrom vntyl lorde put israel away syght sayd seruauntes prophettes israel caried away theyr owne land assyria euen vnto day kynge assyria brought men babylon cutha aua hanath sepharuaim put cityes samaria steade chyldren israel possessed samaria dwelte cityes therof fortuned begynnyng theyr dwellyng feared lord lorde sent lyon among slue wherfore men sayd kyng assyria nacions thou hast translated put cityes samaria knowe lawe god lande therfore hath sent lyon vpon beholde sley bycause knowe maner god land kyng assyria cōmaunded sayeng carye thyther one preestes ye brought thence let hym go dwell teache fassy serue god countrey one preestes caryed thence came dwelte bethell taught shulde feare lorde howbeit euery nacion made goddes theyr owne putte house hyll aulters whiche samarians made euery nacion theyr cityes wherin dwelte men babylon made ☞ socoth benoth men euth made nergal men hamath made asima auites made nebbaz tharthak sepharuites burnt theyr child fyre adramelech anamelech god sepharuaim feated lorde made preestes hyll aulters sacrificed house hyll aulters feared lorde serued theyr owne god maner people caryed thence vn day olde maner neyther feare god neyther ☞ theyr owne ordynaunces customes lawe cōmaundement lorde cōmaunded chyldren iacob gen 32 e called israell lorde made appoyntment charged sayenge iudi vi b •• e x • feare none god bowe selues serue saerifice feare lorde whiche brought lande epypt great power stretched arme hym fere hym bow hym sacrifice statutꝭ ordinaūces lawe cōmaundement wrote se ye diligent euermore feare godꝭ appoyntment haue made se ye forget feare none god lorde god ye shall feare shall delyuer handes enemyes howbeit dyd herken dyd theyr olde custome nacions feared lorde serued theyr ymage also lyke dyd theyr chyldren theyr chyldrens chyldren euen dyd theyr father vnto day ¶ hezehia kynge iuda putteth downe brasen serpent • destroyeth idole selmanasar bryngeth israell assirians blasphemic sennacherib sanherib capi xviii thyrde yere hosca sonne ela kynge israel came passe hezckia sonne ahaz kyng iuda dyd reygne ii de 19 • twentye fyue yere olde began reygne reygned xxix yere ierusalem mother name also abi doughter zacharia dyd whiche ryght syght lorde accordyng dyd dauid father deuit 7 • 4 reg • 3 • put awaye hyll aulters brake ymages cut downe groues al brake 〈◊〉 〈◊〉 • brasen serpent moses made vnto dayes chyldren israel dyd burne sacrifice called ☞ nehustan trusted lorde god israell hym none lyke hym amonge kynges iuda neyther hym claue lord departed kepte cō maundementes whiche lorde cōmaunded moses lorde hym prospered thynges whiche toke hande rebelled agaynst kyng assyra serued smote philistine euen vnto aza coostꝭ therof ☞ castels kepte watch stronge cityes 4 〈◊〉 • fourth yere kyng hezekia whiche seuenth yere hosea son ela kyng israel fortuned salmanezar kynge assyria came vp agaynst samaria beseyged thre yeres toke euen syxte yere hezckia say nynth yere hosea kynge israell samaria wonne kynge assyria dyd carye away israel vnto assyria put halah habor ryuer gozan ritres medes bycause wolde herken vnto voyce lorde theyr god transgressed appoyntinent moses seruaunt lorde cōmaū ded wolde neyther heare 〈◊〉 par 22 〈◊〉 • 6 en • r 48 therfore xiiii yere kyng hezekia dyd sennacherib kynge assiria come vp agaynst strong cityes iuda toke hezekia kyng iuda sent kyng assyria lachis saynge • reg xii haue offended departe thou puttest wyl bere kynge assyria appoynted vnto hezekia kynge iuda thre hūdred talentes syluer thyrtie talentes golde 〈◊〉 • • hezekia gaue hym syluer founde house lorde treasure kyngꝭ house season dyd ☞ hezekia rent dores temple lorde pyllers sayde hezekia kynge iuda couered ouer gaue kynge assyria kyng assiria sent tharthan rabsaris rabsabe lachis kynge hezekia great hoost agaynst ierusalem went vp came ierusalem gat vppe stode conduyte vpper poole whiche way fuller felde called kyng came eliakim son elkia steward houshold sobna scribe ioah sonne asaph recorder rabsake sayd vnto tell ye hezekia pray thus sayth great kyng euen kyng assyria confidence thou hast doest thou speake suche lyghte worde dede counsayle power wyll redy make warre doest thou trust thou rebellest agaynst 〈◊〉 36 〈◊〉 ▪ • 9 • doest thou trust staffe broken rede egypte whiche yf man leane wyll go hande pearce euen pharao kyng egypt vnto trust hym 〈◊〉 32 • ye saye vnto trust lorde god whose hyll aulters aulters hezekia hath put downe hath sayde iuda 〈…〉 ierusalem ye shal worshyp 〈…〉 ierusalem therfore dely •• wordes lorde kynge assyria wyl delyuer two thousand horse yf thou able set rider vpō thynkest thou scorne presence one least duke maysters seruauntes trustest egypte charettes horesmen moreouer come nowe without byddynge lorde place destroy • lorde sayde go vp lande destroy eliakim sonne helkia sob na ioah sayd vnto rabsake speake praye thy seruauntes sirians language vnderstand ☞ talke v iues tonge eares people wal rabsake sayde vnto hath mayster sent thy mayster speake wordes hath sente bycause men syt wal may eate theyr owne donge drynke theyr owne pysse rabsake stode cryed loude voyce iues language spake sayeng heare sayenge great kynge assyria thus sayth kynge let hezekia begyle shall able delyuer myne hand neyther let hezekia make trust lorde saynge lorde shall surely delyuer v citye shal gyuē ouer haud kyng assyria herken vnto hezekia thus sayth kyng assyria ☞ deale kyndly come eate euery man owne vyne owne fyg tree drynke euery mā water owne well tyll come fetche good lande youres lande corne wyne lande breade vyneyardes lande oyle olyue tree hony ye maye lyue dye herken vnto hezekia begyleth sayenge lorde shall delyuer v •••• 〈◊〉 • hath euery one god nacions belyue red lande hande kyng assyria god hamath phad god sephatuaim hena iua dyd delyuer samaria myne hande god amonge god nacions hath delyuered lande myne hande shall lorde delyuer ierusalem myne hande people helde theyr peace answered hym worde kyng cōmaunded sayeng answere hym eliakim whiche stewarde householde sobna scrybe ioah sonne asaph recorder came hezekia ☞ theyr clothes rent tolde hym wordes rabsake capi xix ¶ angell lorde kylleth hundred four • score fyue thousande men asserians sennacherib kylled owne sonnes came passe kyng heze kia herde rent clothes put sacke came esai 37 • house lorde sent eliakim stewarde housholde sobna scribe▪ elders▪ preestes clothed sacke isay prophet sonne amoz sayde vnto hym thus sayth hezekia ☞ day day tribulacyon rebuke blasphemy chyldrē come byrth strength delyuered per aduenture lorde thy god wyl heare wordes rabsake kynge assyria mayster hath sent rayle lyuyng god rebuke hym wordes whiche lorde thy god hath herde lyfte thou vp thy prayer remenaunt lefte seruauntes kyng hezekia came isay isay sayde vnto shall ye say mayster thus sayth lorde afrayde wordes whiche thou hast herde whiche yonge men kynge assyria haue rayled beholde wyll put hym mynde shall heare tydynges returne owne lande esal 37 • wyll brynge passe shall fall vpon swerde pa 32 euen owne lande rabsake went backe agayne found kyng assyria fyghtynge agaynst lybna herde howe departed lachis herde men saye thirhaka kynge blacke more beholde come fyght agaynst departed sent messenger vnto hezekia saynge thus speake hezekia kyng iuda saynge let thy god deceyue thou trustest sayenge ierusalem shal delyuered hande kyng assyria beholde thou hast herde kynges assyria haue done landes haue vtterly destroyed shalte yu ❀ alone escape haue god hethen delyuered whiche myne aunseters haue destroyed gozan haran rezeph chyldren eden whiche bithiasat kyng hamath kynge arphad kyng citye sepharuaim hena iua hezekia receyued letter hande messenger red hezekia went vp house lorde layde abrode lorde hezekia prayed lorde sayd lorde god israell whiche dwellest bytwene cherub thou arte god alone ouer sl kyngdomꝭ earth thou hast made heuen earth lorde bow downe thyne eare heare open thou thyne eye beseche se heare wordes sennacherib whiche hath sent man rayle lyuyng god truth lorde kyngꝭ assyria haue destroyed nacyons theyr landes haue set fyre theyr goddes god worke handes man euen wood stone destroyed nowe therfore lorde god beseche saue thou v hande kyngdomes earth may knowe thou onely arte lorde god isay sonne amoz sent hezekia sayenge thus sayth lorde god israell thou hast prayed concernyng sen nacherib kyng assyria haue herde therfore worde lorde hath sayd hym ☞ vyrgyn euen doughter syon hathe despysed laughed scorne thou kynge assyria doughter ierusalem hathe shaken heade 〈…〉 math 〈◊〉 〈…〉 hast thou rayled hast thou blasphemed agaynst hast thou exalted thy voyce lyfted vp thyne eye hye euen agaynst holy israel ☞ hand messenger thou hast rayled lorde sayde multitude charettes come vp ☞ toppes mountaynes euen alonge sydes libanon wyll cut downe hye cedar tree lustye fyrre tree therof wyl go lodgyng nest wood playne haue dygged dronke straunge water step goyng wyl drye water pole beseyged hast thou herde haue ordeyned thyng great whyle go haue prepared begynnyng shall nowe bryng forth may destroy bryng strong cityes waste heapes stone enhabitours shal lytell power faynt herted confounded psal 〈◊〉 • shall lyke grasse felde grene herbe hay toppes house corne vnripe smytten blastyng know thy dwellyng thy comyng thy goynge ❀ thy vvay thy furye agaynst bycause thou ragest agaynst thynkst thy selfe blessed wyll put hoke thy nose thyrlles byt thy lyppes wyl brynge backe agayne waye thou camest shall sygne vnto hezekia ye shal eate yere suche thynges growe selues nexte yere suche come vp dyd growe theyr owne accorde thyrde yere sowe ye reape plante vyneyardes eate fruytes therof escaped lefte doughter iuda shall yet agayne take routynge downe warde beare fruyte vpwarde ierusalem shal go remenaūt nombre shall escape mount sion zele lorde hoostes shall brynge thynge passe wherfore thus sayeth lorde concernynge kynge assirya shall come citye shute arowe come shilde cast backe agaynst shal go backe agayne waye came shal come citye sayeth lorde wyll defende citye saue myne owne sake dauid seruauntes sake came passe selfe nyght angell lorde went smote hooste assiryans hundred foure score fyue thousand whē remenaunt vp early mornynge sawe deade corse •••• • sennacherib kynge assirya auoyded departed went agayne dwelte niniue fortuned temple worshyppynge nisroch god adramelech saresat owne sonnes smote swerde escaped lande armenia asathaddon sonne reygned steade ¶ hezekia sycke recayueth sygne health receyueth rewardes • oda • h reprehended isai bycause shewed hym treasure dyeth manasseh sonne reygneth steade capi xx aboute tyme hezekia sycke vnto death prophet isai ••• 32 f 〈…〉 sonne amoz came hym sayde vnto hym thus sayeth lorde ❀ put thyne housholde ordre thou shalte dye lyue hezekia turned face wall prayed vnto lorde saynge beseche lorde remembre haue walked trueth perfyte herte haue done good thy syght hezekia wepte sore fortuned that❀ isai gone myddle courte worde lorde came hym sayenge turne agayne tell hezekia captayne people thus sayeth lorde god dauid thy father haue herde thy prayer sene thy teares beholde wyll heale thyrde daye thou shalte go vp house lorde wyll adde vnto thy dayes yet fyftene yeare wyll delyuer citye hande kynge assirya wyll defende citye myne owne sake dauid seruauntes sake isai sayde take lompe fygges toke layde sore recouered hezekia sayde vnto isai shall sygne lorde wyll heale shall go vp house lorde thyrde daye isai answered sygne shalt thou haue lorde lorde wyll hath spoken eccle 48 • shall shadowe go forwarde ten degree go backe agayne ten degree hezekia answered lyght thynge shadow go downe ten degree ❀ neyther desyre yf shadowe go backewarde ten degree lyght thynge isai prophet called vnto lorde eccle 48 • brought shadow ten degree backwarde gone downe dyall ahaz esal 39 • ceason berodach baladan sonne baladan kyng babilon sent letter present vnto hezekia herde howe hezekia sycke hezekia glad shewed al treasure house syluer golde odour precyouse oyntment house armorye found treasure nothynge house realme hezekia shewed isai prophet came vnto kynge hezekia sayd vnto hym sayd men whence came hezekia sayd come far countrey euen babilō sayd agaynei haue sene thy house hezekia answered thyngꝭ house haue sene nothynge among treasure haue shewed isai sayd vnto hezekia heare worde lorde beholde dayes come thyne house whatsoeuer thy father haue layde vp store vnto day 4 〈◊〉 • xxv b iere xx • shall caryed babilon nothynge shall lefte sayeth lorde thy sonnes shall procede thou shalte beget shall take away shall chamberlaynes palace kynge babilon hezekia sayd vn isai welcome worde lorde whiche thou hast spoken sayde shall peace trueth dayes remenaunt wordes concerne hezekia power howe made poole conduyte brought water cytye wrytten booke cronicles kynges iuda • pat 32 • hezekia slept father math • • manasse sonne reygned steade ¶ wythed manasse restoreth agayne idol dyeth whose steade amon sonne sucredeth whiche kylled owne saruauntes hym reygneth faythfull iosia whorne vse call iosia • iosiah • capi xxi manasse •• 〈◊〉 32 • twelue yeare olde began reygne reygned fyftye fyue yeare ierusalem mother name also hephziba dyd euyll syghte lorde euen abhominacyons hethen deute 18 lorde caste oute chyldren israell went buylte vp hylaultees 4 reg 18 whiche hezekia father destroyed reared vp aulters baall made groues dyd ahab kynge israell worshypped hooste heuen serued buylte aulters house lorde whiche lorde sayde 11 r • vli b 3 reg 〈◊〉 b ierusalem wyll put name buylt aulters hooste heuen euen two courtes house lorde leuit xx drute 18 b • reg 16 offered sonne fyre gaue hede vnto witchcrafte forcery maynteyned worker spirytes teller fortune wrought moch wyckednesse syght lorde angre hym put ymage groue made euen temple whiche lorde sayd dauid salomon sonne 3 reg ix house ierusalem whiche haue chosen crybes israell wyll put name euer neyther wyll make feete israell moue lande whiche gaue theyr father wyll obserue haue commaunded accordynge lawe seruaunt moses commaunded herkened manasse led waye wyckedlye dyd people whome lord destroyed chyldren israell lorde spake seruauntes prophettes sayenge bycause manasse kynge iuda hath▪ done soche abhomynacyons hath wrought wyckedlye amorytes whiche hym dyd hath made iuda synne also idol therfore thus sayeth lorde god israell •• e xix • beholde wyl brynge euyll vpon ierusalem iuda heareth bothe eares shall tyngle wyll stretch ouer ierusalem ☞ squaryng lyne samaria plommet house ahab wyll wype ierusalem man wypeth dyshe hath wyped turneth vp syde downe wyll leaue remenaunt myne enherytaunce delyued hande theyr eneemyes shall robbed spoyled al theyr aduersaries euen bycause haue done euyll syght haue angred sence tyme father came egypt vnto daye manasse shed innocent bloode excedynge moche tyl repienysshed▪ ierusalem frō corner corner besyde synne wherwith made iuda syn euyll syght lorde rest wordes concerne manasse dyd synne synned wrytten booke cronicles kynges iuda manasse slept father buryed owne house euen garden uza amon son reygned steade •• p 〈…〉 amon xxii yeare olde began reygne reygned two yeare ierusalem mother name also mesulemeth doughter haruz iocba dyd euyll syght lorde father manasse dyd walked waye father walked serued ydols father serued worshipped forsoke lorde god father walked waye lorde seruaū te amon cōspyred agaynst hym slue kynge owne house people lande slue conspyred agaynst kynge amon people made iosia sonne kynge steade rest wordes concerne amon thynges dyd wrytten booke cronicles kynges iuda buryed hym sepulchre garden uza iosia sonne reygned steade ¶ iosia herde boke lawe sounde temple sendeth old • h prophetesse councell capi xxii iosia 〈…〉 viii yeare olde began reygne reygned xxxi yeare ierusalem mother name also iedida doughter adaia bozcath dyd ryght syght lorde walked wayes dauid father bowed neyther ryght hande lefte 〈…〉 came passe xviii yeare reygne kynge iosia kynge sent saphan sonne azalia sonne mesulan scrybe house lorde saynge 4▪ 〈…〉 go vp helkia hygh preest maye summe syluer whiche brought house lorde whiche kepers porche haue gathered people let delyuer hande worke haue ouersyght house lorde let gyue worke house lorde repayre decayed place temple euen vnto carpenter mason bye tymbre fre stoone repayre temple howebeit let rekenynge made money delyuered theyr hande theyr vse deale faythfullye ••• 34 c helkia hygh preest sayd vnto saphan scrybe ☞ haue founde boke lawe house lorde helkia gaue booke saphan red saphan scrybe came kynge brought hym worde agayne sayde thy seruauntes haue bestowed money founde temple haue delyuered vnto worke haue ouersyght house lorde saphan •• rybe shewed kynge sayenge helkia preest hath delyuered booke saphan red kynge fortuned kynge herde wordes booke lawe rent clothes kynge commaunded helkia preest ahikam sonne saphan achbor sonne machaia saphan scrybe asahia seruaunte kynges sayenge 〈◊〉 xxl • go ye enquyre lorde people iuda concernyng wordes booke founde greate wrath lorde kyndled agaynst v bycause father heue herkened vnto wordes booke accordynge vnto whiche wrytten therin v helkia hygh preest ahikam achbor saphan asahia went vnto hulda prophettesse wyfe sullam sonne chikua sonne harham keper wardrop whiche prophettesse dwelt ierusalem ☞ house doctryne cōmuned answered thus sayeth lorde god israell tell man sent thus sayeth lorde beholde wyll bryng euyll vpon place inhabytours therof euen wordes boke kynge iuda hath red bycause haue forsaken haue burnt incense vnto godes angre al workes theyr handꝭ wrath also shall kyndled agaynst place shall quenched kynge iuda whiche sent aske counsayle lorde shall ye saye thus sayeth lorde god israell touchyng wordꝭ whiche ye haue herde bycause thyne herte dyd melte bycause thou hast humbled thy selfe lorde thou herdest spake agaynst place agaynst enhabytours howe shulde destroyed cursed hast rent thy clothes wepte also haue herde sayth lorde behold therfore wyll receyue vnto thy father thou shalt put thy graue peace thyne eye shall se euyll whiche wyll brynge vpon place brought kynge worde agayne ¶ iossa redeth deuteronomie people putteth downe idolles kylled p •• r • te therof kepeth passeouer kylled magedo sonne iehoa az reygneth steade taken sonne iehoa • im iehoahaz sonne iosia anoynted hym made hym▪ kynge father steade iehoahaz xxiii year olde began reygne reygned thre monethes ierusalem mother name also hamiel doughter ieremia libna dyd euyl syght whiche foūde cytye hym scrybe captayne hooste whiche brought people lande warre thre score men people lande founde citie nabusaradan cheyfe captayne men warre toke brought kynge babylon ribla kynge babylon smote slue ribla lande hanath iuda caryed away theyr lande howe remayned people lande iuda nebuchadnezar kynge babylon lefte made gedalia son ahikam sonne saphan ruler ouer al captaynes sware men whome sayde vnto feare ye bycause ye seruauntes caldeyes dwell lande serue kyng babylon ye shall well chaunced seuenth moneth ismaell sonne nethania son elisama kynges bloode came ten men hym smote gedalia dyed dyd iues caldeyes hym mizpa people smalle great captaynis warre arose came egypte afrayde caldeyes notwithstandynge yet xxxvii yere ieoachin kynge iuda caryed awaye xxvii daye naara naara bare hym ahusam hepher themni hahastari sonnes naarah sonnes heleah zareth iezoar ethnan coz begat anub zobeba kynred ahathel sonne harum iabes honourable brother mother called name iabes saynge bycause bare hym sorow iabes called goddes israell sayenge thou wylte blesse dede enlarge coostes shalt let thyne hand wylt kepe euyl hurte god graunted hym desyre chelub brother suah begat barmi esthemoa maachathite sonnes symon amnon rimna benhanan thilon sonnes iissi zoheth benzoheth gene 38 • sonnes selah sonne iuda er father lecha laada father maresa kynreddes housholdes wrought lynnen house asbea iokim men chosebah ioas saraph whiche dominion moah iasubi lehem also wordes olde potter dwelte amonge tree hedge nygh vnto kyng bycause worke sonnes symeon nemuel iamin iarib zerah saull whose son sallum son hym mibsam sonne misma son misma hamuel sonne zachur son hym simei simei syxtene sonnes syxe doughters brother many chyldrē neyther kynred lyke childrē iuda multitude dwelt beerseba molada hazar suall bilha ezem tholad bethuel horma zikiag bethmarcaboth hazar susim bethbirei saaraun theyr cityes vnto reygne dauid theyr vyllages etan rimmon tochen asan fyue townes theyr village rounde aboute cityes vnto baal habitacion theyr genealogie mosobab iamlech iosa sonne amasia ioel iehu sonne iosibia son saraia son asiel elioenai iaakoba isoaia asaiah adiel isimiel benata ziza son schibhi son allo • son ieoaia son zemri son semaia famous captaynes theyr kynreds settyng vp greatly house theyr father went entryng gedor euen vnto east syde valley seke pasture theyr shepe founde fat pasture good wyde lande quyet fruytefull ham dwelte afore wrytten name came dayes hezekia kyng iuda smote tentes habitacions founde destroyed vtterlye vnto daye dwelte theyr rowmes bycause pasture theyr shepe chyldren symeon wente mount seyr euen fyue hundred men hauynge theyr captaynes phelathia nearia rephaia uziel sonnes isi smote rest amalekites escaped dwelte vnto day ¶ howbeit genealogye rekened byrthryght iuda preuayled aboue brother trybe came cheyfe byrthryght gyuen ioseph sonnes ruben eldest son israell henoch phalu hezron charmi sonnes ioel samaiah son gog son semhi sonne micah sonne reaia sonne baal son beera sonne thiglath philneser kynge assiria caryed awaye great lorde amonge rubenites whē brother theyr kynreddes rekened genealogye theyr generacions ieiel zachariah cheyfe bala sonne azan sonne sema son ioel dwelte aroer forth vnto nebo baalmeon east warde enhabited vnto entrynge wyldernesse ryuer euphzates moche cattell lande gilead dayes saul warred hagarites ouerthrowē theyr hande dwelt theyr tentes thorowout eastlande gilgal chyldren gad dwelte ouer agaynst lande basan euē vnto salcha basan ioel cheyfest sapham nexte ionai saphat theyr brother housholde theyr father michaell meosuesam seba iorah iahean zia eber seuē • te chyldren abihail sonne huri son ieroah son gilead son michael sonne iesisai sonne iahdo sonne buz ahi son abdiel manasse fyghtynge men able beare shelde swerde shute bowe exercised war euen foure fourtye thousande seuen hundred thre score went war fought hagarites ietur nephis nodab helped agaynst hagarites delyuered vnto theyr hande al cryed god battayle herde bycause put theyr trust hym toke theyr cattell theyr camel fyftye thousande two hundred fyftye thousande shepe two thousande ass soules men twentye thousande syxe hundred sonnes uzi izrahia sonnes izrahia michael obadia ioel iesiah fyue mē captaynes theyr generacions housholde theyr father syxe thyrtye thousande souldiours valcaunt men warre many wyues sonnes theyr brother among kynreddes isacar valeaunt men war rekened foure score seuen thousande sonnes beniamin bela becher iediel thre sonnes bela ezbon uzi uziel ierimoth iri fyue heades housholde theyr father men myght rekened genealogy xxii thousande xxxiiii sonnes becher zemira ioas eliezer elioenai omri ieremoth abia anathoth alamath al chyldren becher nombre theyr genealogye generacyons captaynes housholdes theyr father mē myght twentye thousande two hundred sonnes iediel bilhan sonnes bilhan iues beniamin ehud canaana zethan tharsis ahilahar sonnes iediell auncient heades men warre xvii thousande two hundred went harnessed battayle suppim hupim chyldren ir husites chyldren aher sonnes nephthali iahzie • gun iezer salum chyldren gene 〈◊〉 • bilha sonnes wyfe machir bare sonne called name pherez name brother zeres sonnes ulam rekem sonnes ulam bedan sonnꝭ gilead sonne machir sonne manasse syster molecath bare ieshud abieser mahelah sonnes semida ahiam sechem likchi antham sonnes ephraim suthalah whose sonne bered thahath sonne sonne eladah thahath son sabad son suthelah son eser elead men gath borne lande slue bycause come downe take away theyr cattel ephraim theyr father mourned many day brother came cōforte hym went wyfe conceyued bare hym son called name beria bycause went euyll housholde doughter seera buylte bethhoron nether also vpper uzan seera raphah sonne whose sonne reseph thelah whose sonne thahan sonne ladan sonne amihud sonne elisama son nun son iehosua theyr possession abhominacion bethel townes longed therto vnto east iaphlet sonnes semer ahi rohga iehubba aram sonnes brother helem zophah iimna seles amal sonnes zophah suah harnephar sual beri iimrah bezer hod sāma silsa iethran beera sonnes iether iephune pispa viii beniamin begatte bela eldest sonne asbel seconde aharah thyrd nohah fourth raphah fyfte sonnes bela adar gera abthud abisna naaman ahoha gera sephuphan huran sonnes ehud auncient heades among enhabitours geba caryed manahath naaman ahia gera whiche gera caryed away begat uza ahihud begat saharaim felde moab sent away husim also baarah wyues begat hodes wyfe iobab zibia meza malchā ieuz sachia mirma sonnes auncient father husim begat ahithob elpaal sonnes elpaal eber misaham samed buylte ono lod townes therof beria sema auncient father among enhabitours aialon draue away enhabitoures tabernacle theyr father hoost lorde kepte entryng phinehes sonne eleazar theyr foregyde lorde hym zacharia sonne meselemia kepte watche dore tabernacle witnesse chosen men kepe thresholdꝭ euen cc xii thorowout genealogi nombred theyr village dyd dauid samuel sear institute bycause theyr fidelite theyr chyldren ouersyght gate house lorde euen tabernacle kepe 〈◊〉 iii b iiii quarter dyd kepe watche towarde east west north south theyr brother remayned countrey came vii dayes tyme tyme wt leuites whiche ouersyght vestry treasure house god vnder custody foure notable porter rounde house god bicause kepyng therof perteyned keyes open euery mornyng certayne rule ministryng vessel brought tale appoynted ouerse vessel ornamentes sanctuary flour wyne oyle franki • sence swete odour certayne sonnes preestes made oyntmentes swete odour mathathia one leuites whiche eldest son sallum corathite ouersyght thynges made fryenge pan theyr brother sonnes cahath ouersyght shewbreade whiche prepayred euery sabboth syngers euen auncient father leu • te dwelt seperate chambres fre day night auncient father leuites theyr generacions dwelte ierusalem gibeon dwelt abi gibeon iehiel whose wyfe called maacha eldest son abdon zur ci baal ne • nadab gedor ahio zacharia mikloth mikloth begat simeā also dwelte wt theyr brother ierusalem euen harde ner begat ci • regū 〈◊〉 • 〈◊〉 1 • • ci begat saul saul begat iehonathas malchisua abinadab esbaal son ionathas meribbaal meribbaal begat micah sonnes mirah pithon melech chahrea ahaz begat iahra iahra begat alameth asmaneth zimri zimri begat moza moza begat binea whose son rephaia sonne elasa sonne azell azell syxe sonnes whose name azricam bochru ismael searia obadia hanan sonnes azel ¶ battayle saull agaynst philistine whiche dyeth sonnes also capi x philistine fought agaynst israel 1 〈◊〉 〈◊〉 men israell fled philistine ouerthrowen wounded mounte gilboa philistine folowed fearce saul sonnes philistine smote iehonathas abinadab malchisua sonnes saul battayle went sore agaynst saul archer founde hym wounded shuters sayd saull weapon berer iud • 〈◊〉 g 1 reg 3 • b drawe thy swerde thrust thorowe therwith vncircumcysed come shame weapon berer wolde feared excedingly saul caught swerde fell vpon ha • ne berer sawe saul deade fell swerde also dyed thus saul thre sonnes house dyed togyther whē men israel valley▪ sawe howe fled saull sonnes deade forsoke theyr cityes ran away philistine came dwelte • ▪ regū 3 • • fortuned morow philistine came strype deade body founde saull sonnes ouerthrowen mount gilboe whē strypte hym toke heade harnesse sent lande philistine rounde aboute shewe vnto theyr ydols people put harnesse house theyr god set vp heade temple dagon al iabes gilead herde philistine done saull arose strongest fet away body saull bodyes sonnes brought iabes buryed bodyes vnder ooke iabes fasted seuen dayes saul dyed trespasse trespassed agaynst lorde kepte worde lorde sought asked counsayle womā wrought spirite asked lorde therfore slue hym turned kyngdom vnto dauid sonne isai ¶ death saull dauid anoynted hebron • busites rebell agaynst dauid whiche taketh • oure sion men nombred capi xi israell gathered selues dauid vnto hebron •• reg v • saynge behold thy bone thy flesshe ouer tyme past euen whē saul kyng thou leddest israel lorde thy god sayde vnto thou shalte fede people israell thou shalte captayne ouer people israel therfore came al elder israel kyng hebron dauid made couenaunt hebron lorde anoynted dauid kyng ouer israel • reg 1 • • accordyng worde lorde ☞ hande samuel dauid israel went ierusalem whiche iebus iebusites enhabitours lande enhabitours iebus sayde dauid thou comest neuerthelesse dauid wan castell sion whiche called citye dauid dauid •• reg▪ 〈…〉 sayde euer smyteth iebusites fyrst shall principall captayne lorde ioab sonne z • ruia wente fyrst vp made cheyfe captayne dauid dwelt castell therfore called citye dauid buylte citye euery syde euen millo rounde ioab repayred rest citye dauid prospered waxed great lorde hoostes hym ii reg 〈…〉 principall men power dauid claue hym kyngdom israell make hym kyng according word lorde vnto israel nombre mighty men dauid iasobeam sonne hachmoni cheyfe amonge thyrtye lyfte vp spere agaynst thre hundred wounded one tyme hym eleazar vncles son ahothyte whiche one thre myghtyest dauid pasdammin philistine gathered togyther battayle ther parcell grounde full barley people fled philistine ☞ stepte forth myddes felde saued slue philistine lorde gaue great victorye thre thyrtye cheyfe captaynes went rocke dauid caue adullam hoost philistine abode valley rephaim dauid holde philistine watche bethleē tyme dauid longed sayd 〈…〉 oh one wolde gyue drynke water well gate bethleem thre brake thorowe hoost philistine drewe water well ga • e bethleem toke brought dauid neuerthelesse dauid wolde drynke rather offered lorde sayde god forbyd shulde thynge shall drynke bloode men haue put theyr lyues ieoperdye ieoperdye theyr lyues brought therfore wolde drynke dyd thre myghtyest ab • sai brother ioab also captayne among thre lyft • vp speare agaynst thre hundred wounded name amonge thre yea amonge thre honourable two theyr captayne howbeit attaynted vnto ❀ fyrst thre banaia sonne iehoiaba sonne verye stronge man dyd greater actes cabzeell slue two stronge lyon moab went downe slue lyon pyt tyme snowe slue egyptian whose stature euen fyue cubytes longe egyptian hand speare lyke weauers beame went downe hym waster plucked speare egyptian hande slue hym owne speare soch thynges dyd banaia sonne iehoiada name among thre myghtest honourable amonge thyrtye attayned vnto fyrst thre dauid made hym counsayle men armes asahell brother ioab elhanan vncles sonne bethleem sammoth harodite helez pelonite ira sonne • kes thekoite abieser anatothite siba • ai husathite ilai ahohite maharai nethophathite heled son ba • na nethophatite ithai sonne ribai gibea perteyneth chyldren beniamin benaia phirathonite hu • ai ryuers gaas abiell arbathite azmaneth baharumite elihaba saalbonite sonnes assem gezonite iona sonne sage haraite ahiam sonne sacar ha • aite eliphal sonne ur hepher mecherathite ahia pelonite hezro carmelite naari sonne ezbai ioell brother nathan mi • har sonne hari zelegam ammonite naharai berothite bearet harnesse ioab son zeruia ira iithrite gareb iethrite uria hethite zahad sonne ahlai adina sonne siza rubenite captayne rubenites thyrtye hym hanan sonne maacah iosaphat mithanite uria astherath • te sama iehiell sonnꝭ hothan aroerite iediell sonne zimri ioha brother hathizite eliell mahanyte ieribai iosaia sonnes elnaam • hma moabite eliel obed iasiell mesobaite ¶ went dauid • led saull capi xii came dauid ziklag whyle yet kept hym self close bycause saull sonne ci stronge helper battayle weapened bowes could hurle stone ryght hande lefte shute arowes oute bowe saul brother euen beniamin cheyfest ahiezer ioas sonnes simaa gibeonite ieziell pelet sonnes asmaneth beracah iehu anathoth ismaia gilbeonite myghtye man amonge thyrtye thyrtye ieremiah iehaziell iohanan iosabad gedor ele • sai ierimoth bealia semaria seaphatia haraphites elcana iesia aza • aell ioezet iosebeā hakorim ioela zebadiah sonnes ieroam gedud gadites separated selues vnto dauid holde wyldernes men myght men apte warre coulde handle shylde speare whose face lyke face lyon swyfte r •• mountaynes ezer fyrste obdia seconde eliab thyrde masmana fourth ieremia fyfte atthai syxte eliell seuenth iohanan eyght elsabath nynth ieremia tenth machbaonai eleuenth sonnꝭ gad captaynes ouer men warre small pursued hundred greate thousande went ouer iordane fyrst moneth wh •• fylled ouer bankes put flyght valleye bothe towarde east west came chyldren ben • min iuda holde vnto dauid dauid went mete answered sayd vnto yf ye come peaceable lye vnto helpe myne herte shall knyt vnto yf ye come betray myne aduersaryes seynge wyckednesse myne handꝭ god father loke theron rebuke spiryte came vpon amasai whiche cheyfe amonge thyrtye sayde thy • e dauid thy syde thou sonne isai • ode xii • peace peace vnto peace thy helper thy god thy • e helpe dauid receyued made heades companyes men warre fell manasse dauid came philistine agaynst saull battayle • reg 2 • • helped lordes philistine toke aduysement sent hym awaye agayne saynge wyll fall mayster saull ieoperdye heades went zikleg fel manasse adna iozadad iediell michael iozabad elihu zilthai heades thousandes manasse helped dauid agaynst rouers al myghtye men war captaynes hoost tyme came one dauid day day helpe hym vntyl great hoost lyke hooste god nombre cheyfe captaynes prepared battayle came dauid hebron turne kyngdom saull hym accordynge worde lorde chyldren iuda bare shylde speare vi eyght hundred redy prepared war chyldren symeon men myght war vii one hundred chyldren leui foure thousande syxe hundred ieo • ada cheyfe aaron hym iii seuen hundred zadocke yonge man stronge valiaunt father housholde xxii captaynes chyldren beniamin brother saull iii great parte dyd vnto tyme folowe house saull chyldren ephraim xx eyght hundred myghtye men war famous men housholde theyr father halfe trybe manasse xviii thousande whiche appoynted name come make dauid kynge chyldren isacar men vnderstandynge ryght tyme know ❀ hovv cōmaunde israell ought heades two hundred al theyr brother theyr wyll zabulō went battayle proceded forth war maner instrumentes war fyftie prepared war without doublenesse herte nephthali thousande captaynes shylde speare xxxvii dan prepared battayle xxviii syxe hundred asse • went war kepte forefront battayle fourtye thousande syde iordane rubenites gaddites halfe trybe manasse maner instrumentes war hundred twentye thousande men warre kepynge forefront battayle perfyte herte came hebron make dauid kynge ouer israell rest israell one accorde make dauid kynge dauid thre dayes eatynge drynkynge theyr brother prepared moreouer nygh vntyll isacar zabulō nephthali brought bread ass camel mule ox meate floure fygges raysyns wyne oyle ox shepe aboundantlye ioye israell ¶ arke brought agayne kiriath ia • • ierusalem • z • otherwyse called osa dyeth capi xiii dauid counsayled captaynes thousandes hundred lordes sayde vnto congregacyon israell yf seme good lorde god wyl take sende vnto oure brother lefte lande israell also preestes leuites whiche theyr cytyes suburbes togyther togyther vnto v wyll brynge agayne arke lorde v regarded dayes saull congregacyon content shuld thynge semed good eye people dauid gathered israell togyther ☞ sihor egypt vnto entrynge hemath brynge arke lorde kiriath iarim dauid went vp israell hygh place towarde kiriath iarim iuda fet thence arke lorde god dwelleth bytwene cherub name called caryed arke god new carte house abinadab uza brother gyded carte dauid israell playde arke god al theyr myght syngynge harpes psalte • e tymbrels trompettes came vnto thresshynge floore chidon uza put forth hande holde arke ox ❀ beynge lytle vvylde stombled lorde wrothe uza smote hym bycause put hande arke dyed byfore god dauid quiet bycause lorde rent rent uza called name place • eynge uza vnto daye dauid afrayde god daye sayenge howe shall brynge arke god home dauid brought arke home hym cytye dauid caryed house obed edom gethite arke god remayned wt obed edom euen house thre monethes lorde blessed house obed edom ¶ hiram sendeth woode workman dauid whiche hath two victoryis philistine capi xiiii hiram kynge tire sent messenger dauid tymbre cedar tree mason carpenter buylde hym house dauid perceyued lorde confyrmed hym kynge vpon israell kyngdom lyfte vpon hygh bycause people israell dauid toke yet mo wyues ierusalem begat mo sonnes doughters name chyldren borne vnto hym ierusalem samua sobab nathan salomon iibhar elisua elipalet noga nepheg iaphia elisama beeliada eliphalet philistine herde dauid anoynted kynge vpon israel philistine went vp seke dauid dauid herde went agaynst philistine came praunsed thorowe valley rephaim dauid asked counsayle god sayenge shall go agaynst philistine wylte thou delyuer myne hande lorde sayde vnto hym go vp wyll delyuer thyne hande came vp baall perazim dauid smote dauid sayde god hath deuyded myne enemyes myne hande man wold deuyde water therfore called name place ☞ baall perazim lefte theyr goddes dauid gaue cōmaundement burnt fyre philistine came togyther agayne russhed valley dauid asked agayne god god sayde hym go vp turne away frō thou mayest come vpon ouer agaynst peertrees thou hearest sound go toppꝭ peertrees go battayle god gone forth smyte hoost philistine dauid therfore dyd god cōmaūded hym smote hooste philistine gibeon gazer fame dauid went al landꝭ lorde made nacyons feare hym ¶ • enites brynge arke agayne dauid daunsynge dispysed wyfe michou capi xv dauid made house cytye dauid prepared place arke god pytched tent dauid sayde arke god ought caryed leuites hath lorde chosen beare arke lorde minyster vnto hym euer dauid gathered israell togyther ierusalem fetche arke lorde vnto place whiche ordeyned dauid brought togyther chyldren aaron leuites sonnes cahath uriell cheyfe brother hundred xx chyldren merari asaia cheyfe brother two hundred xx sonnꝭ gersom ioell cheyfe brother hundred thyrtye chyldren elizapan semaia cheyf brother two hūdred sonnꝭ hebron eliel cheyfe brother lxxx sonnꝭ uziel aminadab cheyfe brother hundred xii dauid called zadock abiathar preestes leuites uziell asaia ioell semaia eliell aminadab▪ sayde vnto ye princypal father leuites se ye holy brother ye may brynge arke lord god israell vnto place haue prepared ☞ bycause ye fyrst lorde god made rent amonge v sought hym fassyon ought preestꝭ leuites sanctifyed selues fet arke lorde god israell chyldrē leuites bare arke god vpon theyr shoulder wt staues theron moses cōmaūded accordynge worde lorde dauid spake cheyfe heades leuites shuld appoynt certayne theyr brother synge instrumentꝭ musycke psaltries harpes symbals myght make sound synge hygh ioyfulnesse leuites appoynted h • mā son ioell brother asaph son berechia sonnes merari theyr brother ethan son c • saiah • theyr brother seconde degree zucharia ben iaaziell se •• ramoth iehiell unni eliab benaiahu maasiah mathathiahu eliphalehu mikniah • obed edom iaiell porter hema • asaph ethan syngers made sounde symbals brasse zacharia aziel semeramoth iehiell unni eliab maasaiahu banaiahu played psaltryes ☞ alamoth mathachtahu eliphalehu mikniahu obed edom ieiell azaziah playd vpon harpes eyght aboue courage chenamahu cheyf leuites mayster songe taught syng bycause man vnderstandyng berechia el • ana kepte dore arke • caniahu iehosaphat▪ nethanaell amasai zacha • iahu bana • ahu eliezer preestes dyd blowe trompettes arke god obed edō iehia kepers dore arke •• reg vi c elder israell captaynes ouer thousandes went fet arke appoyntment lorde house obed edom gladnesse god helped leuites bare arke apoyntment lorde offered seuen ox seuen rammꝭ dauid hym lynnen garmente lyke also leuites bare arke syngers chenania ruler songe syngers dauid vpon hym ephod lynnen israell brought arke lordes couenaunt shoutynge blowynge shaume trompettꝭ makyng noyse symbals psaltryes harpes arke appoyntment lorde came cytye dauid micholl doughter saull lokynge wyndowe sawe kynge dauid daunsyng playenge despysed hym herte ¶ dauid ordeyneth asaph brother minister lorde selfe prayseth lorde god israel capi xvi brought arke god set myddes tente dauid pytched offered burnt sacrifyces peaceofferynges god dauid made ende offerynge burntofferynges peace offerynges blessed people name lorde delte israell bothe man woman cracknell breade good pece flesshe flacket wyne appoynted certayne leuites minyster lorde repeate thanke prayse lorde god israell asaph cheyfe nexte hym zacharia ieiell semeramoth iehiell mathathia eliab benaia •• reg vi b obed ehom iehiell psalteres harpes asaph made sounde symbals banaiahu iahaziell preestes blew trompettes continuallye arke couenaunt god tyme dauid dyd appoynt cheyfelye thanke lorde asaph brother psal 〈◊〉 • esai xi • • gyue thankꝭ vnto lorde cal vpon name make actes knowen amonge people synge vnto hym playe vnto hym talke wonderfull dedes reioyse holy name let hertes seke lorde glad seke lorde strength seke presence alwaye remembre maruels whiche dyd wonder iudgementꝭ mouth seede israell seruauntes chyldren iacob chosen lorde god landes iudgementꝭ thynke apoyntment euer worde cōmaunded generacyons whiche made abraham othe isaac whiche set iacob decree israell euerlastynge couenaunt sayenge wyll gyue lande canaan porcyon enherytaunce▪ ye small nombre soiourners therin walked frō nacyon nacyon one kyndome people suffered man wronge rebuked euen kyngꝭ theyr sake touche myne anoynted prophettes harme psal 〈…〉 synge vnto lorde earth shew day day saluacion tell glorye amonge heathen wonderfull dedes amonge nacyons greate lorde worthy praysed excedyngly feared aboue goddes god people vallue lorde made heuen prayse honour presence▪ strength gladnesse place ascribe vnto lorde ye kynreds people ascrybe lorde glorye dominyō ascribe vnto lorde glorye due vnto name brynge sacrifyces come hym worshyp lorde holy honour ☞ let earth feare hym althoughe compasse earth stablysshed moued let heuens reioyse let earth glad let men tell amonge nacyons lorde kynge let see thū der fulnesse therof let feldes reioyse therin shall tree wood reioyse presēce lorde bycause cōmeth iudge earth gyue thankes vnto lorde good mercye endureth euer saye ye saue v god saluacyon gather v togyther delyuer v amonge heathen maye gyue thankes thy holy name triumphe prayse blessed lorde god israell euer euer let people say amen prayse lorde lefte befor • • arke lordes couenaunt asaph brother ministre arke cōtinually soch thynges done daye daye ❀ theyr course obed edom brother lxviii obed edom son ieduthun hosa appoynted porter zadocke preest brother preestes tabernacle lorde hygh place gibeon offer burntofferynges vnto lorde vpon burntofferynge aulter perpetually mornynge euenynge accordynge whiche wrytten lawe lorde whiche cōmaunded israel heman ieduthun chosen whose name expressed gyue thankes lorde mercye lasteth euer dyd heman ieduthun synge trompettes symbals kynge swete melody instrumentes musycke goodly songes sonnes ieduthun porter people departed euery man house dauid returned ☞ blesse house ¶ dauid forbydden buylde house vnto lorde chryst promysed vnder fygure salomon capi xvii fortuned dauid dwelt house sayd nathā prophet loo dwell 〈…〉 house cedar tree arke lordes couenaūt remayneth vnder curtaynes nathan sayde dauid thyne herte god nyght tuned worde god came nathan saynge go tell dauid seruaunt thus sayth lorde thou shalte buylde house dwell haue dwelte house sence daye brought chyldren israell vnto day haue gone tent tent one habytacyon whersoeuer haue walked israell spake euer one worde iudges israell cōmaunded fede people sayenge haue ye buylde house cedar tree nowe therfore thus shalte thou saye vnto seruaunt dauid thus sayeth lorde hoostes toke pasture thou wentest shepe thou shuldest captayne ouer people israell haue ben whyther soeuer thou hast walked haue weded thyne enemyes thy syght haue made name lyke name ❀ one greatest men earth haue ordeyned place people israel made fast nowe may dwel theyr place moue neyther shall chyldren wyckednesse vexe begynnyng sence tyme commaunded iudges ouer people israell haue subdued thyne enemyes tolde lorde wolde buylde house also shall come passe thy dayes expyred thou must go vnto thy father wyll rayse vp thy seede whiche shall thy sonnes wyll prepare hym kyngdome shall buylde house wyll stably seate euer wyll father shall son wyll take mercy away hym toke away hym wyll set hym • house kyngdome euer seate shall sure euermore accordynge wordes accordyng visyon dyd nathan tell kynge dauid dauid kynge came sat lorde sayd lorde god myn house thou hast promoted thus farre yet semed lyttle thyne eye god thou haste also spoken thy seruauntꝭ house great whyle come haste loked vpon vpon man hygh degree lorde god shall dauid desyre honoure thy seruaunt thou haste knowen thy seruaunte lorde thy seruauntes sake euen accordyng thyne owne herte hast thou done magnifycence shew great thyngꝭ lorde none lyke neyther god saue thou accordyng haue herde wt oure eares moreouer nacyon earth lyke thy people israell god hath vouchsafed come redeme owne people make name excellencie terriblenes castyng nacyons thy people thou hast delyuered egypt people israell dydest thou make thyne owne people euer thou lorde becamest theyr god therfore lorde let thynge thou hast spoken cōcernyng thy seruaunt house true euer thou thou hast sayd let come passe thy name maye magnifyed euer may sayd lorde hoostes god israell euen god israel house dauid thy seruaunt endureth stable thou god hast tolde thy seruaunt thou wylt buyld hym house therfore thy seruaūt hath founde herte praye nowe lorde thou arte god hast promised goodnesse vnto thy seruaunt therfore let thy pleasure blesse house thy seruaunt maye contynue euer thou blessest lorde blessed euer ¶ battayles dauid agaynst philistine capi xviii fortuned dauid smote philistine subdued toke geth townes •• r • v ••• • longed therto hande philistinꝭ smote moab moabites became dauids seruauntes payde hym tribute dauid smote hadadezer kynge zoba vnto hanath went stablysh dominyon ryuer euphrates dauid toke hym charettes vu horse men xx foreman lamed charet horse reserued hundred charettꝭ sirians damasco came helpe hadadezer kynge zoba dauid slue sirians xxii dauid subdued siria damasco sirians became dauids seruauntes brought hym trybute lorde preserued dauid went dauid toke scheldes golde seruauntes hadadezer brought ierusalem tebhath chun cytyes hadadezer brought dauid excedyng moche brasse wher salomon made brasen lauatorye 3 regsi 7 b iere iii • pyllers vessel brasse tou kynge hemath herde howe dauid beaten strength hadadezer kynge zoba sent haduram son kynge dauid make peace hym blesse hym bycause fought agaynste hadadezer beaten hym tou war hadarezer ioram brought maner iuels golde syluer brasse kynge dauid dedy cated vnto lorde syluer golde brought al nacyons edom moab frō chyldren ammon philistinꝭ amalec abisai son zeruia siue edomites salte valley xviii put souldyours edom edomites became dauids seruauntes thus lorde kept dauid toke hande dauid reygned ouer israell executed iudgement ryghteousnesse among al people ioab son zaruia ouer hoost iohosaphat son ahilud recorder sadocke son ahitob abimelech sonne abiathar preestes sauesa scrybe banaiahu sonne iehoiada ouer crethites phelethites eldest sonnes dauid nexte vnto kynge ¶ hanon kynge sonnes ammon great iniurye seruauntes dauid capi xix chaunced •• 〈◊〉 • nahas kynge chyldren ammon dyed son reygned steade dauid sayde wyll shewe kyndnesse vnto hanon sonne nahas bycause father delte kyndly dauid sent messenger conforte hym ouer death father seruauntes dauid came lande chyldren ammon hanō conforte hym lordꝭ chyldren ammon sayde hanon thynkest thou dauid doth honoure thy father thy syght hath sent conforters vnto seruauntes come searche loke spye lande wherfore hanon toke dauids seruauntes ❀ polde shaued cut theyr cootes herde theyr buttockes sent away went certayne tolde dauid howe men serued kynge sent mete men excedynglye shamed kynge sayde tarye iericho vntyll beerdes growen returne chyldren ammon sawe stanke syght dauid hanon chyldren ammon sent talentes syluer hyre charettes horseman mesopotamia siria maacha zoba hyred xxxii charettes kynge maacha people came pytched meoba chyldren ammon gathered selues togyther theyr cytyes came battayle dauid herde sent ioab hooste stronge men chyldren ammon came put selues araye battayle gate citye kynges come kepte selues backe felde ioab also saw fronte battayle agaynst hym behynde chose chosen men israell put araye agaynst sirians rest people deliuered vnto hande abisai brother put selues araye agaynst chyldren ammon sayd yf sirians stronge thou shalt succoure yf chyldren ammon preuayle agaynst wyll helpe plucke vp thyne herte let v play men people sake cytyes god lorde shall good owne syght ioab people hym drue nygh sirians vnto battayle fled hym chyldren ammon sawe sirians fled ran awaye lykewyse abisai brother gat cytye ioab came ierusalem sirians sawe put worse israel sent messenger fet sirians beyonde ryuer sophach captayne hoost hadadezer went tolde dauid gathered israell went togyther ouer iordane came set vpon dauid put hym selfe araye agaynst sirians fought hym sirians fled israell dauid destroyed sirians vii charettes xl foote men kylled sophach captayne hooste seruauntes hadadezer sawe put worse israell made peace dauid became seruauntes neyther wolde sirians helpe chyldren ammon ¶ thre moost victoryous battayle • dauid capi xx came passe yeare expyred • reg xi aboute tyme kynges go warre fare ioab caryed armye hoost 〈…〉 destroyed countrey chyldren ammon came beseyged rabha dystroyed dauid taryed ierusalem whyle ioab smote rabha destroyed • reg xii g dauid toke crowne theyr kynge heade founde weyght talent golde precyous stone ordeyned dauids heade brought also excedynge moche spoyle city brought people tormēted sawes harowes yron sharp instrumentes delte dauid al cytyes chyldren ammō •• uid people came agayne ierusalem •• reg 〈◊〉 • fortuned arose war gazer philystines tyme sobocai husathite siue sippa • chyldrē gene 14 • rephaim subdued battayle agayne wt philistine elhanan son iair slue lahemi brother goliath gethite whose spere lyke weauers beame chaūced yet agayne war geth man great stature xxiiii fyngers toos syxe euery hande syxe euery foote son raphath defyed israell iehonathan son simea dauids brother slue hym borne vnto raphah geth ouerthrowen hande dauid hande seruauntes dauid causeth people nombred • •• dyeth lxx thousand men pestylence capi xxi satan stode vp agaynst israell prouoked dauid nombre israell dauid sayde ioab ruler people go ye nombre israel beer seba dan bryng may know nombre ioab answered lorde make peple hundred tymes many mo lorde kynge lordes seruaūtes doth lorde requyre thynge wyll lorde cause trespasse israell neuerthelesse kyngꝭ worde preuayled agaynst ioab ioab departed walked thorowout israel came ierusalem agayne gaue nombre counte people vnto dauid israell thousand thousande hundred thousand men drue swerde iuda cccclxx men drue swerde leuites beniamin coūted amonge kyngꝭ worde abhomynable ioab lorde dyspleased wt thyng smote israell dauid sayde vnto god haue synned excedynglye doynge thynge nowe beseche 〈…〉 wyckednesse thy seruaunt 〈…〉 done foolyshlye lorde spake vnto gad dauids seat sayenge go tell dauid sayenge thus sayeth lorde gyue thoyse thre thynges chose one maye vnto gad came dauid sayde vnto hym thus sayeth lorde chose eyther thre yeares famyshment thre monethes destroyed thyne aduersaryes swerde thyne enemyes maye ouertake el swerde lorde pestilence lande thre dayes angell lorde destroyenge thorowout coostes israell nowe aduyse thy selfe worde shall brynge agayne sent dauid sayd vnto gad excedynge strayte let fall nowe hande lorde passynge greate mercyes let fall hande men lorde sent pestylence vpon israell ouerthrowen israel lxx men god sent angel ierusalem destroy aboute destroy lorde behelde cōpassyon wretchednes sayde angell destoyed ynough let thyne hande cease angell lorde stode thresshynge floure ornan iebusyte dauid lyfte vp eye sawe angell lorde stande bytwene earth heuen hauynge drawen swerde hand stretched towarde ierusalem dauid elder israell whiche clothed sacke fell vpon theyr face dauid sayde vnto god commaunded people nombred haue synned done euyll indede haue shepe done let thyne hande lorde god father house thy people shulde punyshed angel lorde commaunded gad saye dauid dauid shulde go vp set vp aulter vnto lorde thresshyng floure ornan iebusyte dauid went vp accordynge sayenge gad spake name lord ornan turned sawe angell foure sonnes hym hyd selues ornan thresshynge wheat dauid came ornan ornan loked sawe dauid went thresshynge floure bowed hym selfe dauid face grounde dauid sayde ornan gyue place thresshynge floure may buylde aulter therin vnto 〈◊〉 lorde thou shalte gyue moche money worthe plage maye cease people ornan sayde vnto dauid take let lorde kynge semeth good eye loo gyue ox also burntsacrifyces thresshynge sleddes wood wheate meatofferynge gyue kynge dauid sayd ornā wyll bye asmoch money worth wyll take whiche thyne lorde offer burntofferynges without cost dauid gaue ornan place sycles golde vt hundred weyght dauid buylte aulter vnto lorde offered burntofferynges peaceofferyngꝭ called vpon lorde herde hym heuen fyre vpon aulter burntofferynge lorde spoken angell put swerde agayne shethe tyme dauid sawe lorde herde hym thresshyng floure ornan iebusite vsed offer tabernacle lorde whiche moses made wyldernesse aulter burntofferyng reason hyll gibeon dauid coulde go aske coūsayle god aferde swerde angell lorde ¶ dauid wylleth sonne salomon buyld temple lorde thynge hym selfe forbyden capi xxii dauid sayd house lorde god aulter burntofferynge israell dauid cōmaunded gather togyther straungers lande israell set mason hewe free stoone buyldynge house god dauid prepared plentye yron nayles dores gate ioyne aboundance brasse without weyght cedar tree without nombre zidons tyre brought moche cedar wood dauid dauid sayd salomon son yonge tender house buylte lorde must excede greatnesse may spoken praysed al landꝭ wyl therfore make ordynaūce dauid prepared many thyngꝭ death called salomon son charged hym buylde house lorde god israell dauid sayde salomon ii 〈◊〉 3 regū •• sonne thought myne herte buylde house vnto name lorde god worde lorde came sayenge thou hast shed moch blood hast •• great battayles thou shalt therfore buyld house vnto name thou hast shed moche bloode vpon earth syght beholde sonne borne shall man rest wyll gyue hym rest enemyes rounde aboute name ☞ salomon wyll sende rest peace vpon israell dayes shall buylde house name shalbe sonne wyl father wyll prepare seate kyngdome vpon israel euer therfore son lorde prospere thou buylde house name lorde thy god hath sayde lorde shall gyue wysdome vnderstandyng shall gyue cōmaundementes israel ye may kepe lawe lorde thy god thou shalte prospere euen thou takest hede fulfyllest statute lawes whiche lorde charged moses israell plucke vp thyne herte therfore stronge dreade discouraged beholde myne aduersite haue also prepared house lord hundred thousande talentes golde thousande thousande talentes syluer brasse yron nombred moche haue prepared tymbre stone thou mayste prouyde therto moreouer thou hast workemen ynowe mason carpenter worke stone tymbre many men actiue euery worke golde syluer brasse yron nombre therfore doynge lorde shall dauid cōmaunded lordes israell helpe salomon sonne sayenge lorde god hath gyuen rest euery syde hath gyuen enheritoures lande myne hande lande subdued lorde people nowe therfore set hertes soules seke lorde god buylde ye temple lorde god brynge arke couenaunt lorde holy vessel god house buylte name lorde ¶ dauid beynge olde ordeneth salomon kynge causeth leuyit • nombred assygneth theyr office capi xxiii dauid olde full dayes • regū c made salomon son kynge ouer israell gathered togyther lordes israel preestes leuites leuites nombred frō age xxx yere aboue nombre summe xxxviii thousande men whiche xxiiit thousande set forther worke house lorde syxe thousande offycers iudges foure thousande porter foure thousand praysed lorde suche instrumentes ☞ made prayse withall dauid put ordre among chyldren leui gerson cahath merari gersonites laadan semei sonnes laadan cheyfe iehiel zethan ioel thre sonnes semei selomith haziel haran thre auncient father laadan sonnes semei iahath zina ieus beria foure sonnes semei iahath cheyfe zina seconde ieus beria many sonnes therfore one rekenynge accordyng theyr father householde rekened one auncient housholde sonnes cahath amram izahar hebron uziel foure exodi 〈◊〉 • • 〈◊〉 • sonnes amram aaron moses aaron separated haue rule holy thynges place holy sonnes euer burne insence lorde ministre vnto blesse name euer moses also man god chyldren named tribe leui sonnes moses gerson eliezer sonnes gerson • buell cheyfe sonnes eliezer rehabia cheyfe eliezer none sonnes sōnes rehabia many sonnes izahar salomith theyfe sonnes hebron ieriahu fyrst amaria seconde iahaziel thyrd iecameam fourth sonnꝭ uziel micha fyrst iesia seconde sonnes merari mahli musi sonnes mahli eleazar ci eleazar dyed sonnes doughters theyr brother sonnes ci toke sonnes musi mahlt eder ieremoth iii chyldren leui housholde theyr father euen auncient father accordynge theyr offyces nombre sūme name dyd worke seruice house lorde frō age xx yeres aboue dauid sayd lorde god israel hath gyuen rest vnto peple may dwell ierusalē euer leuites also shulde nowe nomore beare tabernacle vessel seruyce therof accordyng last wordꝭ dauid leuites nombred twentye yere aboue theyr offyce vnder hande sonnes aaron seruyce house lorde courtes celles purifyenge holythyngꝭ worke seruyce house god shewebread fyne floure meateofferyng wafer swetebread fryeng pan gyrdyrō maner measure cyse stand euery day mornyng thanke prayse lorde lykewyse euen offre al burnt sacrifice vnto lorde sabbothes newe moones feastful dayes nombre custome continually cōmaunded lorde shulde wayte tabernacle wytnesse holy place sonnes aaron theyr brother seruyce house lorde ¶ dauid assygneth offyces sonnes aaron capi xxiiii deuisions sonnes aaron sonnes aaron nadab abihu eleazar ithamar 〈◊〉 xvi nadab also abihu dyed theyr father chyldren eleazar ithamar executed preestes offyce dauid ordred maner sadocke sonnes eleazar ahimelek sonnes ithamar accordynge theyr offyces theyr ministracion mo auncient men found among thosonnes eleazar sonnes ithamar thus ordred togyther among sonnes eliazar syxtene ruler accordyng housholde theyr father ryght among sonnes ithamar accordyng houshold theyr father thus put order lot one sorte ruler sanctuary lordes god well sonnes ithamar sonnes eleazar semeia sonne nathaneel scri •••• kynred leuitꝭ wrote bef ••• kynge lordes sadok preest ahimelek sonne abiathar auncient father preestes leuites one principall housholde beyng reserued eleazar one ithamar fyrst lot fell iehoiarib seconde iedaia thyrde harim fourth sehorim fyfte melchia syxte miamin seuenth hakos eyght 〈◊〉 abia nynth iesua tenth secan • ahu eleuenth eliasib twelfth iakim thyrtenth hupa fourtenth iesebeab fyftenth bisga syxtenth immer seuententh hezir eyghtenth hapzez nyntenth pathahia twentieth ieheskell xxi iachim xxii gamul xxiii delaiahu xxiiii maasiahu ordinaunces theyr offyces came house lorde accordyng theyr maner vnder aaron theyr father lorde god israel cōmaūded hym rest sonnes leui sonnes amram subael sonnes suhael iehediahu sonnes rehabia fyrst iesia iezeharites selomoth sonnes also selomoth iahath sonnes iariahu amariahu seconde iahaziel thyrde iekameā fourth sonnes usiel micha sonnes micha samir brother micha iisia sonnes also iisia zechariahu sonnes merari mahil musi sonnes iaaziahu beno sonnes merati iahaziahu beno sohem zacur ibri maheli came eleazar sonnes sonnes ki iera hemeel sonnes mu • mahli eder ierimoth chyldrē leuites housholde theyr father cast lotte nexte theyr brother sonnes aaron presence dauid kyng sadok ahimelek auncient father preestes leuites euen principall father theyr yonger brother ❀ lot made equall distributyon amonge ¶ syngers appoynted theyr place • lo ••• capi xxv dauid captaynes hoost appoynted seruyce sonnes asaph heman ieduthun dyd prophesie harpes phaltres symballes multitude men appoynted seruyce ministracyon sonnes asaph zaccur ioseph nathania aserela wayted asaph whiche prophesyed kyng ieduthun sonnes ieduthun gedeliahu zeri iesaiahu hasabiahu mathithiahu vi vnder handes theyr father ieduthun prophesyed harpe gyue thankꝭ prayses vnto lorde hemā sonnes hemā bukia hu mathaniahu uziel zebuel ierimoth hanania hanani eliatha gedalthi romanthi ezer iosbekasa malothy hothir mahazioth sonnes heman whiche kynges sear wordes god ☞ lyfte vp horne god gaue heman xliii sonnes iii doughters also hande theyr father syngyng house lorde seuenth peulthia viii god blessed hym vnto semeia sonne sonnes borne ruled house theyr father men myght sonnes semeia othni rephael obed elzabad brother stronge men elihu samahiahu chyldren obed edom theyr chyldren theyr brother actiue men strength seruyce euen lxii obed edom meleniah sonnes brother actiue men xviii sonnes hosa chyldrē merari simri cheyfe though eldest yet father se • hym chefest place helkiahu seconde • baliahu thyrde zechariahu fourth sonnes brother hosa xiii amonge deuided office portership shulde auncient men wayte brother ministred house lorde cast lotte bytwene great small houshold theyr father euery gate lot east syde fell vpon selemeiahu zachariahu sonne wyse counsaylour cast lotte lot came towarde north obed edoms lot fell south sonnes fell house asuppim suphim hosa towarde west wt gate standeth towarde hygher way one • ••• e beynge ouer agaynst towa ••• • way assendeth vpwarde one way beynge fast east syxe leuites towarde north iiii day towarde south iiii day towarde asuppim two two pharbai towarde west two goynge vp two pharbar deuisions porter among sonnes kore among sonnꝭ merari leuitꝭ ahiah ouersyght treasure house god treasure dedicate thynges hebronites ozielites subuel son gerson son moses ruler ouer treasure brother sonnes eliezer rahabiahu whose sonne isaiahu whose son ioram whose sonne zichri whose son selomith selomith brother ouer treasure ☞ dedicate thinges whiche dauid kynge auncient father captaynes ouer thousandꝭ hundredes captaynes hoost dedicated spoyles battayls dyd dedicate maynteyne house lorde samuel sear saule son ci abner sonne ner ioab sonne zeruia dedicated soeuer dedicated thyng vnder hande selomith brother izaharites chenaniahu sonnes appoynted busynesse without forth ouer israell offycers iudges hebronites hasabiahu brother men actiuite thousande seuen hundred offycers among israel beyonde iordan westwarde busynesse belongynge god seruyce kynge amonge hebronites iedia cheyfest euen prynce among hebronites father kynred fourtie yere kyngdome dauid sought founde amonge men actiuite iazer gilead brother men actiuite euen two thousande seuen hundred auncient father kynge dauid made ruler ouer rubenites gaddites ouer halfe tribe manasse euery matter perteynynge god kynges busynesse ¶ prynces ruler minystred vnto kynge capi xxvii chyldren israel nombre auncient heades captaynes thousandes hundredes theyr officer serued kynge dyuerse course whiche came wente moneth moueth thorowout al monethes yere euery course xxiiii thousand ouer fyrst course fyrst moneth iasoboam sonne zabdtel course xxiiii thousande cheyfest captaynes hoost fyrst moneth chyldren pharez ouer course seconde moneth dodai ahohite course mikloth ruler course xxiiii thousand cheyfe captayne thyrde hooste thyrde moneth zabadia sonne hym course xxiiii thousand fyfte captayne fyfte moneth samhut iezrahite course xxiiii thousande syxte captayne syxte moneth ira sonne ickes theckuite course xxiiii thousande seuenth captayne seuenth moneth helez pelonite chyldren ephraim course xxiiii thousand viii captayne eyght moneth sibechei husathite kynred zarhi course xxiiii thousand ninth captayne nynth moneth abiezer anathothite sonnes iemini course xxiiii thousand tenth captayne tenth moneth mahari netophathite zarahites course xxiiii thousande eleuenth eleuenth moneth banaia pirathonite chyldren ephraim course maacha among leuites hazabia son kemuel among haromites zadocke amōg iuda elihu brethrē dauid among thē isachar omri son michael among zabulon iesmaiahu son obadiahu among nephthali ierimoth son azriel among childrē ephraim hosea son azariahu halfe tribe also manasse ioel son phedaiahu halfe tribe manasse gilead iido son zachariahu among beniamin iaasiel son abner amonge dan azarel son ieroham lordes trybes israell dauid toke nombre vnder xx yere bycause lorde sayde wolde encrease israell lyke vnto sterres skye • par xxi iaob sonne zeruia began nombre fynysshed bycause fell wrathe agaynst israel neyther nombre put cronicles kyng dauid ouer kyngꝭ treasure azmaueth sonne adiel ouer treasure feldes city village castels iehonathan sonne uziahu ouer workemen feldes tylled grounde ezri sonne chelub ouersyght vyneyardes semei ramathite ouer encreace also vyneyardes ouer wynesellers sabdi hasiphunite ouer oliue tree mulbery tree valley baal hanan gederite ouer treasure oyle ioas ouer ox fed saron setari saronite ouer ox valley saphat sonne adlai ouer camel obel ismaelyte ouer ass iohadiahu meronothite ouer shepe iazis hagerite ruler substaunce kynge dauid iehonathan dauids uncle mā counsayle vnderstandyng scribe iehiel son hachmoni ☞ kynges sonnes ahitophel kynges counsayle husai arachite kynges companion nexte ahitophel iehoiada sonne banaiahu abiathar captayne kynges warre ioab ¶ bycause dauid forbydden buylde temple exhorteth salamon people perfourme capi xxviii dauid gathered togyther lordes israel lordes tribe lordes companyes ministred kynge course captaynes ouer thousandes ouer hundred lordes ouersyght substaunce possessyon dauid sonnꝭ chamberlaynes myghtye valyaunt actiue men vnto ierusalem kyng dauid stode vp vpon fete sayd heare brother people • reg 7 myne herte buylde house rest arke couenaunt lorde ☞ fote stole god made redy buyldyng god sayd vnto 3 regū v • 1 pa xxii • thou shalte buylde house name bycause thou hast ben man warre hast shed blood moreouer lorde god israel 1 reg 16 • chose house father kynge ouer israell euer iuda wolde chose captayne housholde iuda house father amonge sonnes father luste make kyng ouer israel sonnes lorde hathe gyuen many sonnes hath chosen salomon sonne syt vpon seate kyngdom lorde israel sayd vnto par 17 • ii par •••• salomon thy son shal buylde house courtes haue chosen hym sonne wyll father wyl stablysshe kyngdom euer yf wyl stronge cōmaundementes lawes goeth day nowe therfore syght israel congregacion lorde audience god kepe seke cōmaundementes lorde god ye maye enioy good lande leaue enheritaunnce chyldren euer thou salomon sonne knowe thou god thy father serue hym pure herte swete courage p •• vii • lorde searcheth hertes vnderstandeth ymaginacions thoughtes yf thou seke hym wyll founde yf thou forsake hym wyll cast euer take hede lorde hath chosen buylde hym house sanctuarie stronge therfore playe man dauid gaue salomon son patron porche ❀ temple also house longed therto store house vpper chambres inner parlour house mercyseate example mynde courtꝭ house lorde celles rounde aboute treasure house god treasure dedicate thynges companyes preestes leuites wayted course workmanshyp shuld serue house lorde vesselles shulde serue house lorde golde weyght golde vessel sondry ministracions maner vessel syluer weyght vessel euer purpose serued vnto weyght golde candelstyckes golde lampes weyght euerye candelstycke lampes therof candelstyckes syluer weyght bothe candelstycke also lampes accordyng dyuersyte vse euery candelstycke weyght ❀ gaue golde table shew breade euen euery table lykewyse syluer table syluer golde flesshe hokes cuppes drynkynge pottes pure gold weyght basens euen euery basen lykewyse syluer weyght euery basen syluer aulter insence pure golde weyght golde patron charet cherubes stretched theyr wynges couered arke couenaūt lorde gyuen wrytyng hande lorde made vnderstande al workemanshyp patrone dauid sayde salomon sonne strong manfully feare faynt herted lorde god euen god shall fayle forsake vntyll thou hast fynysshed al worke must serue house lorde beholde preestes leuites deuided companyes maner seruyce perteyneth house god maner workmanshyp excell wysdome maner seruyce thou hast also lordes people euery thynge thou hast nede ¶ offerynge dauid prynces buyldynge temple dauid dyeth salomon sonne reygneth steade capi xxix dauid kynge sayd vnto congregacyon 1 regū v • god hath specially chosen salomon sonne whiche yet yonge tender worke great house shall man lorde god moreouer haue prepared myght house god golde vesselles golde syluer syluer brasse thynges brasse yron thynges yron wood thynges wood onyke stone stone set glistrynge stone dyuerse coloures maner precious stone marble stone great haboundaunce bycause haue luste house god haue myne owne propre good golde syluer whiche haue seuerally gyuen house god besyde haue prepared holye house euen thre thousande talentes golde ophir seuen thousande talentes tryed syluer ouerlay walles house withall golde thynges golde syluer syluer al maner worke handes artificer soeuer wyllynge may day consecrate hande vnto lorde auncient father lordes trybes israel captaynes thousandes hundredes lordes ruler ouer kyngꝭ worke wyllynge gaue seruyce house god fyue thousande talentes golde ten thousande peces golde ten thousande talentes syluer xviii thousand talentes brasse hundred thousand talentes yron precious stone foūde gaue treasure house lorde hande iehiel gersonite people reioysed wyllynge gyue theyr goodes perfyte herte offered vnto lorde dauid kynge reioysed great gladnesse dauid blessed lorde congregacion sayde blessed thou lorde god israel father euer foreuer thyne lorde greatnesse power glorie victorie prayse heuen earth thyne thyne kyngdome lorde thou excellest aboue euen heade tychesse honoure come thou reygnest ouer thyne hande powre strength thyne hande make great gyue strength vnto al god thanke prayse thy gloryous name • people shulde enfor •• selues gyue thynges wyllyngly thynges come whiche receyue thyne hande haue gyuen 〈◊〉 47 • psal 39 〈…〉 straungers soiourners father oure dayes earthe also sapi 〈…〉 shadowe none abydynge lorde god stuffe haue prepayred buylde house thy holy name cometh thyne hande thyne wote also god thou tryest hertes hast pleasure vnfaynednesse vnfaynednesse myne herte haue wyllyngly offred al thynges nowe haue sene thy people foūde offre vnto wyllynglye gladnes lorde god abraham isaac israell father kepe euer begynnyng thoughtes herte thy peple prepare theyr hertes vnto gyue vnto salomon sonne▪ perfyte herte kepe thy cōmaundements thy testymonyes thy statute buylde house haue made prouisyon dauid sayde congregacion ☞ nowe blesse lorde god al cōgregacion blessed lorde god theyr father bowed downe theyr heades worshypped lorde kynge offered offerynges vnto lorde morowe sayde day offered burntoffrynges vnto lorde euen thousande yong ox thousand rammes thousande shepe theyr drynke offerynges many sacrifice offered israell dyd eate drynke lorde day great gladnesse made salomon sonne dauid kynge seconde tyme annoynted hym prynce lorde zadocke hygh preest 〈…〉 • salomon sat seate lorde kyng steade dauid father prospered al israell obeyed hym lordes men power sonnes kynge dauid submitted selues vnder kyng salomon 〈…〉 lorde magnifyed salomon dignitye syght israell gaue hym gloryouse kyngdome kyng hym israell dauid sonne isai reygned ouer al israel space reygued ouer israel xl yere seuen yere reygned hebron xxxiii yere reygned ierusalem dyed good age full dayes ryches honoure salomon sonne reygned steade actes dauid kyng fyrst last beholde wrytten boke samuel sear boke nathan prophet boke gad sear al kyngdom power tymes wente ouer hym ouer israel ouer kyngdomes earth ❧ ende fyrst boke cronycles otherwyse called fyrst boke paralipomenon ❧ ❀ ❧ ¶ second boke cronicles whiche hebrue one fyrst ¶ offerynge salomon hyll aulter gib •••• receyueth aunswere god wysdome shulde gyuen hym nombre charettes horseman capi primo salomon sonne dauid waxed stronge kyngdome lorde god hym magnified hym dignitye salomon spake vnto israel captaynes ouer thousandes captaynes ouer hundredes iudges euery officer israell auncient father salomon congregacion hym 3 reg iii • went hygh place gibeon 3 reg iii • tabernacle wytnesse god par ixi • moses seruaūt lorde made wyldernes arke god grods 3 • 37 3 • 〈◊〉 reg vi • dauid broughte kiriath iarim place whiche dauid prepayred therfore pytched tent ierusalem moreouer brasen aulter exods 3 • ▪ • bezaleel sonne uri sonne hur made tabernacle lorde salomon congregacyon went vysyt salomon gat vp lorde brasen aulter tabernacle wytnesse 3 reg ii • • offered thousande burnt sacrifice vpon nyghte dyd god appeare vnto salamon sayde vnto hym aske shal gyue salomon sayde vnto god thou haste shewed great mercye vnto dauid father sapi ix • haste made reygne steade 3 reg • • nowe therfore lorde god let thy promyse whiche thou madest vnto dauid father true 3 reg iii • thou haste made kynge ouer people whiche lyke duste earthe multitude wherfore gyue nowe wysdome knowledge maye able ☞ go people elles ❀ vvorthelye iudge people great 3 reg • • god sayd salomon bycause thyne herte bycause thou haste asked treasure rychesse honour lyues thyne enemyes neyther yet longe lyfe hast asked wysdom knowledge thy selfe iudge people ouer whiche haue made kynge wysdom knowledge graunted vnto wyl gyue treasure richesse glorye amonge kynges haue bene none shall lyke salomon came hyl aul ter gibeon ierusalem tabernacle wytnesse reygned ouer israel 3 regū x • salomon gathered charettes horseman thousande foure hundred charettes xii thousande horse men whome bestowed charet cityes kynge ierusalem 3 regū x • kynge made syluer golde ierusalem plenteous stone cedar tree made plentie mulbery tree grow valley horse whiche salomon brought hym egypte kynges marchauntes togyther whiche beynge one companye toke oute pryce came also brought egypte ☞ charet syxe hundred petes syluer euen horse hundred fyftie brought horse kynges hethites kynges sitia theyr owne hande salomon sendeth hiram kynge tyre wood workemen capi ii salomon determined buylde house name lorde house kyngdom salomon tolde thre score ten thousande men beare burden foure score thousande men hew stone mountayne thre thousande syxe hundred ouerse 3 regū v salomon sent hiram kynge tyre sayenge thou dydest deale dauid father ii reg v • dydest sende hym cedar wood buyld hym house dwell euen deale aboute buylde house name lorde god offre vnto hym holy thynges burne swete sence set shewbread hym contynually offre burntsacrifices mornyng euenyng sab dayes fyrst daye euery newe moone solempnefeastes lorde god ordinaunce continually kepte israel house whiche buylte shall great great god aboue al goddes able buylde hym house heuen heuen aboue al heuens able receyue hym shulde buylde hym house • ay euen burne sacrifice hym shall buyldyng sende nowe therfore connynge man worke golde syluer brasse yron purple cremosyn yelowe sylke skyll graue connynge men iud • ierusalem dauid father dyd prepayre sende also cedar tree pyne tree
