☞ algume tree libanon wote thy seruauntes skyll hewe tymbre libanon beholde men shall thyne may prepayre tymbre ynough house whiche determyned buylde shalbe wonderfull great behold vse thy seruauntes cutter hewer tymbre haue gyuē xx thousand quarter beaten wheate xx thousand quarter barley xx thousande bates wyne xx thousande bates oyle hiram kyng tyre answered wrytynge whiche sent salomon bycause lorde hath loued people therfore hath made kynge ouer hiram sayd moreouer blessed lorde god israel whiche made heuen earth hath gyuen dauid kyng wyse sonne one hath dyscrecyon prudence vnderstandyng buyld • house lorde palace hym selfe nowe haue sent wyse man man vnderstandyng father • u ram dyd vse • • n 〈…〉 sonne woman doughters dan father mā tyre skyll worke golde syluer brasse yron stone tymbre purple yelowe sylke fyne white cremosyn graue sondrye maner grauynges fynde dyuerse maner subtyll worke shall set hym thy connynge men connyng men lorde dauid thy father nowe therfore wheate barley oyle wyne lorde hath spoken let hym sende vnto seruauntes wyll cut wood libanon moche thou shalte nede wyll brynge shyppes see iapho whence thou mayst carye ierusalem salomon nombred straungers lande israel nombre father dauid nombred founde hundred liii syxe hundred set lxx thousande beare burden lxxx hew stone mountayne thre thousande syxe hundred offycers set people worke ¶ temple lorde porche buylded thynges therto belongynge capi iii salomō began buylde house lorde ierusalem mount moria 〈…〉 xxi • lorde appeared vnto dauid father euen place dauid prepared thresshynge floure ornan iebusite 〈…〉 vii • began buylde seconde day second moneth 〈…〉 vi • fourth yere reygne patron wherby salomon instructe buylde house god length thre score cubytes olde measure bredth xx cubytes porche bredth large temple xx cubytes heygth hundred xx cubytes ouerlayde inner syde pure golde greater house syled fyrre tree ouerlayde best gold graued therto palmetrees cheynes ouerlayde house precyous stone beutyfully gold golde paruaim house saye beames postes walles dores therof ouerlayde gold made grauen worke vpon walles made house moost holye whose length xx cubytes lyke bredth house bredth therof also xx cubytes ouerlayde good golde euen vi hundred talentes weyght nayles golde fyftye sycles ouerlayde vpper chamber gold 〈…〉 〈◊〉 • house moost holye made two cherubins ymage worke lyke chyldren ouerlayde golde wynges cherub xx cubytes longe one wynge fyue cubites reachyng wall house wyng lykewyse fyue cubytes reachyng wynge cherub euen one wynge cherub fyue cubytes reachynge wall house wynge fyue cubites also reached wynge cherub wyngꝭ sayd • ubs stretched xx cubytꝭ stode theyr feete loked inwardes made fore hangynge yelowe sylke purple cremosin fyne whyte caused pyctures cherub brodered theron made house two pyllers xxxv cubytes hygh head aboue top one fyue cubytes made theynes wrethen worke quere put heades pyllers made hundred pomgarnettes put cheynes reared vp pyllers temple one ryght hand lefte called ryght ☞ iathin lefte ☞ boaz ¶ aulter brasse lauatorye vessel candelstyckes c capi iiii made aulter brasse xx cubites longe xx cubites brode ten cubytes hygh 3 vii • cast brasen lauatorye ten cubytes brym brym rounde compasse fyue cubytes hygh lyne thyrtye cubytes dyd compasse roūde aboute vnder fassyon ox dyd compasse roūde aboute ten cubytes dyd compasse lauatory rounde aboute two rowes ox whiche cast lyke molten worke stode also vpon twelue ox thre loked towarde north thre towarde west thre toward south thre toward east lauatory set vpon theyr backes towarde lauatory thyckest hande bredth brym lyke brym cup floures lylyes • receyued helde thre thousande bates • • 7 • made ten lauers put fyue ryght hande fyue lefte wash clense soch thyng • offered burt offerynge greate lauatory preestes made ten candelstyckes golde accordynge patrone gyuen put temple fyue ryght hand fyue lefte made also ten table put temple fyue ryght syde fyue lefte made hūdred basens golde made courte preestes great courte dores ouerlayde dores brasse set great lauatory ryght syde east ende ouer agaynst south hiram made pottes shouels basens fynysshed worke appoynted make kyng salomon house god two pyllers coueryngꝭ two heades toppes pyllers two wrethes couer two scalpes heades toppes pyllers foure hundred pomgarnettꝭ two wrethes two rowes pomgarnettes one wrethe couer two toppes heades pyllers made two bottomes lauers made vpon bottomes greate lauatory twelue ox vnder pottꝭ also shouels fleshehokes vessel dyd hyram father make kynge salomon house lorde bryght brasse playne iordane dyd kynge cast euen claye grounde bytwene socoth zatedatha salomon made vessel greate aboundance weyght brasse coulde rekened salomon made vessel house god golden aulter also table set shewbreade vpon moreouer cādelstyckes theyr lampes burne maner queere precyous golde floures lampes snoffers made golde perfyte golde dressynge knyues basens spones sencers pure golde ❀ made dore temple inner dores within place moost holye inner dores temple gylted al worke salomon made house lorde finysshed ¶ arke brhought temple fylled glorye lorde capi v al worke salomō made house lorde finyshed 3 regū 7 • salomon brought al thyngꝭ dauid father dedycated syluer golde iuels put amonge treasure house god salomon 3 regū 8 gathered elder israell togyther heades trybes auncyent father chyldren israell vnto ierusalem brynge arke couenaunt lorde citye dauid zion wherfore men israell resorted vnto kyng feast euen seuenth moneth elder israell came leuytes toke vp arke preestes leuites brought awaye arke tabernacle wytnesse al holy vessel tabernacle bare kynge salomon congregacyon israell assembled vnto hym arke offered shepe ox many coulde tolde nombred multytude preestes brought arke appoyntment lorde vnto place euen queere temple within place moost holy set vnder wyngꝭ cherub cherub stretched theyr wynges ouer place arke cherub couered arke barres aboue hygh barres arke longe heades barres sene without arke within queere without arke remayned vnto daye nothynge arke 3 regū •• saue two table moses put thee horeb lorde made couenaūt chyldren israell come egypte fortuned preestes come holy place preestes present sanctyfyed dyd wayte course bothe leuites syngers vnder asaph heman ieduthun appoynted sondrye office theyr chyldren brother arayde fyne whyte hauynge symbals psaltery harpes stode east ende aulter hundred twentye preestes blowynge trompettes trompet blower syngers agreed semed one voyce pray synge thankynge lorde lyfte vp theyr voyce trompettes symbals instrumentes musycke praysed lorde ❀ sayde howe good mercy lasteth euer house god fylled cloude preestꝭ coulde endure mynyster reason cloude maiestye lorde fylled house god ¶ wordes salomon people prayer made vnto god capi vi salomon sayde 3 reg 〈…〉 lorde hath spoken howe wyll dwell cloude haue buylte habytacyon place thy dwellynge euer kynge turned face blessed hoole congregacyon israell congregacyon israell stode sayde blessed lorde god israell whiche hath handes fulfylled spake mouth father dauid sayenge ii 〈…〉 sence daye brought people lande egypte chose cytye amonge trybes israell buylde house name myght neyther chose man ruler ouer people israell sauynge ii reg 〈◊〉 〈…〉 haue chosen ierusalem name myght haue chosen dauid ouer people israell • reg 7 〈…〉 viii b pa • 22 b herte dauid father buylde house name lorde god israell lorde sayde dauid father asmoche thyne herte buylde house name thou dydest well thou thoughtest thyne herte notwithstandynge thou shalte buylde house thy son whiche proceded thy loynes shall buylde house name lorde therfore hath made good saynge hath spoken rysen vp rowme dauid father set seate israell lorde promysed haue buylt house name lorde god israell haue put arke wherin couenaunt lorde made chyldren israell kynge stode aulter lorde presence congregacyon israell stretched handes salomō made brasen pulpyt fyue cubytes longe fyue cubytes brode thre heyght set myddes great courte vpon stode kneled downe vpon knee congregacyon israell stretched handes towarde heuen sayde 〈…〉 viii c lorde god israell god lyke heuen earth kepest couenaunt shewest mercy vnto thy seruauntꝭ walke al theyr hertes thou whiche haste kepte thy seruauaunte dauid father thynges thou promysedest hym thou saydest thy mouth hast fulfylled thyne handes se daye nowe lorde god israell kepe thy seruaunte dauid father thynges thou promysedst hym saynge 〈◊〉 ii 〈◊〉 ix b pa vii thou shalte syght without man shall syt vpon seate israell thy chyldrē take hyde theyr wayes walke lawe thou hast walked fore nowe lorde god israell let thy sayenge true whiche thou spakest vnto thy seruaunt dauid wyll god dede dwell men earth beholde regū 〈…〉 66 〈…〉 vii f heuen heuen aboue heuens tōteyne howe moch lesse house haue buylded let thy pleasure therfore turne prayer thy seruaunte supplycacyon lorde god herken vnto voyce prayer whiche thy seruaunte prayeth let thyne eye open toward house day nyght ouer place wherin thou hast sayde thou woldest put thy name herken vnto prayer whiche thy seruaunte prayeth place herken vnto prayer thy seruaunte thy people israell whiche praye place heare thou say • thy dwellyng place euen heuen heare mercyfull 3 regū 8 • yf man syn agaynst neyghboure take othe agaynst hym make hym sweare bothe come thyne aulter house heare thou heuen worke iudge thy seruaūtes thou rewarde vngodlye recompence hym waye vpon heade ☞ iustifye ryghteous gyue hym accordynge ryghtwysenesse yf thy people israell put worse enemye bycause haue synned agaynst yet yf turne gyue thankes vnto thy name make intercessyon pray house heate thou heuen mercifull vnto synne thy people israell brynge agayne vnto lande whiche thou gauest theyr father deute • • 3 xvii • heuen shut vp rayne bycause haue synned agaynst yet yf praye place cōfesse thy name repent theyr syn thou chastenest heare thou heuen mercyfull vnto synne thy seruauntes thy people israell gyde thou good waye walke sende rayne vpon thy lande whiche thou hast gyuen vnto thy people enherytaunce yf derth lande pestylence corrupcyon blastynge corne greshoppers caterpyllers theyr enemyes beseyge cityes theyr lande ❀ destroy countryes whatsoeuer plage syckenesse supplicacyons prayer soeuer shall made man thy people israell shall knowe euery man owne sore owne grefe shall stretche theyr handes toward house thou shalte heare heuen euen thy dwellyng place shalt merciful gyue euery man accordynge vnto wayes euen thou dost know euery mann▪ herte thou onely knowest hertes chyldren men may feare walke thy wayes longe lyue lande whiche thou gauest vnto father 3 regū 8 • iohn c actes viii • moreouer straunger whiche thy people israell yf come farre lande thy great name sake thy myghtye hande stretched arme yf come saye praye house thou shalte heare heuen euen thy dwel lynge place shalte accordynge straunger calleth al people earth may know thy name feare doth thy people israel may knowe house haue buylt thy name called vpō yf thy people go war agaynst theyr enemyes waye thou shalte sende praye waye deute vi e toward citie thou hast chosen euen towarde house whiche haue buylte thy name heare thou heuen theyr supplicacyon prayer helpe theyr ryght yf syn agaynst 3 regū 8 • • iohū • man doth synne thou angrye delyuer ouer theyr enemyes take leade awaye vnto lande far neare yet yf repent theyr herte lande captiuyte turne pray vnto lande theyr captiuyte sayenge haue synned haue done euyl wyckedlye turne agayne theyr herte al theyr soule lande theyr captiuyte kepe bondage pray toward theyr lande thou gauest vnto theyr father euen towarde cytye whiche thou hast chosen towarde house whiche haue buylte thy name heare thou heuen euen thy dwellynge place theyr supplycacyon theyr prayer iugde theyr cause mercyfull vnto thy people haue synned agaynst nowe god let thyne eye open thyne eares attente vnto prayer made place nowe vp psal 132 lorde god thy restynge place thou arke thy strength lorde god let thy preestes clothed helth let thy sayntes reioyse goodnesse lorde god turne awaye face thyne anoynted remembre mercyes whiche thou hast promysed dauid thy seruaunte ¶ fyre consumeth sacrifyce lorde appeareth salomon seconde tyme capi vii • regū 8 f salomon made ende prayenge leuit ix came downe fyre heuen consumed • regū 8 g burnt offerynge sacrifyces house fylled glorye lorde preestes coulde go house lorde bycause glorye lorde fylled lordes house chyldren israell sawe howe fyre glorye lorde came downe vpon house fell downe flat vpon theyr face earth vpon pauement worshypped confessed vnto lorde gracyous mercye lasteth euer kynge people offered sacrifyces lorde kynge salomon offered sacrifyce xxii thousande ox hundred xx thousand shepe kynge people ☞ dedicated house god preestꝭ wayted theyr offyces leuites instrumentꝭ musycke lorde kynge dauid made confesse vnto lorde mercye lasteth euer playenge psalme dauid theyr hande preestes blew trompettes israel stode moreouer salomon halowed myddle courte house lorde theyr offered burntofferynges fat peaceofferynges bycause brasen aulter salomon made able receyue burntofferynges meatosferynges fat tyme salomon kepte ••• iii • feast seuen dayes israell hym excedyng great congregacyon euen enterynge hamath vnto ryuer egypte eyght daye made gatherynge kepte dedicacyon aulter seuen dayes ☞ feast seuen dayes xxiii daye seuenth moneth let people departe theyr tentes glad mery herte goodnesse lorde shewed dauid salomon israell people iii • • salomon finyshed house lorde kynges house came herte make house lorde owne house wente prosperouslye forwarde lorde appeared salomon nyght sayde hym haue herde thy petycyon ii pat 〈◊〉 haue chosen place selfe house sacryfyce yf shut vp heuen rayne yf cōmaunde locustes deuoure lande yf sende pestylence amonge peple yf people amonge whome name called vpon humble selues make intercessyon seke presence turne theyr wycked wayes wyll heare heuen mercyfull theyr synne wyll heale theyr lande hence forth myne eye shall open myne eares attent prayer made place therfore nowe • p • vi haue chosen sanctifyed house name maye euer myne eye myne herte shall perpetuallye yf thou wylt walke dauid thy father walked haue commaunded shalt obserue statute lawes wyll stablyshe seate thy kyngdome accordynge made couenaunt dauid thy father sayenge • reg ii 〈…〉 vi • thou shalt without man ruler israell yf ye turne awaye forsake statute cōmaundementes whiche haue set shal go serue god worshyp wyll plucke vp route land whiche haue gyuen house whiche haue sanctifyed name wyl cast oute syght wyll make prouerbe iest among nacions euery one passeth shall astonyed house whiche belonged moost hygh god shall saye •••• 29 • reg ix b 〈◊〉 xxii • hath lorde delte fassion land house shal answere bycause forsoke lorde god theyr father brought land egypt caught holde god worshipped serued euen ther fore hath brought al euyl vpon ¶ cityes salomon buylded house god finyshed capi viii • reg ix b fortuned xx yeare salomon buylte house lorde owne house buylt cityes hiram gaue hym put chyldren israell salomon went hamath zoba strengthed buylt thadmor wyldernes repayred store cityes whiche hamath buylt bethhoron vpper bethhoron neyther stronge cytyes hauyng walles gate barres baalath store cytyes salomon charet cityes cityes horseman euery pleasant place salomon lust buylde ierusalem libanō thorowout land dominyon people lefte hethites amorytes pheresytes heuytes iebusytes whiche chyldren israell chyldrē lefte lande consumed chyldren israel dyd salomon make paye trybute vnto day chyldren israel dyd salomon make bonde men worke men war ruler great lordes hym captaynes ouer charettes horseman kyng salomon offycers ouersawe ruled people two hundred fyftye salomon brought doughter pharao cytye dauid house buylded sayde wyfe shall dwell house dauid kyng israel holy bycause arke lorde come vnto salomon offered burntofferyngꝭ vnto lorde aulter lorde buylte porche doyng euery thynge due tyme offerynge accordynge commaundement moses sabbothes newmoones solempne feastes exodi 23 • deute 16 • thre tymes yeare saye feast swete breade feast wekes feast tabernacle salomon set sortes preestes theyr offyces dauid father ordered leuites theyr watch prayse mynystre preestes daye day porter course euery gate • pat 〈◊〉 • dauid man god commaunded omytted commaundement kynge vnto preestes leuytes concernynge maner thynge concernynge treasure salomon made prouisyon charge fyrst daye foundacyon house lorde layde tyll finyshed house lorde perfyte went kynge salomon ezion gaber eloth ❀ redde see syde lande edom hiram sent hym hande seruauntes shyppes seruauntes knowledge see came seruauntes salomon ophir caryed thence foure hundred fyftye talentes golde brought kynge salomon ¶ cōmunicacyon salomon quene saba gyftes one gaue death salomon whome succedeth rehoboham capi ix 3 regū • • math xi • • luks xi quene saba herde fame salomon came proue hym harde question ierusalem greate companye camel bare spyces plentye golde precyous stone come salomon cōmuned hym al herte salomon assoyled question one worde hyd salomon whiche tolde quene saba sene wysdome salomon house buylte meate table syttynge seruauntes standynge wayters theyr apparell butler theyr apparell goynge vp whiche went house lorde spiryte sayde kynge sayenge whiche herde myne owne lande thyne actes thy wysdome true beleued wordes vntyll came myne eye sene beholde one halfe thy wysdome tolde thou excedest fame herde happye thy men happye thy seruauntes whiche stande alwaye heare thy wysdome blessed lorde thy god lust set kynge ••• te thou myghtest kyng ordeyned lorde thy god bycause thy god loueth israell hath delyte make contynue euer therfore made kynge ouer ryght equite gaue kynge hundred xx talentes golde spyces excedynge great haboundaunce precyous stone neyther soche spyce quene saba gaue kynge salomon seruauntes hiram seruauntes salomon whiche brought golde ophir brought also ☞ algume wood precyous stone kynge made algumwood stayres house lorde kynges palace harpes psaltryes syngers soche wood sene lande iuda kynge salomon gaue quene saba euery pleasaunt thyng asked moche brought vnto kynge turned went away owne lande seruauntes weyght golde came salomon one yeare syxe hundred lxvi talentes golde besydes chapman marchauntes brought al kyngꝭ arabia rule countrey brought golde syluer salomon kynge salomon made cc buckler beaten golde syx hundred sycles beaten gold spente vpon one buckler thre hundred scheldes made beaten golde one schelde cost thre hundred peces golde kynge put house forest libanon kyng made great seate yuorye ouerlayde pure golde syxe steppe seate foote stole golde fastened seate pomels eche syde syttynge place two lyon standynge pomels xii lyon stode one syde vpon syxe steppe soch worke made kyngdome drynkyng vessel kyng salomon golde vessel house forest libanō precyouse golde syluer counted nothynge worth dayes salomon kynges shyppes went tharsis seruauntes hiram euery thre yeare came shyppes tharsis brought golde syiuer puorye ape pacockes 3 reg • x • kynge salomon passed al kyngꝭ earth rychesse wysdom kynges earth sought presence salomon heare wysdom god put herte brought euery man present vessel syluer vessel golde rayment harnesse spyces horse mule whatsoeuer myght gotten yeare yeare 3 reg 4 • salomon foure thousande stalles horse charettes twelue thousande horseman whome bestowed charet cityes kyng ierusalem reygned ouer kynges euphrates vnto lande philistine border egypt 3 regū • • ii pa •• •• kynge made syluer ierusalem plenteous stone cedar tree plenteous mulbery tree growe valleyes brought vnto salomon horse egypte landes 3 reg 〈◊〉 • rest actes kynge salomon fyrst last wrytten sayenges nathan prophet prophesye ahiah selonite visyons iedo sear visyons agaynst ieroboam sonne nabat salomon reygned ierusalem vpon israell fourtye yeares salomon slept father buryed hym citye dauid father rehoboam sonne reygned steade ¶ folyshnesse rehoboam diuisyon realme capi x • reg xii rehoboham went sichem sichem israell come togyther make hym kynge ieroboam sonne nebat whiche 〈◊〉 xi g fled egypte presence salomon kynge herde returned egypte sent called hym ieroboam israell came comuned rehoboam sayenge thy father layde greuous yocke vpon v nowe therfore remyt thou somwhat greuous seruyce thy father heuye yocke put vpon v wyll serue sayde come agayne vnto thre dayes people departed kynge rehoboam counsaylled elder stande salomon father whyle yet lyued sayde counsayle gyue ye answere people agayne tolde hym saynge yf thou kynde people please speake louynge wordes wyll thy seruauntes euer lefte counsayle whiche elder gaue hym toke coūsayle yonge men growen vp hym stode presence sayd vnto aduyse gyue ye maye answere people whiche haue cōmuned sayenge abate somwhat yocke thy father dyd put vpon v yonge men growen vp hym spake vnto hym sayenge thus shalte thou answere people spake sayenge thy father made yocke heuye make thou somewhat lyghter v thus shalt thou say vnto lytle fynger shall heuyer father loynes • reg xii • father put heuy yocke vpon wyl put yocke father chastysed whyppes wyll chastyse scorpyons ieroboam people came rehoboam thyrde day kynge bad saynge come agayne thyrde day kynge answered cruelly kynge rehoboam lefte counsayle aged men answered aduyse yonge men sayenge father made youre yocke greuous wyll adde therto father chastysed whyppes wyll chastyse scorpyons kynge herkened vnto people occasyon came god lorde myght make good sayenge • reg xi • whiche spake hande ahia selonite ieroboam sonne nebat al israell sawe kynge wolde agree vnto peple answered kyng sayenge parte haue dauid enherytaunce son isai let euery man israell go tent 3 reg xii • dauid se thyne owne house israell gat theyr tentes rehoboam reygned ouer mo • chyldren israell dwelte cityes iuda kynge rehoboam also sent haduram ruler ouer trybute chyldren israell stoned hym stone dyed kynge rehoboam made spede get hym vp charette fley ierusalem israell rebelled agaynst house dauid vnto daye ¶ rehoboam forbydden syght agaynst ieroboam hath xviii wyues 〈◊〉 concubynes xxviii sonnes lx doughters capi xi rehoboam come ierusalem 3 reg 〈◊〉 ▪ • gathered house iuda ben iamin nyne score chosen men war fyght agaynst israell brynge kyngdome agayne rehoboam worde lorde came semeiahu man god sayenge speake vnto rehoboam son salomon kynge iuda israell iuda ben iamin saye thus sayth lord ye shal go vp fyght agaynst brethrē returne euery man house thynge done obeyed wordes lorde returned goynge agaynst ieroboam rehoboam dwelt ierusalem buylte strong cityes iuda buylded vp bethleem etam theko bethzur socho adullam gath maresa ziph adurahim lachis aseca zorea aialon hebron whiche iuda ben iamin stronge cityes repayred stronge holdes put captaynes store vyttayle wyne oyle cityes put scheldes speares made excedynge stronge hauynge iuda ben iamin syde preestes leuytes israell resorted hym theyr coostes leuites lefte theyr suburbes theyr possessyon came iuda ierusalem ii par 1 • • ierobdam sonnes • ast ministryng vnto lorde 3 reg xii • ordeyned hym preestes byll austers deuyls calues whiche made leuites went trybes israell suche submytted theyr hertes seke lorde god israell came ierusalem offer vnto lorde god theyr father strengthed kyngdome iuda made rehoboam sonne salomon myghtye thre yeare longe thre yeare walked waye dauid salomon rehoboam toke hym mahalath doughter ierimoth sonne dauid wyfe abihaill doughter eliab sonne isai whiche bare hym chyldrē ieus samaria zaha toke 3 reg • v maaca doughter absalom whiche bare hym abia atthai ziza selomith rehoboam loued maaca doughter absalō aboue wyues concubynꝭ toke xviii wyues thre score concubynes begat xviii sonnꝭ thre score doughters rehoboam made abia sonne maacha cheyfe ruler amonge brother haue ouer syght kyngdome played wysely scattered chyldren thorow countreyes iuda ben iamin vnto euery stronge citye gaue aboūdaunce vyttayle obteyned many wyues ¶ seba kynge egypte robbeth temple lorde rehoboam dyeth ahia sonne succedeth hym capi xii came passe rehoboam stablyshed kyngdome became myghtye forsoke lawe lorde israell hym 3 xiiii • fortuned fyfth yere kynge rehoboam sesac kynge egypte came vp agaynst ierusalem bycause transgressed agaynst lorde twelue hundred charettes lx thousande horseman people without nombre came hym egypte lubim suckim blackmores toke stronge cityes iuda came ierusalem came semeia prophet rehoboam lordes iuda gathered togyther within ierusalem sesac sayde vnto thus sayeth lorde ye haue lefte therfore haue also lefte handes sesac vpon lordes israell kynge humbled selues sayd lorde ryghteous lorde sawe submytted selues word lorde came semeia saynge submyt selues therfore wyll destroye wyll delyuer somwhat wrath shall burne vpon ierusalem hande sesac neuerthesse shal seruauntes knowe dyfference bytwene seruyce seruice kyngdomes worlde sesac kynge egypt came ierusalem toke awaye treasure house lorde treasure kynges house toke euen al caryed away scheldes golde 1 regū x • whiche salomon made steade kynge rehoboam made scheldes brasse cōmytted handes captaynes whiche ouersyght fote men kepte entraunce kyngꝭ house came passe kynge entred house lorde garde came fet brought agayne vnto garde chambre humbled hym selfe wrath lorde turned hym wolde destroye togyther iuda well kynge rehoboam waxed myghty reygned ierusalem rehoboam xli yere olde began reygne reygned xvii yeres ierusalem citye whiche lorde chosen trybes israell put name mother name naama ammonitesse 3 〈◊〉 dyd euyll bycause prepared herte seke lorde actes also rehoboam fyrst last wrytten sayenges semeia prophet iddo sear noted genealogye warr • alway bytwene rehoboam ieroboam rehoboam slepte father buryed citye dauid abia sonne reygned steade ¶ victory abia agaynst ieroboam capi xiii eyghtene yeare kynge ieroboam 3 reg 〈…〉 began abia reygne ouer iuda reygned thre yere ierusalem mother name also michaiahu doughter uriell gibea war bytwene abia ieroboam abia made prouisyon war hauynge valyaunt experte men war euen foure hū dred thousande chosen men ieroboam set hym selfe araye fyght agaynst hym eyght hundred thousande pycte men whiche stronge men armes abia stode vpon zemaraim hill whiche mounte ephraim sayde heare thou ieroboam al israel ye knowe howe lorde god israell gaue kyngdome ouer israel dauid euer euen hym sonnes ☞ salted couenaunt ieroboam sonne nebat seruaunt salomō sonne dauid rysen vp hath rebel led agaynst lorde gathered hym lewde men chyldren belial preuayled agaynst rehoboam son salomon rehoboam yong tender herted coulde stande nowe ye saye ye able preuayle agaynst kyngdome lorde hande sonnꝭ dauid ye greate multitude haue golden calues • reg xii • whiche ieroboam made god • para xi • haue ye cast preestes lorde sonnes aaron leuites haue made preestes maner nacyons landꝭ soeuer cometh consecrateth hande yonge oxe seuen rammes may preest god belonge vnto lorde god haue forsaken preestes sonnes aaron whiche ministre vnto lorde leuites wayte vpon theyr office burne vnto lorde euery mornyng euenyng burnt sacrifice swete sence shew breade set ordre vpon pure table prepare candelsticke golde lampes burne euer euen truely kepe watche lorde god ye haue forsaken hym beholde god hym selfe captayne preestꝭ blowe •••• x b trompettes crye alarum agaynst ye chyldrē israel fyght agaynst lorde god father wyl prospete ieroboam conuayed men priuely aboute come behynde iuda layer wayte behynde iuda loked aboute beholde battayle behynde cryed vnto lorde preestes blewe trompettꝭ men iuda gaue showte men iuda showted came passe god smote ieroboam israel abia iuda chyldren israel fled iuda god deliuered theyr hand abia people slue great slaughter fell downe wounded israell fyue hundred thousande chosen men chyldren israell broughte vnder tyme chyldren iuda preuayled bycause leaned vnto lorde god theyr father abia folowed ieroboam toke cityes hym bethell townes belongynge therto iesana townes longed therto ephrō townꝭ ieroboam recouered strength agayne dayes abia and▪ lorde plaged hym dyed abia waxed myghtye maryed xiiii wyues begat xxii sonnes xvi doughtes rest actes abia customes sayengꝭ wrytten storie prophet iddo ¶ asa kynge iuda capi xiiii abia slepte father buryed hym citye dauid math • • asa sonne reygned steade whose dayes lande quietnesse ten yere 3 reg xv▪ b asa dyd good ryght eye lorde god toke away straung aulters hyl aulters brake downe ymages cut downe groues cōmaunded iuda seke lorde god theyr father accordyng lawe cōmaundmentes put away cityes iuda hyl aulters ymages kyngdom quiet hym buylt strong cityes iuda bycause lande rest warre yeres lorde gyued hym rest therfore sayd iuda let v buylde cityes make aboute walles towres gate barres lande yet rest v bycause haue sought lorde god haue sought hym hath gyuen v rest euery syde buylte prospered asa armye men bare scheldes speares iuda thre hundred thousande ben iamin bare scheldes drewe bowes two hundred lxxx thousande valiaunt men came agaynst zarah blacke morian 11 p • 〈◊〉 • hoost x hundred thousande thre hundred charettes came farre maresa asa went hym ioyned battayle valley zephata besyde maresa asa cryed vnto lorde god sayd lorde 1 xliii b harde thynge helpe eyther many haue power helpe v therfore lorde god trust thy name go agaynst multitude thou arte lorde god man shall preuayle agaynst lorde smote blacke moore asa iuda blacke moore fled asa people hym folowed vnto gerar blacke moore hoost ouerthrowen none lefte destroyed lorde hoost caryed away myghty great pray smote cityes rounde aboute gerar feare lorde came vpon spoyled cityes excedynge moche spoyle smote also tentes cattell caryed awaye plentye shepe camelles returned ierusalem ¶ kynge asa monicion prophet azaria sacrifyeth vnto lorde depryueth mother dominyon capi xv spirite god came azaria sonne oded went mete asa sayd vnto hym heare asa iuda beniamin lorde whyle ye hym ye seke hym wyll founde agayne ye forsake hym also wyll forsake truely long ceason israel man sought true god man regarded preest taught man cared lawe man trouble dyd turne vnto lorde god israel sought hym founde tyme peace hym dyd go great sedicyon among enhabitoures earth nacyon destroyed nacyon citye citye god dyd moue aduet syte amonge play ye therfore men let handꝭ slacke worke shall rewarded asa herde wordes prophesie azaria son oded prophet toke courage put awaye abhominable ydolles lande iuda beniamin cityes whiche wanne mount ephraim renued aulter lorde porche lorde gathered iuda beniamin straungers ephraim manasse simeon fell many hym oute israell sawe lorde god hym assembled ierusalem thyrde moneth fyftenth yeare reygne asa offred vnto lorde tyme spoyle whiche brought vii c ox vii shepe made couenaunt seke lorde god theyr father al theyr herte theyr soule soeuer wolde seke lorde god israel shulde dye whyther small greate man woman ☞ sware vnto lorde loude voyce showtyng blowynge trompettes shaulmes iuda reioysed othe sworne vnto lorde theyr herte sought hym theyr lust founde lorde gaue rest rounde aboute euery syde kyng asa put maacha mother auctoryte bycause made abhominable ydoll ❀ priapus groue asa brake downe ydoll stamped burnt broke cedron hyll aulters taken away israell though herte asa perfyte dayes brought house god thynges father dedicate hym selfe dedicate euen syluer golde iuels war vnto iudi iii • xxxv yere reygne asa ¶ asa feare baasa kynge israell maketh couenaunt benhadad kynge siria capi xvi xxxvi yeare reygne asa came 3 reg x • • baasa kyng israel vp agaynst iuda buylte rama entente wolde let none passe ❀ safely asa kynge iuda asa fet golde syluer treasure house lorde kynges house sent benhadad kyng siria dwelte ☞ darmese • sayde confideracion bytwene bytwene father thyne beholde haue sent syluer golde thou wylte come breake thyne appoyntmēt baasa kyng israell may departe benhadad graunted vnto kyng asa sent captaynes armye cityes israell smote iion dā abelmain strong cityes nephthali baasa herde lefte buyldynge rama let worke cease asa kynge toke iuda caryed away stone tymbre rama wherwith baasa buyldyng bulte therwith geba mizpa tyme hanani seat came asa kyng iuda sayd vnto hym bycause thou hast trusted kyng siria rather put thy trust lorde thy god therfore hoost kyng siria escaped thyne hande 〈◊〉 pa 14 c blacke moore ☞ lubim excedyng great hoost many charets horsmen yet bycause thou trustedst lorde delyuered thyne hande eye lorde beholde earth strength parfite herte towarde hym 〈…〉 reg▪ xiii c herein thou hast done folysshly therfore henceforth thou shalte haue warre asa wroth sear put hym pryson house dyspleased wym bycause thynge asa destroyed certayne people ceason behold dedes asa fyrst last wrytten boke kynges iuda israel asa xxxix yere reygne fell sycke feete dysease contynued long • ul • 38 • syckenesse sought lorde phisicians asa slept father dyed xli yeare reygne buryed hym owne sepulchre whiche made hym selfe citye dauid layde hym bed fylled dyuers kyndes spice swete odoures made crafte potecaries burnt moche spyce aboute hym ¶ iehosaphat causeth feare lorde renued amonge people capi xvii math • b iehosaphat sonne reygned steade preuayled agaynst israel put souldiours al stronge cityes iuda set ruler lande iuda cityes ephraim whiche asa father lorde iehosaphat bycause walked olde wayes father dauid sought baalim sought lorde god father walked cōmaundementes doynges israell lorde stablysshed kyngdome hande iuda brought hym presentes abundaunce rychesse honoure lyfte vp herte vnto wayes lorde put downe yet hyll aulters groues iuda thyrde yere reygne sente lordes euen benhail obadia zacharia nethanel michaahu shulde teache cityes iuda sent leuites euen semeiahu nethadiahu zabadiahu asahel semiramoth iehonathan adoniahu thubiahu tubadonia elisamah iehorā preestes taught iuda boke lawe god went aboute thorowout al city iuda taught people feare lorde fell vpon kyngdomes lande round aboute iuda fought agaynste iehosaphat philistynes brought iehosaphat gyftes tribute syluer therto arabian brought hym shepe euen seuen thousande seuen hundred rammes seuen thousand seuen hundred gootes iehosaphat prospered grue vp hygh buylte iuda castelles stronge cityes great substaunce cityes iuda men armes strongest souldyours ierusalem office house theyr father captaynes ouer thousandes iuda adna captayn hym fyghtynge men thre hundred thousande nexte hande iehohanan captayne hym two hundred lxxx thousande nexte hym amazia son zichr whiche owne good wyll offered hym selfe vnto lorde hym two hundred thousande myghtye men warre chyldren beniamin eliada mā myght hym armed men bowe schelde two hundred thousande nexte hym iehosabad hym hundred lxxx prepared war wayted kyng besyde kyng put strong cityes thorowout iuda ¶ ahab asked counsel llll▪ proph ••• put michea pryson dyeth • ot arowe capi xviii iehosaphat abundaunce rychesse honoure ioyned affinite ahab 3 reg 11 • certayne yeres went downe samaria ahab slue many shepe ox hym peple hym entreated hym go vp hym ramoth gilead ahab kynge israel sayde iehosaphat kyng iuda wylte thou go ramoth gilead answered hym wyl thou people shal thyne wyll go warre iehosaphat sayde vnto kynge israell aske counsayle praye worde lorde daye therfore kynge israell gathered togyther prophettes foure hundred men sayd vnto shall go ramoth gilead fyght shulde cease sayde go vp god shall delyuer kynges hande iehosephat sayde yet neuer prophet lordes myght aske hym kynge israel sayde vnto iehosaphat yet one man may aske lorde hate hym neuer prophesyeth good alwaye euyll mithea sonne iimla iehosaphat sayde let kynge say kynge israell called one chamberlaynes sayde fetche hyther quycklye michea sonne iimla kyng israel iehosaphat kyng iuda sat eyther seate theyr apparell thresshyng floure besyde gate samaria prophettes prophesyed one zedekia son chanana made hym horne yron sayde thus sayth lorde shalte thou ouerthrow siria vntyl brought nought prophettes prophesyed euen sayenge go vp ramoth gilead shall prospere lorde shall delyuer hande kyng messenger went call michea spake hym saynge beholde wordes prophettꝭ speake good kyng wt one assent let thy wordes therfore lyke one theyrs thou speake whiche pleasaunt miceha sayd truely lorde lyueth euen god saythe wyll speake come kyng kyng sayd vnto hym michea shulde go ramoth gilead fyght leaue sayd go vp shall well shal delyuered hande kyng sayd hym many tymes charge y• saye nothynge truthe name lorde sayde dyd se israell scattered mountaynes shepe haue shepheerde lorde sayd haue mayster let returne euery man therfore house peace kynge israel sayd iehosaphat dyd tell wolde prophesye good vnto euyll sayde agayne therfore heare ye worde lorde • xxii • esai vi saw lorde syt vpon seat al company heuen stode ryght hande lefte lorde sayde shall deceyue ahab kynge israel may go vp ouerthrowen ramoth gilead sayd one sayth came spirite stode lorde sayde wyll deceyue hym lorde sayde vnto hym wherin sayde wyl go lyenge spirite mouth prophettꝭ lorde sayd thou shalte deceyue hym shalte preuayle go euen nowe therfore beholde ii 〈◊〉 • iob xii ezech 14 • lorde hath put lyenge spirite mouthes al thy prophettes lorde hath spoken euyl agaynst zedekia son chanana wente smote michea vpon cheke sayd waye wente spirite lorde speake michea sayd thou shalte se day thou shalte go chambre chambre hyde thy selfe kynge israel sayde take ye michea brynge hym ammon gouernoure citye ioas kynges sonne ye shal say thus sayth kyng put felowe pryson house fede hym breade affliction water trouble vntyll come agayne peace michea sayde yf thou come agayne peace hath lorde spoken sayde herken • ye people euery one kyng israel iehosaphat kynge iuda went vp ramoth gilead kyng israel sayd vnto iehosaphat must chaunge go battayle se thou haue thyne owne apparell vpon kynge israell chaunged hym selfe came battayle kynge siria cōmaunded captaynes charettes hym saynge se ye fyght agaynste small greate saue agaynst kynge israell onely captaynes charettꝭ saw iehosaphat sayd kynge israel therfore compassed hym fyght iehosaphat cryed lorde helped hym god chased away hym came passe whē captaynes charettꝭ perceyued kynge israell turned backe agayne hym certayne mā drewe bowe myght smote kynge israell bytwene ioyntes habergeon sayd charet mā turne thyne hande thou mayst cary hoost wounded battell ceased daye howbeit kynge israel caused charet stande styll agaynst siria • vntyll euen tyme sonne goyng downe dyed ¶ iehosaphat rebuked prophet iehu called agayne people honour▪ •• g • lorde god capi xix iehosaphat kynge iuda came home agayne peace ierusalem iehu sonne hanam seat went mete hym sayd kyng iehosaphat woldest thou helpe vngodly loue hate lorde therfore wrath come downe vpon lorde neuerthelesse good actes founde thou haste ☞ hewen downe groues lande hast prepared thyne herte seke god iehosaphat dwelt ierusalem turned went people beer seba mount ephraim brought agayne vnto lorde god theyr father set iudges lande thorowout strong cityes iuda citye citye sayd iudges take hede ye ye execute iudgementes man god whiche iudgement wherfore nowe let feare lorde vpon take hede doynge vnryghteousnesse lorde god •• • ii b •• tt • • • eph • vi b 〈…〉 iii shulde haue respecte persones take rewardes moreouer ierusalem dyd iehosaphat set leuites preestes auncient father israel iudgement cause lorde returned agayne ierusalem charged saynge thus shal ye feare lorde truthe pure herte cause soeuer come brother dwel theyr city bitwene blood blood bytwene lawe cōmaundement bytwene statute ordinaunces ye shall warne trespasse agaynste lorde wrath come vpon brother thus ye shall offende beholde amaria hygh preest amonge matter lorde zebadia son ismael ruler house iuda ouer suche busyness cōcerne kynge offycers leuites also take courage therfore doynge manfully lorde shall suche good ¶ merueylou •• • ittorye lorde gaue iehosapha • kynge iuda agaynste moabites chyldren ammon seir capi xx also fortuned chyldren moab chyldren ammō ammonite came agaynst iehosaphat battayle came tolde iehosaphat sayenge cometh great multitude agaynst syde see siria beholde hasason thamar whiche engadi iehosaphat feared set hym selfe seke lorde proclamed fastynge thorowout iuda iuda gathered selues togyther aske counsayle lorde came al cityes iuda make intercessyon lorde iehosaphat stode bytwene congregacyon iuda ierusalem house lord newe courte sayde lorde god father arte thou god heuen reygnest thou al kyngdoms hethen thyne hande power myght man able withstand arte thou god dydest cast enhabitours lande thy people israell gauest seed abraham thy louer euer dwelte therin haue buylte temple therin thy name sayenge ii pa • v • euyl come vpon v swerde iudgement pestilence hongre yf stande house thy presence thy name house crye vnto oure tribulation heate thou helpe beholde chyldren ammon moab mount seir thou woldest let israel go came lande egypte departed destroyed se rewarde v come cast v thy possessyon thou hast gyuen v enherite god wylt thou iudge haue myght agaynste great company cometh agaynst v neyther wote eye vnto iuda stode lorde theyr yong one theyr wyues theyr chyldren iehasiel son zacharia son benaia son ie • el son mathania leuite sonnꝭ asaph vpō hym came spirite lorde euen myddes cōgregacyon sayd herken al iuda ye enhabitours ierusalem thou kyng iehosaphat thus sayth lorde vnto afrayde faynte herted reason great multitude battayle god morowe go ye downe agaynste come vp ziz ye shall fynde ende broke wyldernesse ieruel ye shall nede fyght battayle step forth stande beholde helpe lorde feare let hertes fayle oye iuda ierusalem tomorow go agaynst lorde wyll wt iehosaphat bowed face earth iuda enhabitoures ierusalem fel lorde worshyppyng lorde leuites chyldren cahathites chyldren corahites stode vp prayse lorde god israell loude voyce hye arose early mornynge gatte vnto wyldernesse thekoa went iehosaphat stode sayd heare iuda ye enhabitoures ierusalem put truste lorde god ye may founde faythfull gyue credence prophettes shall ye prospere gaue people counsell set synge vnto lorde prayse hym beautie holynesse go armye went say prayse lorde mercy lasteth euer tyme began laude prayse lorde styrred vp certayne chyldren ammon moab layde wayte mounte seir whiche come agaynst iuda ouerthrowen stroke among selues chyldren ammon moab rose agaynst enhabiters mount seir siue destroyed made ende enhabitours sier euery one helped destroy amonge selues iuda came edge wyldernesse loked vnto multitude beholde dead carcass fallen earth none escaped ieosaphat people came take away spoyle founde amonge abundaunce goodes rayment pleasaunt iuels toke selues coulde cary away thre dayes gatheryng spoyle moche fourth day assembled valley blessing blessed lorde therfore called name place valley blessyng vnto day men iuda ieru salem returned iehosaphat theyr heade go agayne ierusalem gladnes lorde made reioyse ouer theyr enemyes came ierusalem psaltryes harpes shaulmes euen vnto house lorde feare god fel kyngdomes al landes herde lorde fought agaynst enemyes israell realme iehosaphat tranquilyte god gaue hym test euery syde 3 〈…〉 iehosaphat reygned vpon iuda xxxv yere olde whē began reygne reygned xxv yere ierusalem mother name asuba doughter silhi walked way asa father bowed therfrom doynge whiche ryght syght lorde howbeit hyll aulters taken away peple yet prepared theyr hertes vnto god theyr father rest actes ieosaphat fyrst last beholde wrytten among sayengꝭ iehu sonne hanani whiche noted boke kynges israel dyd ieosaphat kyng iuda ioyne hym selfe ahaziahu kynge israell whose mynde wyckedly coupled hym selfe hym make shyppꝭ go tharsis made shyppꝭ ezion gaber eliezer son dodanah maresa prophesied agaynst iehosaphat saynge bycause thou hast ioyned thy selfe ahaziahu lorde hath broken thy workes shyppes broken able go tharsis ¶ ieosaphat dyeth iehoram succedeth hym putteth brother death oppressed philistine dyeth fly •• capi xxi ehosaphat also 3 reg 〈…〉 slepte father buryed father citie dauid iehoram son reygned steade brother sonnes iehosaphat asaria iehicl zacharia asaria michael sephattahu sonnes iehosaphat kynge iuda theyr father gaue many great gyftes golde syluer specyal substaunce stronge cityes iuda kyngdome gaue iehoram eldest iehoram arose vp agaynst kyngdom father preuayled iudi 〈…〉 slue al brother swerde dyuers lordes israell 4 reg 〈…〉 iehoram two thyrtye yere olde began reygne reygned eyght yere ierusalem walked way kynges israell lyke dyd house ahab doughter ahab wyfe wroughte euyll eye lorde howbeit lorde wolde destroye house dauid bycause 3 reg 〈…〉 〈…〉 〈…〉 couenaunt made dauid promysed gyue lyght hym sonnes euer v • • • reg 〈◊〉 g regū 8 • dayes edomites rebelled vnder dominion iuda made selues kyng iehoram went forth lordes charettes hym arose vp nyght smote edomites whiche compassed hym captaynes charettes edom rebelled styll wolde vnder hande iuda vnto daye tyme also dyd libna departe beyng vnder hande bycause iehoram forsaken lorde god father moreouer made hyll aulters cityes iuda caused enhabitours ierusalem commyt fornicacyon prouoked iuda idolatrie came wrytyng hym elia prophet sayenge thus sayth lorde god dauid thy father bycause thou hast walked wayes iehosaphat thy father wayes asa kynge iuda walkedst wayes kynges israel hast made iuda dwelleis ierusalem go hooryng lyke hooredome house ahab hast sleyne thy brother euē thy father house whiche better yu beholde great plage wyll lorde smyte thy folke thy chyldren thy wyues thy goodes yu shalte suffre great payne euch disease thy bowel vntyl thy guttꝭ falout reason thy sycknes day day lorde styrred vp agaynst iehoram spirite philistine arabian besyde blacke moore came vp iuda wasted caried away al substaūce found kynges house sonnes wyues neuer sonne lefte hym saue iehoahaz whiche yongest among sonnes thynges lorde smote hym bowel vncurable disease came passe processe tyme euen ende ii yere guttes fell sycknes dyed euyll dyseases made ☞ burnynge hym lyke burnynge father began reygne xxxii yere olde reygned ierusalem viii yere lyued wretchedly howbeit buryed hym citye dauid amonge sepulchre kynges ¶ ahaziahu reygneth roume iehorain ieh •• kynge israell kylleth ahaziahu athalia putteth death • ynges lyu • ge onely ioas •• capcth capi xxii 4 reg • • enhabitoures ierusalem made ahaziahu yonge son kyng steade men warre ii pa xxi came wt hoost arabian sleyne al eldest sonnes ahaziahu son iehorā kyng iuda made kynge ☞ xlii yere olde began reygne reygned one yere ierusalem mother name athalia doughter amri walked also wayes house ahab mother coūsayle entysed hym wyckedly wher fore dyd euyl syght lorde house ahab coūsaylours death father destruccion walked theyr counsayle went iehorā son ahab kynge israel fyght agaynst hazael kyng siria ramoth gilead sirians smote iorā returned healed iezreel woundes whiche gyuen hym rama fought hazael kyng siria ahaziahu son iehorā king iuda went downe se iehoram son ahab iezreel bycause diseased came god ahaziahu shulde despysed comyng iehorā come went wt iehorā agaynst iehu sonne nimsi 〈…〉 lorde anoynted destroy house ahab came passe whē iehu executyng iustice vpon house ahab founde lordes iuda sonnes brother ahaziahu waytch ahaziahu slue 4 reg 〈…〉 sought ahaziahu caught hym hyd samaria brought hym iehu sleyne hym buryed hym bycause sayd son iehosaphat sought lorde al hert house ahaziahu power kepe styll kyngdome 4 reg 〈…〉 athalia mother ahaziahu sawe son dead arose destroye kynges • eed kynred house iuda iehosabeath doughter kyng toke ioas son ahaziahu stale hym among kynges sonnes • ley •• put hym nurce preuy • hambre iehosabeath doughter kynge iehoram wyfe iehoida preest syster ahaziahu hyd hym fro athalia sleyne hyd house god syxe yere athalia reygned ouer lande ¶ ioas sonne ahaziahu made kynge athalia put death capi xxiii • reg xi seuenth yere iehoiada beynge bolde toke captaynes hundredes azariahu son ieroham ismael sonne iehohanam azariahu sonne obed maasiahu son ada iahu elisaphat sonne zichri made bonde wente aboute iuda gathered leuites cityes iuda auncient father israel came ierusalem al congregacion made bonde kynge house god sayde vnto beholde kynges sonne muste reygne 3 ii 9 b 〈◊〉 par vi c 7 • 2 • b lorde hath sayde chyldren dauid therfore ye shall thyrde parte shall sabboth come preestes leuites kepers porch thyrde parte shall kynges house thyrde parte shall gate foundacion people shall exodi 27 • courtes house lorde shal none come house lorde saue preestes ministre vnto leuitꝭ shal go holy al people shal kepe watche lorde leuites shall compasse kyng rounde aboute euery man shall haue weapon hande mā soeuer doth come house lorde shal sleyne let kyng cometh goeth leuites iuda dyd accordynge thynges iehoiada preest cōmaunded toke euery man men came sabboth wente sabboth day neyther iehoiada preest let company departe ieohoiada preest delyuerrd captaynes hundred speares scheldes buckelers perteyned kynge dauid house god set al people euery man hauyng weapon hande ryght syde temple lefte syde temple alonge aulter temple rounde kynge brought kynges son put vpon hym crowne ☞ deute 17 testimonie ❀ gaue hym hande lavv vvas kepte made hym kynge iehoiada sonnes annoynted hym sayde god saue kynge athalia herde noyse people runnyng • praysynge kynge came people house lorde loked beholde kynge stode place entrynge lordes trompettes kyng people lande reioysed blowynge trompettes dyd play instrumentes musyke taught synge prayse athalia rent clothes sayde treason treason iehoiada preest went captaynes hundredes gouernours hoost sayde vnto haue without dore temple foloweth let hym sleyne sweth preest sayd shuld sley house lord layde handes tyll come entryng horse gate besyde kynges house slue 4 reg •• iehoiada made bonde bytwene hym people kynge shulde lordes people people went house baal destroyed brake aulters ymages slue mathan preest baal aulters iehoiada put office house lorde vnder hande preestes leuites 1 〈…〉 dauid distributed house lorde offer burnte offerynges vnto lorde num •• wrytten law moses reioysyng syngyng ordeyned dauid set porter gate house lorde none whiche vncleane thyng shulde entre toke captaynes hundred noble gouernours people al folke lande caused kyng come downe house lorde came thorowe hygh gate kyngꝭ house set kyng vpon scate kyngdome people lande reioysed citye tranquilite sleyne athalia swerde ¶ ioas durynge lyfe iehoiada kepeth lawe death regardeth kylleth za •• •• prophet ioas kylled owne seruauntes hym reygneth amaziahu capi xxiiii ioas seuen yere olde began reygne 4 reg •• reygned fourtye yere ierusalē mother name also zibia beer seba ioas dyd ryght syght lorde dayes iehoiada preest▪ iehoiada toke hym two wyues begat sonnes doughters chaunsed ioas mynded renew house lorde gathered togyther preestes leuites sayde go vnto cityes iuda gather al israell money repayre house god yere yere se ye hast thynge howbeit leuites slacke kynge called iehoiada cheyfest sayde vnto hym requirest thou leuites brynge iuda ierusalem 〈…〉 30 b collectyon money accordynge cōmaundement moses seruaunt lorde congregacion israel shulde offre tabernacle wytnesse wyeked athalia chyldren brake vp house god thyngꝭ dedicate house lorde dyd bestow bealim kyngꝭ cōmaundement 〈…〉 xii b made chyst set without gate house lorde made proclamacyon thorowe iuda ierusalem brynge lorde 〈…〉 30 b taxacyon money moses seruaunt god set vpon israell wyldernesse lordes al peple reioysed brought cast chyst vntyll full fortuned tyme brought chyst vnto whiche kynges busynesse hande leuites sawe moche money kynges scrybe one apoynted hygh preest came emptied chyst toke caryed place agayne thus dyd day daye gathered moche money kynge iehoiada gaue soche dyd laboure worke house lorde hyred mason carpenter repayre house lorde dyd artifycers yron brasse mende house lorde workemen wrought worke mended thorowe theyr handes made house god ought strengthed finished brought rest money kynge iehoiada therwith made vessel house lorde euen vessel minyster withall serue burnt offerynges charger spones vessel golde syluer offered burntoffe tynges house lorde continuallye dayes iehoiada ieoiada waxed olde dyed full dayes hundred xxx yere olde dyed buryed hym citye dauid amonge kynges bycause delt well israel god house death iehoiada came lordes iuda made obeysaunce kynge kynge herkened vnto lefte house lorde god theyr father serued groues ydols came wrath god vpon iuda ierusalem theyr trespass sake sent prophettꝭ bryng agayne vnto lorde testyfyed vnto wolde heare spiryte god came vpon zacharia sonne iehoiada preest stode people sayde vnto thus sayth god transgresse ye cōmaundementes lorde ye prospere bycause ye haue forsaken lorde also hath forsaken math▪ 〈…〉 conspyred agaynst hym stoned hym stone cōmaundement kyng euen courte house lorde ioas kynge remembred kyndnesse whiche iehoiada father done hym slue son dyed sayde lorde loke vpon require yeare fortuned hoost siria came vp agaynst hym came agaynst iuda ierusalem destroyed lordes people amonge people sent spoyle vnto kynge damasco sirians came small companye men lorde delyuered great hoost theyr hande bycause forsaken lorde god theyr father moreouer serued ioas accordynge departed hym lefte hym great dyseases 4 reg xii • aw • e seruauntꝭ cōspired agaynst blode chyldren iehoiada preest slue hym bed dyed buried hym citye dauid sepulchre kynges conspyred agaynst zebad sonne simeath ammonite iehosaba • sonne simrith moabite sonnes summe taxe raysed tyme repayrynge house god behold wrytten storye booke kynges amaziahu sonne reygned steade ¶ amaziahu ouercometh edomites ioas hynge israell ouercometh amaziahu capi xxv amaziahu xxv yeare olde began reygne reygned xxix yere 4 reg▪ 14 • ierusalem mother name iehodadan ierusalem dyd whiche ryght syght lorde perfyte herte soone satled kyngdome slue seruauntes kylled kyng father slue theyr chyldren bycause wrytten thus lawe boke moses lorde cōmaunded saynge deut 24 c 4 xiiii b iere xxxi • ezech 1 • c father shall dye chyldren neyther shal chyldren dye father euerye man shall dye owne syn amaziahu gathered iuda togyther made captaynes ouer thousandes ouer hundred accordyng house theyr father thorowout iuda bemamin nombred xx yeare olde aboue founde amonge thre hundred thousande chosen men able goo battayle coulde handle speare shelde hyred also hundred thousande stronge fyghtyng men israell hundred talentes syluer came man god hym sayde kynge let armye israell come lorde israell neyther house ephraim yf thou wylte nedes faythlesse come take battayle hande god shall make fall enemye god hath power helpe cast downe amaziahu sayd man god shall hundred talentes whiche haue gyuen hoost israel man god answered lorde able gyue moche amaziahu seuered armye come hym ephraim go home agayne wherfore excedyng wroth iuda returned home great angre amaziahu toke herte caryed people went salte valley • xiiii b smote chyldren seir ten ten dyd chyldren iuda take alyue caryed vnto top rocke cast downe top rocke braste souldyers armye whiche amaziahu sent away shuld go peple battayle fell vpon cuyes iuda samaria vnto bethhoron smote thre thousande toke moch spoyle chaūced amaziahu come slaughter edomites brought god chyldren seir set vp god bowed hym selfe burned cense vnto wherfore lorde wroth amaziahu sent vnto hym prophet sayde vnto hym hast thou sought god people whiche able delyuer theyr owne peple thyne hand chaunced prophet talked hym kynge sayde vnto hym haue men made kyngꝭ counsayle cease wylte thou beaten prophet ceased sayd sure god mynded destroye bycause thou haste done agreest vnto counsayle 4 xiiii • amaziahu kynge iuda toke aduyse sent ioas sonne iehoahaz sonne iehu kynge israell sayde come maye se eyther ioas kynge israell sent amaziahu kynge iuda sayenge thystle libanon sente cedar tree libanō sayenge 4 x ••• iuduū 〈◊〉 4 esd 4 • gyue thy doughter sonne wyfe came wylde beast libanon trode downe thystle thou sayst thou hast beaten edomites thyne herte maketh proude gloryfy thy selfe therfore byde home doest thou prouoke vnto euyl thou mayst peryshe bothe thou iuda amaziahu wolde herken came god euen deliuer hande theyr enemyes bycause sought coūsayle god edom ioas kynge israell came vp sawe eyther bothe amaziahu kynge iuda bethsames whiche iuda iuda put worse israel fled euery man tent ioas kynge israell amaziahu kynge iuda sonne ioahas sonne iehoahas bethsames brought hym ierusalem tare walle ierusalem gate ephraim vnto gate ouer agaynst foure hundred cubytes toke also al golde syluer al iuels founde house god obed edom treasure kynges house yonge wardes returned samaria amaziahu sonne ioas kynge iuda lyued death ioas sonne iehoahaz kynge israell fyftye yeare rest actes amaziahu fyrst last wrytten booke kynges iuda israell tyme amaziahu dyd turne away frō lorde 4 〈…〉 conspyred treason agaynst hym ierusalem fled lachis sent lathi slue brought vp horse buryed hym father 〈…〉 citye iuda ¶ death amaziahu reygneth •• zia otherwyse called ozia whiche stryhen • eper io • ham reygneth 〈◊〉 r ••• e capi xxvi people iuda toke uzia whiche 〈…〉 syxtene yeare olde made kyng roume father amaziahu buylte eloth brought agayne iuda kynge layd slepe father syrtene yere olde uzia whē began reygne reygned • • yeare ierusalem mother name also iecholia ierusalem dyd whiche ryght syght lorde accordyng ala dyd father amaziahu came passe sought god dayes zachariahu 〈…〉 xii b whiche maynteyned feare god longe sought lorde god made hym prospere went battayle agaynst philistine brake downe wall geth wall iabne wall asdod buylt cityes aboute asdod amonge philistinꝭ god helped hym agaynst philistine agaynst arabian dwelte gurbaal hammehunim ammonytes gaue tribute uzia name spred abrode euen entryng egypt played man excedyngly moreouer uzia buylte towres ierusalem corner gate valley gate turnynge wall made stronge buylte wres wyldernesse dygged many welles moche cattell valleyes playnes plowman vynedressers mountaynes charmell loued husbandrye uzia hoost fyghtynge men went warre armaye accordynge nombre theyr offyce vnder hande ieiell scrybe maasiahu ruler vnder hande hanania whiche one kynges lordes hole nombre auncyent father men myght two thousand syxe hundred vnder hande armye men war euen thre hundred seuen thousande fyue hundred made war power armye helpyng kyng agaynst enemyes uzia prouyded thorowout hoost sheldes speares helmettes • abergeons bowes slynges cast stone made subtel engynnes ierusalem whiche inuented layde towres corner shute arowes greate stone name spred far abrode bycause helped excellently became myghtye strength herte arose destructtō transgressed agaynst lorde god went temple lorde burne cense vpon aulter incense azariahu preest went hym hym foure score preestes lorde valeaunt men stode uzia kynge sayd vnto hym nume 28 • perteyneth uzia burne cense vnto lorde preestes chyldren aaron consecrate offre incense come therfore sanctuarye thou hast trespassed worshyp lorde god uzia wroth cense hande burne whyle indyngnacyon agaynst preestes 4 reg • v • leprosye sprange foreheade preestes house lorde euen besyde incense aulter azariahu cheyfe preest preestes loked vpon hym beholde become leper forheade vexed hym thence fayne go bycause lorde smytten hym uzia kynge cōtynued leper vnto daye death dwelt seuerall house beynge leper shu • t house lord iotham sonne gouernaunce kynges house iudged people land rest actes uzia fyrst last dyd isai prophet sonne amos wryte uzia slept father buryed hym father felde buryall besyde sepulchre kynges sayde leper iotham sonne reygned steade ¶ iotham reygneth ouert • meth ammo • ytes ahaz sonne reygneth aftre hym capi xxvii otham fyue twentye yere olde 4 reg▪ • v • began reygne reygned syxtene yeare ierusalem mother name also ierusa doughter zadoc dyd ryght syght lorde poyntes dyd father uzia saue ☞ came temple lorde people dyd yet wyckedly buylte bygh gate temple lorde wall house ordynaunce buylte mach moreouer buylte cityes mountaynes iuda wood coūtrey buylt castels towres fought wt kyng chyldrē ammon preuayled agaynst chyldren ammon gaue hym yeare hundred talentes syluer ten thousande quarter wheate ten thousande batley moche dyd chyldren ammon gyue hym second yere thyrde also iotham became myghtye bycause directed waye lorde god rest actes iotham warres conuersacion wrytten boke kynges israell iuda xxv yere olde began reygne reygned syxtene yere ierusalem iotham slepte father buryed hym citye dauid ahaz sonne reygned steade ¶ wyckednesse ihaz kynge iuda hym reygneth heze •• capi xxviii ahaz • reg xvi • twentye yeare olde began reygne reygned syxtene yere ierusalem dyd whiche ryght syght lorde dyd father dauid walked wayes kynges israell made molten ymages baalim offered incense valley sonne hinnom dente 1 • b • 〈◊〉 xxi burnt chyldren fyre abhomynacyons heathen whome lorde cast chyldren israell offred also burnte incence hylaulters mountaynes vnder euery grene tre • xvi • esai vii e wherfore lorde god delyuered hym hande kynge sirians whiche bet hym caryed awaye great multitude captiue brought damasco delyuered hande kynge israell whiche smote hym great slaughter pekah sonne remaliahu slue iuda c twentye thousand one day whiche fyghtynge men bycause forsaken lorde god theyr fatheyrs z • chri myghtye man ephraim slue maasiahu kynges sonne asrica gouernoure house elcana nexte kynge chyldren israell toke prysoners theyr brother c c thousande woman sonnes doughters caryed awaye moch spoyle brought spoyle samaria prophet lordes whose name obed went hoost came samaria sayde vnto beholde bycause lorde god youre father wroth iuda hath delyuered youre hande ye haue slayne cruelnesse reacheth vp heuen ye purpose kepe vnder chyldren iuda ierusalem make bondman bondwoman ye lade youre selues syn syght lorde god nowe heare therfore delyuer captyues agayne whiche ye haue taken brother el shall great wrath god vpon wherfore certayne heades chyldren ephraim azaria sonne iehohanan berechiahu sonne mesillemoth iehezkiah • sonne sallum amasa sonne hadlai stode vp agaynst came war sayde vnto brynge captyues hyther haue offended towarde god redye ye entende adde synnes trespasse trespasse great redye fearce wrath agaynst israell vpon men armes lefte captyues spoyle lordes congregacyon men nowe reheat • ed name rose vp toke prysones spoyle clothed naked amonge arayde shoed gaue eate drynke anoynted caryed feble vpon ass brought ierico citye paulme tree theyr brother returned samaria agayne • 〈…〉 tyme dyd kyng ahaz sende vnto kynges assur haue helpe edomites came agayne slue iuda caryed awaye captyues philistine inuaded cityes lowe countrey towarde south iuda toke bethsames aialon gederoth socho townes longyng therto thimna townes gimso townes therof dwelte lorde brought iuda lowe bycause ahaz kynge iuda whiche made iuda naked transgressed fore agaynst lorde thilgath pylneser kynge assirians came vpon hym beseyged hym myghtye ynough hym ahaz toke awaye porcyon oute house lorde oute kynges house lordes house gaue vnto kynge assiryans yet helped hym verye tyme tribulacion dyd kynge ahaz trespasse yet agaynst lorde offered vnto god damasco whiche bette hym sayde bycause god kynges siria helpe therfore wyl offer maye helpe also destruction destruccyon israell ahaz gathered togyther vessel house god brake 〈…〉 shut vp dores house lorde made hym 〈…〉 c aulters euery corner ierusalem cityes iuda made hyll aulters burne incense vnto god angred lorde god father rest actes workes fyrst last beholde wrytten booke kynges iuda israell ahaz slepte father buryed hym citye ierusalem brought hym vnto sepulchre kynges iuda hezekia sonne reygned steade ¶ hezehia otherwyse called ezechias ieh • zki • ah •• restoreth vnto temple lorde thynges ben regarded predeceslouts capi xxix hezekia began reygne fyue twentye yeare olde reygned nyne twentye yeare ierusalem mother name abia doughter zachariahu dyd whiche ryght syght lorde poyntes dyd dauid father 〈…〉 opened dores house lorde 〈…〉 fyrst yere fyrst moneth reygne repayred brought preestes leuites gathered togyther east strete sayde vnto heare ye leuites nowe sanctifyed halowe house lorde god father brynge fylthynesse holy place oure father haue trespassed done euyll eye lorde god haue forsaken hym turned awaye theyr face habitacyon lorde turned theyr backes besyde haue shutte vp dores porch quenched lampes haue neyther burned cense offered burntofferynges holye place vnto god israell wherfore wrath lorde fell iuda ierusalem hath brought trouble wondred hyssed euen ye se eye lo oure father ouerthrowen swerde sonnes doughters wyues caryed awaye captyue cause nowe herte make couenaunte lorde god israell maye turne away heuye indygnacyon v nowe therfore sonnes neclygent lorde num 〈◊〉 • hath chosen stande hym minystre serue hym burne incense leuites arose mahath son amasai ioell sonne azariahu chyldren cahathites sonnes merari ki son addi azariahu sonne iehalelell sonnes gersonites ioah sonne simma eden sonne ioah sonnes elizaphan simri iehiell sonnes asaph zacharia mathaniahu sonnes heman iehiell simei sonnes ieduthun semaia uziell gathered theyr brother puryfyed selues came accordyng cōmaundement kyng wordꝭ lorde clense house lorde preestes wente inner partes house lorde clense brought vnclennesse founde temple lorde courte house lorde leuites toke carye broke cedron began fyrst day fyrst moneth purifye eyght daye moneth came porch lorde purged house lorde eyght dayes syxtene daye fyrūe moneth made ende went herekia kynge sayde haue clensed house lorde aulter burnts offerynge vessel shewbread table apparell vessel whiche kynge ahaz dyd caste syde reygned transgressed haue prepared sanctifyed beholde aulter lorde hezekia kynge rose early gathered lordes citye went vp house lorde brought seuen ox seuen • ammes seuen shepe seuen gootes • synne offerynge kyngdome sancturye iuda cōmaunded preestes sonnꝭ aaron offer aulter lorde slue ox preestes receyued bloode sprynkled aulter lykewyse sleyne rammes sprynkled bloode vpon aulter slue also shepe sprynkled bloode vpō aulter brought forth gootes synofferynge kynge congregacion put theyr handes vpon preestes slue bloode clensed aulter make satasfactyon israell kynge commaunded burntofferynge synofferynge shulde made israell set leuitꝭ house lorde symbals psaltryes harpes • pa xxv accordynge cōmaundement dauid gad kyngꝭ sear nathan prophet cōmaūdement lorde thorow hande prophettes leuites stode hauynge instrumentes dauid preestꝭ helde trompettes hezekia cōmaunded offer burnte offeryng vpō aulter burnt offeryng began songe lorde began also trompetꝭ instrumentes ordeyned hande dauid kynge israell congregacyon worshypped syngynge songe blowynge trompettes contynued vntyll burntofferynge fynysshed made ende offeryng kynge present hym bowed selues worshypped hezekia kynge lordes spake leuites prayse lorde wordes dauid asaph sear leuites sange prayses gladnesse bowed selues worshypped hezekia answered sayde nowe ye haue consecrate handꝭ lorde go therfore brynge sacrifyces thankofferynges house lorde congregacyon brought sacrifyces thankofferynges burntofferyngꝭ many fre liberal herte nombre burntoffryngꝭ congregacyon brought lxx ox c rammes c c shepe burntofferyng lorde ☞ dedycated syxe hundred ox thre thousand shepe preestes fleye burntofferyngꝭ theyr brother leuites dyd helpe tyl ended worke vntyll preestes sanctifyed leuites purer herted sanctifyed preestes therto burntofferynges many fat peaceofferyngꝭ drynkeofferyngꝭ longe burntofferyng seruice perteynyng house lorde finysshed hezekia reiosed people god made flocke redye thynge soone done ¶ hezekia renueth feast passeouer capi xxx hezekia sent israell iuda wrote letter ephraim manasse shulde come house lorde ierusalem offer passeouer vnto lorde god israell kynge helde counsayle lordes congregacyon ierusalem nume 〈◊〉 • kepe feast passeouer seconde moneth coulde kepe tyme bycause preestes sanctifyed suffycyentlye neyther people gathered togyther ierusalem thyng pleased kynge congregacyon decreed shuld proclamed thorowout israell beersabe dan shulde come holde feast passeouer vnto lorde god israell ierusalē done greate season shulde haue done lawe postes went letter hand kynge lordes thorowout israel iuda cōmaundement kynge sayde ye chyldren israell turne agayne vnto lorde god abraham isaac israell let euery one returne remenaūt escaped hande kyngꝭ assur ye lyke father brother whiche trespassed agaynst lorde god theyr father whiche gaue vp destroyed ye se nowe ye styffe necked lyke father yeld selues vnto lorde entre holy place hath sanctifyed euer serue lorde god fearcenesse wrathe shall turne awaye yf ye turne agayne vnto lorde shal brethrē youre chyldren fynde compassyon presence toke captyue shall come agayne vnto lande erodi 〈…〉 ierem 〈◊〉 • psal 〈…〉 lorde god gracyous mercyfull wyl turne away face yf ye conuerte vnto hym postes went citye citye lande ephraim manasse euen vnto zabulon laughed scorne mocked neuerthelesse yet dyuerse asser manasse zabulon submytted selues came ierusalem hande god iuda gaue one herte cōmaundement kynge ruler accordynge worde lorde assembled ierusalē moch people present myghtye great cōgregacion holde feast swete bread seconde moneth arose remoued • ▪ pa 〈◊〉 • aulters ierusalem vessel incense dyd away cast broke cedron slue passeouer xiiii day seconde moneth preestes leuites ☞ whiche ashamed sanctifyed selues brought burntofferyngꝭ house lorde stode theyr offyce theyr maner accordyng sawe moses man god preestes sprynkled bloode whiche receyued hande leuites many congregacyon sanctifyed leuites dyd sley passeouer cleane myght execute holy worke lorde many people many ephraim manasse isakar zabulon clensed yet dyd eate passeouer agaynst lawe appoynted wherfore hezekia prayed sayd good lorde mercyful vnto set hoole herte seke lorde god euen god father dyd accordyng vnfayned holynesse lorde herde hezekia healed people chyldren israell present ierusalem helde feast swete breade seuen dayes great gladnesse leuites preestes praysed magnified power lorde day day vpon instrumentes hezekia spake hertely vnto leuites vnderstandynge good mynde towarde lorde dyd eate thorowout feast seuen dayes longe offered peaceofferynges thanked lorde god theyr father hole assemble toke counsayle seuen dayes helde vii dayes gladnesse hezekia kyng iuda toke amonge cattell congregacion yonge ox seuen shepe lordes gaue congregacyon yonge ox ten thousande shepe great nombre preestes sanctifyed congregacyon iuda preestes leuites congregacyon came israell straungers came lande israell dwelte iuda reioysed greate gladnesse ierusalem synce tyme salomon sonne dauid kynge israell soche ioye ierusalem preestꝭ leuites arose blessed people theyr voyce herde lorde theyr prayer came vp vnto heuen holy dwellynge place ¶ hezekia called agayne people vnto way lorde ordeneth preestes vnto cōmaundeth gyue tythes capi xxxi thynges finysshed israell present cityes iuda went brake ymages 2 par 14 • cut downe groues brake hygh place ii par 33 • aulters thorowout iuda ben iamin ephraim also manasse vntyll vtterly destroyed chyldren israell returned euery man possessyon theyr owne cityes hezekia appoynted sundrye companyes preestes leuites dyuersyte theyr minystracyons euery man accordynge offyce bothe preestes leuites burntofferynge peaceofferynges ministre gyue thankes prayse gate hooste lorde kyngꝭ porcyon substaūce gaue burntofferynges mornynge euenyng burntofferyngꝭ sabboth dayes newe moones solempne feastes accordyng num 〈◊〉 • wrytten law lorde bad people dwelt ierusalem gyue parte preestes leuites myght substancyally applye selues lawe lorde soone kynges cōmaundement came abrode chyldren israell brought aboundaunce fyrst fruytes corne wyne oyle honye maner fruytes felde tythes maner thynges brought plenteouslye chyldren israell iuda dwelt city iuda also brought tythes ox shepe holy tythes whiche consecrate vnto lorde theyr god dyd offre brought heapes thyrde moneth began lay heapes maner foundacyon finysshed seuenth moneth hezekia lordꝭ cam • saw heapes blessed lord people israell hezekia questioned preestes leuites concernyng heapes azaria cheyfe preest house zadocke answered hym sayde syn • e peple began bryng heaueofferyngꝭ house lorde also haue ynough • ate remayned moch lorde hath blessed people heape lefte hezekia bad prepare chamber house lorde dyd prepare caryed heaue offerynges tythes dedicate thynges faythfully ouer chonaniahu leuite rule semei brother next hym iehiel asaziahu nahath asaell ierimoth iosabad eliel iesmachiahu mahath banaiahu ouersects ordeyned chonaniahu semei brother officer hezekia kyng asaria ruler house god ❀ vnto vvhom thynges belonged chore sonne iimna leuite por • er east dore ouer syght thynges offered frewyll vnto god giuen maner seuerally vnto lord ouer thyngꝭ moost holye vnder hande eden mintamin iesua semeiahu amariahu sechaniahu cityes preestes appoynted theyr fyde lyte gyue theyr brother theyr porcions well small greate excepte male rekened frō thre yere aboue amonge went house lorde shulde gyue day daye theyr ministracyon theyr gyuynge attendaunce theyr dyuerse waytynges course preestes leuites thore wout houshold theyr father twentye yeare aboue wayte theyr course came family theyr babe wyues sonnes doughters thorowe congregacyon vpon fydelyte ☞ holy thynges bestowed chyldren aaron preestes whiche feldes suburbes theyr cityes citye citye men whose name wire expressed shuld gyue portyons euen al male amonge preestes leuites accordynge theyr nombre maner dyd hezekia thorowout iuda wrought good ryght true lorde god workes beganne seruyce house god lawe cōmaundementes sought god dyd herte prospered ¶ sennacherib sanherib be • ygynge ierusalem▪ str • hr • angell hezekia dyeth succedeth manasse capi xxxii dedes faythfully done 4 reg 1 • • esai 36 • eccle 48 • sennacherib kynge assur came entred iuda compassed stronge cityes thought wyn hym selfe hezekia saw sennacherib come purposed fyght agaynste ierusalem toke counsayle lordes men myght stop water fountaynes without citie dyd helpe hym gathered many people togyther stopt al welles broke ranne thorow myddes lande sayenge shal kyngꝭ assur come fynde moch water hezekia wente lustelye buylte vp wall broken made ordynaunce vpon towres wal without repayred millo citye dauid made many dartes sheldes set captaynes war ouer people gathered togyther hym large strete gate citye spake tentellye sayenge plucke vp hertes stronge afrayde discouraged kynge assur al multitude hath hym 4 reg vi • mo v hym hym ia • xvii • arme flesshe v lorde god helpe v fyght battayls people toke courage thorowe wordes hezekia kyng iuda 4 〈◊〉 • dyd sennacherib kynge assur sende seruauntes ierusalem hym selfe remayned besyde lachis hauyng power hym vnto hezekia kyng iuda vnto al iuda ierusalem sayenge thus sayeth sennacheryb kynge assur 4 reg 〈◊〉 • wherein ye trust ye dwell ierusalem beseyged doth hezekia entyce gyue ouer selues vnto death hunger thyrst sayenge lorde god shal ryd v hande kynge assur hath hezekia put downe hygh place aulters cōmaunded iuda ierusalem sayenge ye shall worshyp one aulter burne incense vpon knowe ye father haue done vnto people landꝭ • god people landes able myghtye saue theyr landes hande god nacyons father destroyed coulde delyuer peple myne hande shal god able delyuer myne hand wherfore let hezekia deceyue persuade fassyō yet byleue hym god among nacions kyngdomes able ryd peple myne hande hande father howe moche lesse shal god able kepe myne hande yet mo thynges dyd seruauntes speake agaynst lorde god agaynst seruaunt hezekia sennacherib also wrote letter rayle lorde god israel spake agaynst hym saynge • god nacions landes haue bene able delyuer theyr people myne hande euen shal god hezekia delyuer people myne hande cryed wt loude voyce iues speche vnto peple ierusalem wall feare make faynt heried myght take citye spake agaynst god ierusalem agaynst god nacions earth worke handes men hezekia kyng prophet isal son amoz prayed agaynst blasphemye cryed vp heuen lorde sent angel destroyed men war lordes captaynes hoost kyng assur turned face agayne shame towarde owne lande • 〈◊〉 xix g come house god came owne body slue hym wt swerde lorde saued hezekia enhabitours ierusalem hande sennacherib kynge assur hande maynteyned euery syde many brought offerynges vnto lorde ierusalem presentes hezekia kyng iuda magnifyed syght nacions thence forth • 〈◊〉 〈◊〉 〈◊〉 38 dayes hezekia sycke vnto death prayed vnto lorde answered hym shewed hym wonderful myracle hezekia dyd agayne vnto god accordyng shewed hym herte arose came wrath vpon hym vpon iuda ierusalem notwithstandyng hezekia submytted hym selfe herte rysen vp enhabitours ierusalem wrath lorde came vpon dayes hezekia hezekia excedynge mocherychesse honoure gat hym treasure syluer golde precious stone spice sheldes maner pleasaunt iuelles made store house fruytes corne wyne oyle stalles al maner beastes foldes shepe made hym cityes shepe ox great aboundaunce god gyuen hym substaunce excedynge moche hezekia stopped vpper water spryngꝭ gihon brought downe west syde citie dauid hezekia prospered workes prynces babilon sent vnto hym ambassadoures enquyre wondre chaūced lande god lefte hym deut viii trye hym herte myghte knowen rest dedes hezekia goodnesse beholde wrytten vision isai prophet sonne amoz boke kynges iuda israel hezekia slepte father buried worthy place sepulchre sonnes dauid iuda enhabytours ierusalem dyd worshyp death manasse sonne reygned steade ¶ manasse taken prysoner rometh lyke vnto abhominacions hethen lorde cast chyldren israel went buylte hylaulters 4 reg 〈◊〉 whiche hezekia father broken downe reared vp aulters baalim made groues worshypped hoost heuen serued buylt aulters house lord lorde yet sayd ii vil b 11 pa • vi v •• c ierusalem shal name euer buylt aulters hoost heuen two courtes house lord burnt chyldren fyre valley sonne hinnom sorcerer regarded cryenge byrdes vsed inchauntment maynteyned worker spirites sears fortune wrought moche euyll syght lorde angre hym withall put carued ymage idoll whiche made house god house god sayd dauid salomon sonne house ierusalem whiche haue chosen tribe israell ii vi • b • viii b 〈◊〉 pa vi vii c wyll put name euer wyll bryng seate israel land haue ordeyned father wyll diligent and▪ haue cōmaunded lawe statute ordinaunces hande moses manasse made iuda enhabytours ierusalem er • e worse hethen lorde destroyed chyldren israell lorde spake manasse people wolde regarde wherfore lorde brought vpon captaynes hoost kyng assirians whiche toke manasse holde bounde hym cheynes caryed hym babilon tribulacyon besought lorde god humbled hym selfe excedyngly god father made intercessyon hym god entreated hym offerynges thank offeryng charged iuda serue lorde god israel neuer thelesse people dyd offce styl hylaul ters howbeit vnto lorde theyr god onely rest actes manasse prayer vnto god wordes seat spake
