seale lyuynge god cryed loude voyce foure angel power geuen hurt y• erth see saying hurt earth nether see nether tree tyll haue sealed seruauntes oure god theyr forheades hearde nombre sealed ther sealed c xliiij al trybes chyldrē israel y• trybe iuda sealed xij trybe rubyn sealed xij trybe gad sealed xij trybe aser sealed xij trybe neptalim sealed xij trybe manasses sealed xij trybe symeō sealed xij tribe leuy sealed xij trybe isacar sealed xij trybe zabulō sealed xij trybe ioseph sealed xij trybe beniamin sealed xij behelde lo great multitude whiche noman coulde nombre naciōs people tōges stode y• seate lābe clothed wt longe whyte garmentes palmes theyr handes cryed wt lowde voyce saying saluacyō ascrybed yt sytteth vpon seate oure god vnto lābe ye angel stode cōpase seate y• elder foure beastes fell seate theyr face worshypped god sayinge amē blessinge glory wysdome thākes honour power myght • nto oure god euermore amen ⊢ one elder answered laying vnto whiche arayed longe whyte garmentes whence came sayde vnto lord yu wotest sayde whiche cam great tribulacyon made theyr garmentes large made whyte bloude lambe therfore presence seate god serue daye nyght tēple y• sytteth y• seate wyl dwell amonge shall hong •• r neyther thyrst neyther shal sunne light thē nether heate lambe myddest seate shall f •• de shall leade vnto foūtaynes lyuinge water god shall wype alwaye teares theyr eye ¶ seuenth seale • opened sylence heauen foure angel blowe theyr trompetes greate plage folowe v •• earth capi viii opened seuenth seale silēce heauen space halfe houre sawe angelles standynge god thē geuē seuen trompettes another angell came stode aultre hauynge goldē senser much odoures geuen vnto y• shulde offre prayer sainctes vpon y• goldē aulter y• seate smoke odoures cam prayer saynctes ascended vp god angelles hande angell toke senser fylled wt fyre aulter cast earth voyces made thondrynges lyghtnynges earthquake seuen angel seuen trōpettes prepared thē selues blow fyrst angell blewe made hayle fyre whiche myngled bloude caste earth thyrde part ⚜ earth set fyre thyrde part tree burnt grene grasse brente seconde angell blewe greate mountayne burnynge wt fyre cast see thrde part see tourned bloude thyrde part creature whiche lyfe dyed thyrde parte shyppes destroyed thyrde angel blewe fell greate starre heauen burnyng lampe fell thyrde parte ryuers fountaynes water name y• starre called wormwod thyrde parte turned wormwod many men dyed water made bytter y• fourth angell blewe thyrde part sunne smytten thyrde part mone thyrde parte starres thyrde parte darckened daye smytten thyrde part shulde shyne lyke wyse nyght behelde herde angell flyinge thorowe myddest heauen sayinge lowde voyce woo woo woo inhabyters earth voyces come trōpe thre angel whiche yet blowe ¶ fyfte syxt angell blowe theyr trompettes starre falleth frō heauen locustes come smoke fyrste wo pa •• e fo ••• angel bounde losed thyrde parte • men kylled capi ix fyft angel blewe sawe starre fal frō heauē vnto y• erth • hym geuen kaye bottomlesse pytt opened bottomlesse pytt smoke pytt arose smoke greate fornace sunne ayre darckned reason smoke pytt came smoke locustes vpon erth vnto thē geuen power scorpion erth haue power commaunded shude hurt grasse erth nether grene thing nether tree men haue seale theyr forheades commaunded shulde kyll thē shulde vexed v monethes theyr payne payne yt cōmeth scorpion hathe stonge man esaye ii oset x luk xxiii dayes shall men seke deeth shal fynde shal desyre dye deeth shall flye symilitude locustes lyke vnto horsses prepared vnto battayll theyr heades crownes lyke vnto golde face yt bene y• face men heere heere wemen theyr teethe teeth lyōs habbergyons habbergyons yron sounde winges sounde charettes whē many horsses runne together battayle rayles lyke vnto scorpion ther stynges tayles power hurt mē v monethes kyng ouer thē angell bottomlesse pytt whose name hebrew tong abadon greke tonge apolliō saye destroyer one wo past behold two wooes come yet thys syxt angell blewe herde avoyce iiij corner golden aultre god sayinge syxt angell whiche trōpe lose foure angelles boūde y• grete ryuer euphrates foure angelles loosed whiche prepared houre daye moneth yere slee iii part men nombre horsmen warre xx tym e x herde nombre thus sawe horse vision • ate hauynge fyry habergions iacincte couloure brymstone heades horse heades lyon theyr mouthes went forth fyre smoke brymstone thre thyrd part mē kylled saye fyre smoke brimstone proceded monthes power mouthes tayles theyr tayles lyke vnto serpentes heades dyd hurt remnaūt mē whiche kylled plage repēted dedes hādes shulde worshippe deuyls ymages golde syluer brasse stone wood nether se nether heare nether go also repēted theyr mutther theyr sorcery nether theyr fornicacyon nether theyr thefte angell hath b • ke opē sweareth shalbe nomore tyme geueth boke vnto ihon eateth vp capi x sawe another myghtye angel come downe frō heauen clothed cloude rayne bowe vpon heed hys face sunne hys fete pyllars fyre hande lytel boke open put ryght fote vpon see lyfte fote erth cryed lowde voyce lyon roreth cryed seuen thonders spake theyr voyces vij thondres spoken theyr voyces wryte herde voyce frō heauen sayinge vnto seale vp thynges whiche vii thondres spake wryte angell sawe stāde vpō see vpon earth lyfte vp hande heauen sware lyueth euer created heauē thynges therin lande th • thynges therin see thynges therin shulde lenger tyme dayes voyce seuenth angell shall begynne blowe euen mystery god shalbe fynyshed preached hys seruauntes prophetes voyce herde frō heauen spake vnto agayne sayde eze ii • go take lytle boke open hande angel stādeth vpon see • vpō erth went vnto y• angell sayde hym geue lytel boke sayde vnto take eate vp shall make thy belly bytter shalbe thy • nouth swete hony e • e iii • toke y• lytl • boke hande eate vp mouth swete ashony • sone eaten belly byt • er sayde vnto y• muste prophesy agayne among people nation tōges many kynges ¶ temple measured seconde wo io past capi xi giuen rede lyke vnto rodde sayde vnto ryse meate tēple god aulter worshyp therin queer whyche within temple cast meate gyuen vnto gentyles holy cytie shall treade vnder fote xli • monethes wyl gyue power vnto two wytnesses shall prophesy thousande two hundreth lx dayes clothed sacke clothe two olyue tree two candelstyckes standyng god earth yf man wyl hurt fyre shall procede mouthes consume enemyes yf man wyll hurte wyse must kylled haue power shut heauen raine dayes prophesying haue power ouer water turne bloude smyte earth al maner plage often wyll haue fynyshed testimony beast came bottom lesse pyt shall make warre agaynste shall ouercome kyl bodyes shall lye stretes greate cytie whiche spiritually called zodom egypte lorde crucyfied people kynredes tonges naciōs shall se body iij dayes halfe shal suffre body put graues dwel vpon earth shall reioyce ouer glad shal sende gyftes one another two prophetes vexed dwelt earth iii dayes halfe spirit lyfe god entred thē stode vp vpon fete great feare came vpon saw herde great voyce heauen saying vnto thē come vp hyther ascended vp heauen cloude enemyes sawe hour great earthquake tenth part cytie fell earth quake slaine name men seuen remnaunt feared gaue glory god heauen seconde wo past beholde thyrde wo wyll come anone seuenth angel blewe made greate voyces heauen sayinge kyngdomes worlde lordes christes shal raigne euermore xxiiij elder syt god seates fell vpon face worshypped god sayinge gyue thankes lorde god almightye art wast arte come thou hast receyued thy great myght hast raygned nacions angrye thy wrath come tyme dead shulde iudged thou shuldest gyue reward vnto thy seruauntes prophetes saynctes feare thy name small great shuldest destroy whiche destroy earth temple god opened heauen sene temple arcke testamēt ther folowed lyghtnynges voice thondrynges earthquake muche hayle ¶ seuenth angell bloweth crompet appereth heauen womā dothed sōne michael • igh teth dragon whiche persecuteth woman capi xii appeared great wonder heuen woman clothed sōne mone vnder fete vpon heade crowne xij starres chylde cryed trauaylynge byrth payned redy delyuered • red another wonder heauen behold great red dragon hauyng vij heades ten horne crownes vpon heades tayle drue thyrde part starres cast earth dragon stode woman whiche redy delyuered deuoure chylde sone borne brought forth man chylde whych shulde rule nacions rod ofyron sonne taken vp vnto god seate woman fled wyldernes place prepared god shulde fede • ij hundreth lx dayes great battayle heau • michael angel fought dragon dragō fought angel preuayled neyther place founde heauen great dragon old serpēt called deuyl sathanas cast deceyueth al worlde cast earth angel werecast also hearde loude voyce sayinge heauen made saluacion strength kyngdome god power christ cast downe accused god day nyght ouercame bloude lābe worde testimonye loued lyues vnto death therfore reioyce heuens ye dwel thē wo inhabiters erth see deuyll come downe vnto hath gret wrath knoweth hath short tyme dragon sawe cast vnto earth persecuted womā whiche brought forth mā chylde woman gyuen two wynges great egle myght flye wyldernes place noryshed tyme tymes halfe time presence serpent dragon cast mouth water woman bene ryuer shulde haue bene caught flode erth holpe woman erth opened mouth swalowed vp ryuer whych dragon cast mouth dragon wroth woman went made warre wyth remnaunt hyrsede kepe commaundementes god haue testimony iesus christ stode see sande ¶ beast ryseth see seuen heades ten hururs another beaste commeth earth two horne capi xiii sawe beast tyse see hauyng seuen heades ten horne vpon horne ten crownes vpō hys heade name blasphemy beast whiche sawe lyke catte mountayne fete fete beare hys mouth mouth ly dragon gaue hym hys power hys seate great auctoryte saw one heades wounded death deadly wounde healed al world wōdred beast worshypped dragon whiche gaue power vn beast worshyiped beast sayinge like vnto beast able warre gyuē vnto mouth spake great thynges blasphemy power giuen vnto hym xlij monethes opened mouth vnto blasphemy agaynst god blaspheme hys name tabernacle thē dwel heauen gyuen vnto hym make warre sayntes ouer come power giuen ouer kynred tonge nacion al dwel vpon erth worshypt whose name written boke lyfe lambe whiche kylled begynning world man haue eare let heare ledeth captiuite shal go captiuite mat 26 • gene ix killeth swearde must kylled swearde heare pacyence fayth saynctes great wonder made fyre come downe heuen earth syght men deceyued thē dwel erth meanes sygnes whiche power syght beast saying dwelt erth shuld make ymage vnto beast whiche wounde swearde dyd lyue power gyue spirit vnto ymage beast ymage beast shulde speake shuld cause many wolde worshyp ymage beast shuld killed made al small great rych pore fre bonde receyue marke ryght hā de forheades man fallē fallē great cytie made al nacions dryncke wyne fornicacion thyrd angel folowed thē saying loude voyce mā worshyppe beast ymage receyue marcke forhead hāde shall dryncke wyne wrath god powred cup wrath shal punyshed fyre brymstone holy angel lambe smoke torment ascēdeth vp euermore haue rest day nyght whiche worshyp beast ymage whosoeuer receyueth prynt hys name pacience sainctes kepe commaundementes fayth iesu herde voyce heuen saying vnto wryte blessed dead hereafter dye lord euen sayeth spirit rest labour workes folow loked behold white clowde vpon clowde one syttynge lyke vnto sonne man hauyng hys head golden crowne hande sharpe syckle another angell came temple cryinge loude voyce hym sate cloude ioel ii • c thrust thy sykle repe y• tyme come repe corne erth rype satte cloude thrust sycle earth erth reped another angell came temple heuen hauyng also sharpe syckle another angell came frō aulter power ouer fyre cryed wt loude crye hym sharpe sykle sayd thrust thy sharpe sykle gather cluster earth grape rype angel thrust sykle erth cut downe grape vyneyarde earth cast thē great wynefat wrath god winefat troden without cytie bloude came fat euen vnto horsse brydels space thousande vj c furlonges capi xv ¶ seyth seuen angelles hauynge seuen uyalles full wrathe saw another signe heuē great maruaylous seuen angel hauinge seuen laste plage fulfylled wrath beholde tē ple tabernacle testimony open heauen seuen angel came temple seuen plage clothed pure bryght lynnē hauyng brestes gyrded wt golden gyrdels one fowre beestes gaue vnto seuē angel seuen goldē vyalles full y• wrath god lyueth euermore temple full smoke glory god power man able entre temple til seuen plage seuen angel fulfylled ¶ angel power theyr vyalles ful wrath capi xvi herde great voyce temple sayinge seuen angel go youre wayes poure vyalles wrath vpon erth fyrste angell went powred uyall vpon erth fell noysome sore botche vpon men whiche marcke beast vpon thē worshypped hys ymage seconde angel shed vyall vpon see turned bloude dead man euery lyuyng thyng dyed see thyrde angel shed viall vpon ryuets fountaynes water turned bloude herde angell say lorde whiche arte waste thou art ryghtuous holy thou hast giuen suche iudgementes shed bloud saites prophetes therfore haste yu genē thē bloude dryncke worthy herde another aulter saye euen lorde god almyghtye true rightuous thy iudgementes ye fourth angel powred vial sunne power gyuen vnto vexe men heate fyre men raged great heat spake euil name god hath power ouer plage repēted giue glory fyft angel powred horsses clothed white pure raines mouth wente sharpe two edged swerde shulde smyte heythen shall rule rodde yron trode wynefat fearsnes wrath almyghty god hath vesture thygh name wryttē kyng kynges lorde lordes sawe angel stāde sonne cryed aloude voyce sayinge foules flye myddes heuen come gather selues togyther vnto supper y• great god ye may eate flesshe kynges fleshe hye captaynes flesshe myghty men flesshe horsses syt flesshe fre mē bond men small great sawe beast kynges erth theyr warriers gathered togyther make battayle agaynst hym sat horsse agaynst hys souldiers beast takē hym false prophet wrought myracles whiche deceyued receyued beastes marke worshypped ymage cast quicke īto pōde fyre burnynge wt brymstone rēnaūt slayne wt swerde y• sat vpon horsse whiche swerde proceaded mouth foules fulfylled flesshe ¶ dragon bounde yeares dead aryse receyue iudgement capi xx saw angell come downe frō heuyng hauyng key bottom lesse pyt great chayne hande toke dragō y• olde serpēt • e deuyll satanas bounde hym yeres cast bottōlesse pyt bounde set seale hī shuld deceiue people nomore tyl yeres fulfylled 〈…〉 losed lytle season sawe seates sat vpō thē iudgemēt gyuē vnto thē sawe soules beheaded y• wytnes iesu worde god worshypped beast nether ymage nether taken marke vpō forhedes handes lyued raygned christ yeare deed mē liued againe vntyll thousande yere fynyshed fyrst resurrecion blessed holy hath parte fyrst resurceccyon shal secōde death hane power shalbe prestes god christe shall raygne thousande yere whē thousand yeres expiredezechiel 38 39 satan shalbe lowsed prison shal go deceyue people foure quarter erth gog magog gather togyther battayle whose nombre sonde see went vp playne earth cō pased tentes sayntes aboute beloued citie fyre came downe frō god heauen deuoured deuyll deceyued cast lake fyre brymstone beast false prophet shalbe tormented day nyght euer sawe great white seate fate whose face fled awaye y• erth heauen place founde sawe deed great small stonde god bokes opened another boke opened boke lyfe dded iudged thynges whyche wrytten bokes accordyng theyr dedes see gaue vp deed whiche death hell delyuered vp deed whiche iudged euery man according dedes deeth hel cast lake fyre seconde death whosoeuer founde wrytten boke lyfe cast lake fyre ¶ chapyter descrybed newe spirituall ierusalem capi xxi saw newe heuen newe erth fyrst heuē fyrst erth vanyshed awaye see ✚ iohn sawe holy cytie newe ierusalē come downe god heauen prepared bryde garnyshed husbande herd great voyce heauen sayinge beholde tabernacle god wt men wyl dwel thē shalbe • people god hym selfe shal thē god esay xlv • • lxvi 〈◊〉 〈…〉 iii god shal wype away reares eye shalbe nomore death nether sorow nether cryinge neyther shal payne olde thinges gone sat vpon seate sayde esay 25 beholde iesa xliii • • orin 5 make thynges newe ✚ sayde vnto wryte wordes faythfull true sayd vnto done alpha omega begynnyng end wyl gyue hym thrist wel water life fre ouercōmeth shall inheret thynges wyl hys god shalbe sonne fearfull vnbeleuyng abhominable murdrers whoremonger sorcerer ydolaters al lyers shall haue theyr parte lake whiche burnith wt fyre brymstone whyche seconde deeth came vnto one y• seuē angel seuen vya ••• full seuen last plage talked saying come hyther wyl shewe bryde lambes wyfe caryed away spirit great hye moūtayne shewed great cite holy ierusalem descendyng heuen god hauing bryghtnes god shinyng lyke vnto stone precious euen lyke iasper clere cristal walles great hye xij gate gate xij angel name wrytten name xij trybes israell east parte iij gate northsyde iij gate towardes south iij gate frō west thre gate wall cytie xij foundacyons twelue name lābes xij apostle talked goldē reade measure cytie withal gatꝭ therof wall therof y• citie bylt iiij square lēgth large bredth measured cytie wt goldē rede xij furlonges lēgth bredth y• heyth equal measured wall therof cxliiij cubytes measure y• angell measure mā vseth bilding wall iaspar c • tie pure golde lyke vnto clere glasse foundacions wal cytie w ••• garnished al maner ••• cious •• ones▪ fyrst foundacion iaspis y• second saphyre thyrd calcedony four •• emerad fift sardonir se •• sardeos seuenth crisolite eyght beral ix topas tenth crusoprasos eleuenth iacynte twelueth amatist twelue gate xi • perles euery gate one perle strete cytie pure golde thorow shynyng glasse sawe tēple therin lorde god almyghtye lambe tēple ••• ye 〈◊〉 citie hath nede sōne neyther mone lyghten bryghtnes god dyd light lambe lyght people whiche sauyd shal walke lyght kyngꝭ earth shall brynge theyr glory ⚜ honoure vnto esay lx c gate shut day shal nyght ⚜ shall brynge glory honoure nacions shall entre none vncleane thyng neyther soeuer worketh abhommacio • maketh lye onely wrytten lambes boke lyke ¶ ryuer water lyfe frutefulnes lyght cytie god lorde gyueth euer seruauntes w ••• ynge thynges come angell wyl worshypped worde god maye nothynge added •• ynisshed capi xxii shewed pure ryuer water lyfe clere crystal procedyng seate god lambe myddes strete eyther side ryuer wood lyfe whiche bare twelue maner frutes gaue frute euery moneth leues wood serued heale people al ther shalbe cursse seate god lambe shalbe seruauntes shall serue hym shall se hys face name shalbe theyr forheddes esaye • x shalbe nyght nede candle neyther lyght sunne lord gyueth lyght shall raygne euermore sayde vnto sayinges faythfull true lorde god sayntes prophetes sent hys angel shewe vnto seruauntes thinges whiche must shortly fulfylled beholde come shortly 〈◊〉 • • happy kepeth saying prophesy boke iohn whych sawe thynges herde thē herde sene •• • xix • fell downe worshyp fete angel whiche shewed thinges said vnto se thou thy felowe seruaunt felowe seruaunt thy brother prophetes thē kepe sayinges prophesy boke worshyppe god sayd vnto seale sayinges prophesy boke tyme hande doth euyl let euyl styl whiche fylthy let hym fylthy styll ryghtuous let hī rightuous yt holy let holy beholde come shortly rewarde gyue euery man accordynge hys dedes shalbe alpha omega begynnynge ende fyrst last blessed commaundementes theyr power maye tree lyfe maye entre thorowe gate cytie •• ay 44 • • p • c • • b without shalbe dogges inchaunters whoremonger mortherers ydolaters whosoeuer loueth maketh leasynges iesus sent myne angell testifye vnto thynges congregacions rote generacion dauid bryght mornyng starre spirite bryde saye come let yt heareth saye also come esay 〈◊〉 • iohn 7 • let yt thyrst come let whosoeuer wyll▪ take water lyfe fre testyfy vnto euery man heareth wordes prophesy thys booke deute 4 • xii prou 30 • yf man shal adde vnto thinges god shall adde vnto hym plage wrytten thys booke yf man shall mynishe wordes booke thys prophesye god shall take awaye hys parte booke lyfe holy cytye thynges whiche wrytten thys booke whyche testyfyeth thynges sayth come quyckely amen euen come lorde iesu grace oure lord iesu christ wyth amen ❧ ende newe testament ❧ table fynde epystles gospel vsually red chyrch salysbury vse wherof firste lyne epistle gospel whose begynnynge thou shalt fynde boke marked crosse ✚ ende halfe crosse ⊢ conteyned within letter b c c ¶ fyrst sondaye aduent rom xiij b thys tyme also math xxi dreweny • ¶ wednisdaye iacob v b pacyent therfore bre marcke begynnyng ¶ frydaye esaye li herken vnto math iij came iesus ¶ seconde sondaye aduent rom xv thinges soeuer luk xxi c shalbe token ¶ wednisdaye zacha viij thus sayeth lord math xi b uerely saye vnto ¶ frydaye esa lxii b wyll set watchman ihon b ihon beareth wytnesse ¶ thyrde sonday aduent • corin iiii let men esteme v mat xi whan ihon herde ¶ wednisdaye esa ii thys worde luce b syxte moneth ¶ frydaye esa xi shall come rod luke mary rysyng fourth sondaye aduent philip iiij reioyce lorde iohn b recor wednisdaye ioel ii e iij c glad luce vij b sayenge ¶ frydaye zacha ij b glad reioyce mar viij b take hede beware ¶ chrystmasse euen rom pavl seruaunt math c generacyon ¶ chrystmasse nyght ma tit ij b grace god luke ii fell ¶ seconde masse titū iij whan kyndnes luce ii c shepherde spake ¶ thyrde masse hebre god
